reviews: Suit boutique (custom made) with a coffee shop. A stylish shop with friendly staff. Good quality coffee & tea.

Wow, where to start... I started coming to HVRMINN for their coffee. Paul is the man! He brews up the best lattes, and he does so with pomp and circumstance in his 3-piece suit. After becoming a regular, I’ve become infatuated with their craft and attention to detail. There’s a lost art in suiting, drowned by the leisurewear market, but not to worry! A suit that fits perfectly will be in your closet forever, so I decided to order my first real suit. 

When I finally made the decision, Minn, THEE head designer, was extremely patient and understood this was a big step for me. We sipped espressos as we flipped through their fabric swatch books. I was between two different blues, and he nudged me toward the more confident blue. I took his suggestion, and we got to measuring. 

The measuring portion was perhaps the most intimate part, because the designer of all of these beautiful pieces was the one measuring me. At this point I got to pick button and pocket placements, so I could have my own creative touch, making it my own. 

Their craftsmen spent the next few weeks sewing away, but Minn and Paul were always updating me when I dropped by for coffee. I received my suit soon thereafter. It was exactly how I dreamt my first real suit would look. Such an iconic silhouette! I’ll be back for another!
Unique playlist and vibe with quality coffee; just what the neighborhood needs!

I've recently needed to shop for a new suit, as I've outgrown my old ones. I've never had a suit that fits me as well as the ones that they've custom made for me. I manage a personal business, but also work with many private investors, so being well dressed is important. They also have great customer service, and even took photos of me in my suit. I highly recommend HVRMINN to anyone who is on the market for a custom made suit.

It has been a long journey finding a suit that not only fits properly ,but also is instilled with quality, charm and boldness to set it apart from everyone else. From my first fitting to the delivery of my made to measure suit , I was thoroughly impressed with the attention to details, craftsmanship and customer service. I was so happy with my mtm suit I had another made soon after and can proudly say I will be getting a few more to add to the collection! Oh and the coffee was excellent!

name: Cafe Gitane
reviews: Cute little cafe that I was excited to find in my neighborhood! I got the baked eggs sandwich which was absolutely delicious, will definitely become my go-to item. I also appreciated the piece of chocolate that came with my latte — it was a nice touch. The prices are a bit on the high side for a cafe.

A gem!! Hidden away on a quiet peaceful street in vinegar hill. Learned about the restaurant from a friend that works in the area, and we checked it out for lunch on a Tuesday. We were in and out within 45min. Vegetarian/vegan options are clearly labeled and the server was happy to suggest dishes to accommodate. If you’re looking for a veg option, get the cous cous! Sooo good - basically a giant tower of veggies and hummus. They have another location in Nolita and are planning to open a location in LA (Venice) sometime this year
Great find! Friendly and fast service, enjoyed the atmosphere and the big windows with view on the surroundings. The orange blossom waffle was delicious!

The Gypsy lady is so good! Quiet little #French cafe in Vinegar Hill at Hudson and Water and compares to any cafe I go to when back home in Paris. They close early, but wonderful and the prices are reasonable. I generally take this way when I drive into #DUMBO so I can park on Water St., so I'll gladly return and grab a bite and coffee before stopping in Dumbo for overpriced and unexceptional cuisine. So glad I found this place.

Cafe gitane is a French Parisian inspired Cafe offering French and American food. The service was very good I went very early in the morning the wait staff was very attentive the music was great the seating arrangements was fine overall aesthetic perfect for close casual get-togethers.

Pros: I really love how this place pays close attention to detail and all the food that was served to me the cappuccino was made fresh to order the cafe mocha had a really cool design on it I got a piece of chocolate along with my beverage I thought that small detail just made all the difference and I really enjoyed my experience.the cafe has a very intimate  setting the wait staff is very nice and attentive the selection of food provides a lot of variety mostly small plants like salad sandwiches soups and breakfast foods it's a really good place to come to unwine.

Cons: the serving portion would be considered small for someone who is looking to have a full course meal but if you like small plates or you looking to have just an in-between meal or simply to have brunch   this place will be a good option.

reviews: Beautiful and breathtaking views!
Cozy environment clean and quite
Nice to read
Summer vacation...
Great place for bird watching

reviews: Cool place to relax and watch the trains go by

name: Naval Cemetery Landscape
address: 63 Williamsburg St W #1, Brooklyn, NY 11249, USA
reviews: Small park area with a boardwalk path that leads around the park. The walk around the park is about two to four minutes total depending on how fast you walk it. They have lots of plants and different trees. It provides a few benches to sit. Due to the trees, it provides much shaded areas. It's not doggie pet friendly and bikes are not permitted inside this park.

A beautiful, hidden gem of a park! Under the bench there’s a waterproof journal and a pen for people to record their thoughts, which was really fun to read. It’s not a big park, but is a great place to do yoga, read, or have a picnic.

The park is located on the ground that contains a cemetery from the nearby decommissioned naval hospital.  A raised wooden walkway curves through a wild flower meadow with dozens of species of native plants.  During the summer, when the flowers are in bloom, the park is frequented by bees, butterflies, and a variety of birds.  The northeast corner contains benches with a view of the rest of the park.
Beautiful space to slow down, relax, and observe

An Absolutely gorgeous place to relax in the hustle and bustle of New York City Life, great for jogging, riding your bike, going for a stroll, or just meditating. I have no doubt that you will enjoy this beautiful place of nature just as I did.

name: Greenfelds
reviews: Delicious food,
This is the best kosher deli in Williamsburg!
Best takeout
The best end freash food on the world
Excellent prepared foods. Nice staff.

name: Grill On Lee
reviews: I celebrated my nomination yesterday in this great restaurant. Well we had a tremendous evening and the venue was definitely the reason for that successful meeting. The crew  helped in a pleasant style, the meals were very good and my buddies were extremely  delighted. We shall definitely return for more joyful events. thanks very much.

A completely honest review after trying takeout from grill on less over 5 separate occasions and trying out 10 different dishes.

I would give them a 3/5. They are decent but definitely don’t expect anything above that, and the chicken and meats that they use often taste of low quality.

Crispy Beef (Chinese Menu) stay away! The beef is disgusting and covered in an equally terrible sauce - 1/5.

Vegetable Soup - their soup is not bad at all. Certainly not gourmet but it taste nice and hits the spot. - 5/5.

Pastrami Burger - one of their better items on the menu. The burger is flavored well, though cooked a little too much to the point of being on the dry side. Still pretty decent. - 4/5.

Chicken Soup with Matzah Ball and Noodles - again another great soup. - 5/5.

Pastrami Baguette Sandwich - not very good at all. Pastrami used here was full of fat and not much meat on it. Bread was old and stale and tasteless. - 2/5.

Cajun Fries - I mean they’re fries. Cannot go too wrong with them, and it was dried out but that it to be expected with takeout. 4/5.

Potato Knish - not bad at all. 4/5.

Chilly Burger - its very spicy! If you like heat it is not a bad burger. Similar to the other burger above it was on the dry side :( - 4/5.

Chip Fries - these are very good! Much better than the frozen variety Fries, these are fresh and taste good. - 5/5.

Sweet n Sour Chicken (Chinese Menu) - better than the beef on Chinese menu, but still pretty low quality chicken and did not taste fresh. Stick to burgers at this place I would say. - 3/5.

French Fries - boring and tasteless. - 1/5.

Grilled Chicken - not too bad, moist and had flavor to it. Not best quality. - 4/5.

Beef Egg Roll - not a lot of flavor dimension and taste like a glob of oil. - 2/5.

Sesame Chicken with Fried Rice - rice was not fried, Chicken was not good quality and sauce was missing the good flavor. Would not get again. - 3/5.
I give 5 stars because there food is one in a million! Costumer service can improve alot... the staff is quick, overall it's worth to give this place a try.
The food is regularly well prepared and delightful, staff members hands over excellent customer service. I loved the cleanliness and atmosphere. Keep up the good work.

Great food fast delivery fair prices the Chinese chef is very friendly and kind gives generous portions 
They have a huge menu selection 
On Thursday it's a whole different level the vip plate chulent overnight kugel kishka jachnune egg matzah ball brisket flanken bone marrow with a grilled baguette 
And a great grill station as well with loads of different sandwich options and lots of sauces

name: Klein's Kosher
reviews: Very famous restaurant in the heart of Williamsburg with a large variety of breakfast and lunch. Great food and service. Newly renovated.
Delicious Hungarian food
Fresh & tasty food. Most important, the free entertainment by the proprietor.
R’ Berl Kline’s food is something out of the world, delicious food and cozy place
If you want to experience old Williamsburg and great food, this is the place.

name: Brooklyn Bagel
reviews: Decent bagels, but it beats me how they can be priced at 8 dollars each. We are in hipster Williamsburg, so I guess the prices are intended to be ironic as well. The lox (smoked salmon) was good; the crunchy fried lox was a little greasy. The bagels pale in comparison to those on Brick Lane (London), where they're more generous with the salmon, the bagels are bigger and doughier... and they're half the price.
Have lived in NY my entire life and this place makes the best bagels and cream cheese I’ve ever had.
Lots of choices, I had to go there a few times. Highly recommended
Great choices of bread bagels and baguettes
Awesome Place.... Great Food..... And Good Prices...... Very Good Service........

name: Café Au Lee
reviews:
Amazing place great staff very quick service always with a smile they speak quite a few languages the food is delicious try their famoisfamous cinnamon buns and much more 
They have a huge selection pf drinks with their own spon on it 
Great for breakfast lunch and dinner

This site is my preferable restaurant.  Of all restaurants I know I favor it most. I never miss an opportunity to go to that place. Whenever  I feel like having a delicious lunch, this place comes instantly to my head. extremely good and diverse  food and a rich menu.helpful staff, and agreeable mood. Not less important, the cost is honest. I sent my friends to this place with pleasure.
Awesome People! The Welcome When You Come In Is The Best. Good & Delicious Food As Well!

Best dairy restaurant in Williamsburg 
You got what you pay for...
Best Costumer service ever!!
Best salad in nyc they make their own dressing

name: Kaff bakery
reviews: Great tasting goodies. Kosher. And they have their own lone of low carb baked goods. Tried a muffin and it was pretty good. Nice place

name: Spitzer's Kosher Bakery
reviews: Great food. A little bit pricy, but everything is fresh.
Nice little kosher grocery store.
Extra sensitive to your needs they will go out of their way to help
Best customer service ever
Tidy, simple corner grocery store. Lots of products

name: Sander's Bakery
reviews: i love passing by at this bakery and get myself some bread and pastries. so authentic. Hot bread early morning is what i love the most...God bless the owner for thriving since 1950’s.
I was visiting from out of town and stopped in here.  The cheese danish and the sugar free spelt linzer cookies I got were fantastic.  Definitely will visit again when I'm in town.
Kosher bakery, great service! (love the "water" challeh bread)
Wow! I loved the cookies and different option for bread. Clean and an amazing service, products simply delicious!
Good products, check out the sour dough challah

name: Traditional Kosher Bakery
reviews: Glatt kosher Williamsburg bakery. Grate selection and staff. All made fresh daily.
Great bakery. Delicious food.
Best
Good place for breakfast
A clean place

name: Bagel Hub
reviews: I stepped in today at Bagel Hub for a coffee, but walked out with a full lunch, delicious appetizing fresh food, with a homey atmosphere, I was just amazed, highly recommended!!!
liked the food, clean and priced well. will come again soon.
Best food in brooklyn
Amazing food and amazing service.

name: Folkowitz Cakes And Desserts
address: 162 Williamsburg St E, Brooklyn, NY 11211, USA
reviews: #1 place for all your cakes and miniatures.
They have tons of kosher custom ready exclusive miniatures and cakes which are mouthwatering to the palette
Delicious cakes and speciality cookies
Yummy stuff

name: Steinberg's Bakery
reviews: loved this place. quick coffee and grab a couple cookies . Rugelach, so many other things ..id always buy too much..and so much never made it home
The best kipilach ever
Incredibly fresh, very well priced and great staff
Delicious fresh baked goods yummy!
good food and the best sandwiches in town

name: Oneg Bakery
reviews: Small bakery, babka is very heavy on the chocolate - expensive accordingly (Pro tip - tell the nice man how much you want to pay and he can sort of show you what size of a piece it'll be). Try the pastries - fresh & good. If kept fridged - recommended to portion it prior.
old fashioned bakery. the smell from the moment you walk guarantees you'll walk out with a stash. challah is sensational.

I love the warm customer service and the rugelach. The babka, well, I couldn’t finish my slice because it was too rich, too sweet and I think they used margarine. I’m not sure about this. I know I got a headache from it.
Delicious pastries. Very clean. Nice staff
This is a pretty awesome bakery, the food is awesome and service is really great. Not to mention the food here are reasonably priced.

name: Kaffs Bakery
reviews: It is a nice bakery- highlights include the marble (chinese) cookies and the triangle cookies with Jam in the middle. Very good service- Ask for Feli. Affordable prices and near the J Train at Marcy Avenue. You can see the bakers in the rear of the store making the items fresh daily, however be aware the store closes on Saturday for weekly rest.
It's a good bakery, a big selection of different cakes and bread, good taste.
Really good kosher pastries! Take the cinnamon roll! They also offer coffee and a salad bar.
Amazing pastries fresh chalah and sourdough breads salad bar Sandwich Bar highly recommended
Excellent food always fresh customer service is awesome

name: Classon Triangle
reviews: Plenty of places to sit, twelve benches, but the noise, traffic, and exhaust of the surrounding streets and highway make it not an ideal respite, especially when there's no free city wifi within range. Well tendd and ample trash cans but I can't say I'd come here to hang out or take a date.
Nice grounds very noisy from the traffic.

name: Park
address: 1-63 Williamsburg St W, Brooklyn, NY 11249, USA
reviews: Nice relaxing place.

name: Mozzarella Kosher
reviews: This is obviously one of the best place to eat in the neighborhood. Every time I visit this place I am awfully happy. They maintain their very high  standard service and the topmost level of cooking  they give. You can never go wrong with this restaurant. Very  recommended.
Delicious food great service
Food is always amazing and the staff are the friendliest staff. I also deliver uber eats for them and its always good vibes. I recommend this place 100%

Their food was delicious and fresh. The prices were amazing and I will recommend this to anyone looking to go out to eat casually. Great place for friends, cheap prices, and amazing atmosphere.
It's also conveniently located near a bus stop, so easy to get there and not have to worry about the hassle of parking.
The place offers an awesome range of fresh food. I like dining here. Staff members are always very kind, pricing is convenient and the place is always well organised.

name: Cheesy Kosher
reviews: Great food always fresh , very clean - can eat of the floor ->that how clean they are.  (But please don’t eat of the Floor) the two owner are very personal and very fare to all customers, their sushi’s are always fresh , clean , and very tasty. Every one behind the counter is Very helpful in choosing the right dish. Wait time to be served is extremely short...I’m a 3 to 4 times a week customer and have never been disappointed. Keep it up boyz :-)
Best pizza, must try the Cheesy Crust pizza. Great customer service.. very nice owner's
The place serves large portions and for affordable rates. helpful owner. 5 stars.
Definitely a place for the locals only. No menu in sight. No service and some of the food look like it had been sitting there for a while.
Delicious food, great service, amazing staff, nice and clean

name: Gshmak Bakery and Cafe
reviews: Their rugelach is amazing - crunchy on the outside, soft and chewy on the inside. I trust that all their other baked goods are made with the same quality.

Bad service 
the man by the counter i asked for the last bread.
I
A girl after me asked for a bread he gave it for her not for me.
I will never come back to this store 

He didn't even say sorry 

But food is good
Very cozy warm place. Delicious food. Nice display. Friendly staff. Reasonable prices.

Delicious Bakery. Full line of Bakery Goods. All kind of sandwiches paninis and wraps. Best salad bar in town. You can even sit in (although I wouldn't recommend it) everything in the store is tasty fresh and delicious. Their prices are not cheap but fair. Busiest times are between 1 and 3, I would recommend to try their whole grain challos (Jewish traditional bread) it's delicious tasty and crispy. They also got a full line of cheese chocolate and cinnamon pastries, all of them are delicious and scrumptious. If you're looking for any Bakery Goods in the Williamsburg area this is the place. Hope you enjoy
A Peerless Place of Paramount Pastries that is Particularly Palatably Passionately Peaceful Peppy, Perky and Perfect.

name: Kerestir Matzah Bakery
reviews: Low gluten, not thick, flavorful. We like to buy the razeve matzos from Kerestir ever year.
Best hand made motzos
The best matza in the market
Absolute best Matzoh bakery!
Fresh matza

name: Cozzi Pizza
reviews: Delicious pizza, unbeatable prices, and very friendly staff... best place on Broadway  for informal dining
The pizza is delicious!!!! Everytime I order from here my neighbors ask where did you get that food?
Good pizza. Fast service. Friendly staff.  Good prices. Large portions

Great food! We always order out near me and food is over priced thinned out and doesnt taste good. My mom got me a pie from here a couple of weeks ago and i was able to order delivery on grubhub to my area for less than $2. It arrived extremely fast, it was hot! The quality and quantity they gave was great. My chicken parm sandwich was so good and so big, the chicken wasnt a small thin piece with a bunch of flour to make it look big. This will forever be the the only pizza spot we order from.
I come to this shop all the time with my dad for their amazing hot wings and slices. Their lasagna's are exquisite as well. Definitely can recommend this place.

name: Empanaderia NYC
reviews: Great homemade food, nice vegan options. Really simple but very tasty. Highly recommend!
Great service, relatively inexpensive, healthy options, very Delicious. yes.

name: Chicken Express
reviews: I actually loved the dishes and service, fantastic area next to where I live. The employees are always very friendly. Would recommend to others.
The place is not so clean the food was OK, no restroom and they don't serve coffee.
Chickens and prefectwly fried and very crunchy!
I visit this place a lot since I work nearby. I love how the service is always good and they keep the place clean consistently. Pricing is affordable and they serve sizeable portions.
Great price, yummy food

name: Café 28
reviews: This spot is my favored. I eat in plenty of restaurants but to this place I  constantly return again and again. The team is very welcoming and the food they place on your table is so flavorful. I would always prefer to have a nice meal in this restaurant. I highly recommend this place.
The best costumer service and the best food and the best prices

My friends have been talking about this place since they opened was there last week for the first time the staff team was so nice helped me choose the dish I wanted and he offered the side sauces most places you have to ask for it.
Hope you guys stay with the same customer service
The food and service were above our expectations. I really enjoyed the ambience of this spot. Wonderful spot to take my family out for dinner.
nice place good food and enough seating

name: Sheli
reviews: I heard you guys have big booty hoes👍🏽👌 🤗 no wonder my husband loves coming there👍🏽👌☝🏼
Great food good customer service
Great customer service great staff amazing food
Great food love it
Friendly atmosphere, come here and leave yours worries behind.

name: Gooey&Co
reviews: PLEASE NOTE!  This is not a retail bake shop and this address  Gooey&Co is ONLINE ONLY and offers a wide selection of flavors and gift sets with quick turn around and shipping nationwide.
cookies are chewy!

I received two boxes of "Goodness" for Mother's Day and rationed the wonderful desserts to those I loved -- dearly.   Every morsel was 
heavenly.   Now I'm about to order more for a special occasion.  Can't think of a better way to delight guests.
Delicious!!!!!
cookies are chewy! Mi paborito.

name: Salt of the Earth Bakery
reviews: just flew back on a Delta 'red-eye'.....and had  a Salt of the Earth 'The Cookie' and think it's the best cookie I've ever tasted!!!  My cardiologist may "kill me" but......so what!!  Try "The Cookie".  It is killer good.
Enjoying in Wisconsin. Ty! Peace in the Lord Jesus
Received in my amazon candy box. Great cookies my pregnant wife loves them. Highly recommend.
They make the best chocolate chip cookie I've ever eaten.

name: Krumville bake shop
address: 630 Flushing Ave 8th floor, Brooklyn, NY 11206, USA
reviews: Antonella worked with me to create the perfect cake for my daughter’s baby shower.  It was delivered on time, and was beautiful and absolutely delicious.  Drew a lot of positive comments.  We will definitely work with them in the future!
chocolate cake and cheesecakes are very awesome!

Hands down the best gluten free cakes, cookies, and focaccia. The cakes are so moist and flavorful I prefer them over traditional wheat flour cakes. And the focaccia! The texture is perfect and the flavor is right on. There are also amaretti cookies that rival any Italian bakery. Krumville changes the game when it comes to gluten free sweets! Every birthday cake should come from here!
We bought a wonderful gluten free cake for my step-daughter's birthday. Everyone loved it. Still thinking about it.
Can’t speak highly enough about Krumville. I first had one of their tasty cakes at a party and didn’t know it was gluten free until someone told me. Years later, it’s still my go-to bakery. 10/10

name: Sweet Dames Artisan Confections
reviews: We had the Cocomallow Sandwich, which is a coconut macaroon sandwich with a toasted marshmallow in the middle. They have a few versions, like dipped in chocolate for example, but we were really excited about the one we got. It smelled amazing, but it was a little dry and not as light and fluffy as we wanted. Alternatively, it could've been really toasty and crunchy, but it was in the middle and not as flavorful as you would expect.
Just got the Cocomallow vanilla sandwhich... i'm in heaven!!!!!
Your salted Caramel Coconut Macaroons are to die for...!

name: Steinbergs Bakery
reviews:
Good selection for pastries. 
Big salad bar for sandwiches and omelets. 
They have soup, coffee and to go sandwiches and salads, cold drinks. 
Quality of food is great and fresh.
Couldn’t even find it I think it closed
Best bakery
Good stuff

name: Satmar Matzah Bakery
reviews: Best matzah
Excellent Service!!
The crisp of the matzah, yoish...
Very good thin matzoh
Very strict kosher matzo bakery with great service

name: Balchov
reviews: It's a good place to pray
It's an amazing shul
Very good crew
Nice synagogue

זייער א פיינע בא'טעם'טע בית מדרש, מנין שחרית יעדע האלבע שעה, א פיינע מקוה און קאווע א גאנצן טאג, איך וואלט עס געגעבן פינף סטארס ווען עס וואלט געווען אביסל ליידיגער מיט אביסל פלאץ זיך צו רירען, אי"ה ווען די ארונים וועלן עפענען זייער נייע בית המדרש אויף וואלאובאוט, האף אז באלחוב וועט ווערן אביסל ליידיגער און רואהיגער

name: Harmony Triangle
reviews: Yeah beautiful place to stay good time you can stay safe out there.
The parks dept needs to sweep up and clean up this Little trianglebut it's a good place to stop and have a cup of coffee and enjoy your lunch
It's a nice place.
I just parked around there
Ok community

name: Union & Marcy Triangle
address: Union Ave &, Wallabout St, Brooklyn, NY 11206, USA
reviews: Plenty of bench seating facing the street for a rest or some lunch if you brought it with you, there's not much around and there's no free public linknyc wifi unfortunately, they should target parks to make sure people are connected where it makes sense. But it is nice to have a park at the beginning or end of a Citibike journey!

name: Lindsay Triangle
reviews: Not much to see but you can pick up a Citi-Bike or hop on over to the J & M Train  Station if you'd like.
Fun place
Nice
Good...

name: McDonald's
reviews: ESL and inattentive servers made for a less than pleasurable experience. Final corrected order was  delicious, hot and tasty. Hey, this is the house that Ronald built!
Authentic Mexican food.   Great service.   Except for one person definitely would visit again.   Thank you.
The Food is always fresh, and the shakes are amazing.

I celebrated my nomination today in this excellent restaurant. happy to tell that it was a pleasant evening and the venue was unquestionably one of the reasons for that successful celebration. The team  collaborated in a gorgeous style, the cuisine was great and my guests were very  happy. We shall surely visit again for more celebrations. Thank you very much.

The drive-through is not reliable they didn't get the order right we swung back around they choose to wait at the curbside didn't come out for another 20 minutes we had to go in eventually girl never listened to the order suggestion listen to the customer The food was good

name: IHOP
reviews:
We had not visited this location in a long time.  My daughter n I were celebrating her acceptance into the college.  We were seated within a few minutes of arrival.  The waitress was really sweet n gave us suggestions to complete our selection. 

Our food came out quickly, fresh and nice and hot. The waitress came over multiple times to ensure we were ok.

Will definitely go back for breakfast.  This is my new secret spot.

❤💗❤💗

No matter whichever IHOP I go to anywhere around the country, they never ever disappoint me. The food is always very mouthwatering and delicious. The staff here was very respectful and friendly. Constantly checked on us. Food was made in a very timely manner. Was not that crowded at the time our party visited. Very clean. Parking may be an issue due to the business of the area, which makes it rather scarce to find parking, also have to pay the meter which isnt that much. If I I remember correctly it's about one dollar per hour, 3 hours max. They also have a take out section so if you want to you can run in and out real quick

The worst service ever. I came here with my roommate to have a nice Saturday breakfast. We sat down for around 15 minutes until someone finally came to take the order. She was very impatient and murmuring the whole time. She also demanded us to pass the menu and the coffee to her. The only nice person there is the cleaning lady. She's the one who got someone to order for us. The food is okay. But I'll never go to this IHOP again. And I'd recommend you never come to this place.

I love to come in with a party of 5 with 2 toddlers and able to sit in less than 5 min.
I ordered the sirloin tips, and as always tender, seasoned, fresh and quick. This Ihop has improved so much river the years. Keep up the great work.

First of all I went on a weekend which may have had more of an impact on service.  The wait time was 25 minutes. There were available tables as well as vacated tables. It seems there weren't enough staff on hand to turn tables quickly. A manager should have been visible and helping. I chose to get my food to go. While I love ihop I won't be returning to that location.

name: Dunkin'
reviews: There are work at 6.00-22.00. But in google map is another hours.((
MY DAUGHTER DRINKS THAT SHE SAID IT'S GOOD
This is my go to DD when I'm in Brooklyn. Fast and correct orders with decent customer service.
They need to improve on their overall experience.
Donuts 🍩  and coffee ...  Nuff said...  Lol

name: Taco Bell
reviews: I don't know. From my experience Taco bells from different areas taste different. This place seem to finesse the menu. The numerous times i ate there i wasn't disappointed.  The food came to me warm and went down my belly warm and that's how taco bells food be.
Location is okay. Could do better with more training on customer service and hire cashiers that understand english more. Could improve the architecture with better booths and tables and lighting.

First Taco Bell I've ever been to that does not have a value menu. Some items that would be found on the value menu in other brances cost twice as much or more at this location... Food was good but I won't be back till you add a legit value menu.
It's really nice they have big space everyone know taco deli.

Not great, not bad. Pretty much what you expect from a Taco Bell. I’ve been here about 7-8 times, my order was messed up twice, seemed to be staffed with more people than necessary (maybe I just went at slow hours?), and it’s not the cleanest. 
Don’t let it deter you, though. While this isn’t a shining example of what Taco Bell should be, it’s definitely more than good enough for what these employees get paid.

name: Milk Money Burger
reviews: Absolutely a place worth visiting, the food is fantastic and well prepared, the cost is affordable and it is always neat here. Fantastic work.

This place is horrible. I ordered from here and received the wrong order. After calling to rectify the issue, the employee who answered the phone was unapologetic and unhelpful. I then requested to speak with the manager who was nice but when discussing the fact that one of the many errors made was not receiving my burger well done, I was told that all burgers are made medium rare but that he'll make an exception this one time. That is just ridiculous. After waiting for my new order, I received a call from the delivery guy who says that he doesn't want to come up the elevator (like the first delivery guy did) and that he'll just come back in 10 minutes. I was so outraged that I contacted the restaurant again but was put on hold for quite a while until I simply just called my bank to get refunded.

I ordered food through seamless it's been over an hour an I still don't have my food. The second time I called the girl told me that they were backed up and didn't have many drivers. Understood, but you should probably get off delivery apps or you're going to have a lot of loss. I'm calling to cancel with seamless I'm hungry and it looks like I'm going to have to order again.
It's not there. Closed down or something, but this address is vacant.
Their double cheese burgers are so delicious! They taste homemade!

name: Samurai Papa
reviews: Came in around 6p.m. just in time for the happy hour and ordered the Papa pork gyoza and the sushi roll. Both were good and well presented, the food came in fast and the server was very attentive. Very small cozy place with very cool dinning long table and decorations.

Went here for lunch today with a friend and loved the place. Super cozy, fast and friendly service, good music, good food. It’s totally a spot I would revisit alone and bring a book. Vegetarian/vegan friendly. It’s also close to multiple train stops so I’ll definitely be back. I absolutely recommend this place.

We went for a late Monday lunch on a whim and it was fantastic. The Yuzu Ginger Iced Tea was phenomenal and a must have for hot sunny Brooklyn days. 

Portion sizes were excellent, great value for money and the server was very friendly. 

Would definitely recommend, they have a lot to offer!
This ramen place is one of the highlights of the fast-changing neighborhood. All the staffs are incredibly friendly and various options of, I would say, quite experimental ramens available.

This place has been around for a long time. It’s one of our favorite go to for ramen, as a couple, and with kids. The seating options is a bar, communal low table and high table. Recently got the vegan ramen and crispy Brussels sprouts. Vegan ramen was full of flavor and delicious!

name: Popeyes Louisiana Kitchen
reviews:
I haven't eaten my chicken I got to go yet. But I had to review it because the service was excellent and the facility so clean I wanted to change my mind about taking my food to go.

The cashier was very polite and helpful and even offered me a promo deal they had when I had trouble figuring out how much food to order.

Order was made promptly and I had good interaction with the person giving me the food as well. Would order again.

If this review hasn't been edited, the foods quality was good as well.
Quick, clean and tasty

Really enjoyed this Popeyes all last year, took a hiatus from fast food and when I come back they’ve gone to hell. Very slow service, my sandwich was drenched in sauce, which is tasty but excessive to the point where I can’t eat it. My partner ordered spicy tenders and since I guess they didn’t have any they threw in a lot of normal ones.....but only the strange odds and ends that are just bread and overcooked paper thin chicken.

At first I liked the location because the service was quick and the value can't be beat. But at this location, I witnessed an employee or manager LOCK IN a harmless panhandler; keyword: harmless. Employee/manager then repeatedly requested staff to call the police, and after the panhandler begged to be let out, the manager SHOVED him out the door. I can understand you're taking care of your business and guests but the situation the employee created was far more uncomfortable than the panhandler asking me for a dollar, even a kid verbally complained at how unnecessary the whole scene was!
The food was delicious! People were very polite and the place was clean. Thank you!! 😄😄😄🍗🍗

name: Mirakuya
reviews:
pretty pleased with this food. it is fresh and flavorful and a great value for the money. I ordered from Seamless. the restaurant called me while preparing the order to confirm my requests, which I really appreciated. 

I ordered the teriyaki salmon bento box (9.25) (only 9.25 for salmon!!!) with shumai (a shrimp dumpling) and an edamame. instead of rice, I opted for extra salad, which was barely many leaves. that’s my only con - I think they could’ve been a little more generous on the salad, considering it was in place of the rice. 

the salmon is cooked well and very flavorful. the shumai is delicious and comes with a soy sauce to dip. the salad is decent and flavorful with a delicious citrusy dressing. and the edamame - average. could’ve used seasoning. but still good. 

overall good value and straightforward food.
Great food. Even better customer service.

I have ordered from this place probably at least a hundred times and they have never made a single mistake. Super nice staff, delicious food, amazing prices, and always very quick. I love this place so much!
Great Bento Lunch Boxes!!!
It was a new experience for me and I totally enjoyed it

name: La Isla Cuchifritos
reviews: I Really Loved The Food It’s Always Clean And Awesome Service It’s Never Closed At Night I Been That Place A Lots Of Times With My Family
I have been going to this place since I was a child always love my people food Latina. Great food!

The customer service was good...the smoothie was tasty, however, when you think smoothie, you think nice in thick, so it can be fulfilling...but the one that they said was one of the best sellers (SLIM SALLY) was very thin...and it could have been the person that made it, cause she didn't know a lick of English, 🤦🏾‍♀️...so because of this mishap, I'm gonna have to rate it a 3, 🤷🏾‍♀️ !!!
My favorite place could be alittle cleaner! But the food is amazing 😍
I would give 5 stars if the yellow rice wasn't cold and dry. Besides that is really good.

name: 19 Café
reviews: You need to get breakfast at 19 Cafe! What a great, cozy little place. The breakfast bagel sandwiches are fantastic, filling, and priced very reasonably. Coffee was tasty. The folks working are friendly and prompt. I wish we had found this place earlier!
What a wonderful cozy place to have something and relax with a cup of good coffee. Carefully-made foods, great service. Every neighborhood deserves this kind of coffee place, I daringly argue.

Very cute and small spot. I had the pork soup with soba. It was good, however I was still hungry after I was done. I didn't try anything else, but other people were eating next to me and they're sandwiches looked delicious. Please be aware that the menu prices on Google are incorrect, also that they no longer serve pork belly 😑 because people were complaining about the calories. They now serve roast pork. Overall, I likes it and will come back for a sandwich instead of the soup.
This is a great coffee in NYC! Can't wait to come back :)
Love this spot. Excellent coffee and customer service!

name: Little Caesars Pizza
reviews: Have purchased about 4-5 pizzas from this place in the last month, and have always been happy with the product (usually regular pepperoni or stuffed crust). Fair amount of cheese and toppings make good pizzas! Keep it up and I'll continue to order from you!
Fast & Slick. . .Take out Hommes. . 📱📱Little Cassar's app 😊😊

Great service from manager. Will always come to this specific place. Thank you guys for making my family’s pizza great.  10/26/2019 

Order was placed online on portal by Believe in God.
Pizza always comes out fresh.
Nice i like the way behavior of this shop owner

name: La Cocina II
reviews: The people are friendly and the food is great especially the fish the mofongo with shrimp I recommended

Been here 2 the La Cocina 2 Restaurant here in Brooklyn at this location out with a friend, we enjoyed it very much The food y service is absolutely delicious y courtious, just all around the restaurant u will find a great vibe Definitely would come back if ever in the Brooklyn area whether out with a friend or friends, just like this place as 1 of my favorite restaurants in the Brooklyn area - Danny S
Awesome food the staff are very humble

Worst food I’ve had ever. Everything was salty, they gave me a order totally different, when I asked why they provided me a different order, their response was “cause we don’t have what you ordered”, no professionalism.  Never will I order from this place again.
They cook so goood..

name: Burger King
reviews: Good thing I had a awesome breakfast at burger. In the morning, because my evening wasn't that great. Thanks burger King😉
Fries not the best. Burger very good.
It was quick but they didn't make it fresh.  Completely  ignored my request for no pickles. Not very accommodating. Both my 2 items in separate  bags but I have no idea why. Food is pretty average.

I visited BK in the morning didn't wait for my order more than 5 minutes the restaurant is two floors so there's more space for the customers.
The customer service is good, clean place, clean tables and clean restroom. 
Use Burger King mobile app and save some money.
Good food many seats and overall a good spot to go once in a while

name: Marias
reviews:
I went to a private party with 50 friends and we waited for almost 2 hours for our food. When it came it was cold.There was one server for 50 customers.Our order was wrong.
I ordered shrimp and was brought chicken. The ladies behind the counter had bad attitudes with us when we went to the counter to ask about our orders and some of my friends left without eating because it took so long.
The only positive thing was that the food was tasty.

name: Melting Pot Cuisine
reviews:
THIS PLACE IS CLEAN WITH NICE PEOPLE.
Breakfast food is delicious.
Roti Needs to  improve As well as pricing on Catering food &Certain things to order.
It’s good to have a Caribbean restaurant in the area finally. 
I hope you guys be around for a long time and not neglect the pricing on the food.
#Isupportblackbusinesses 🙏🏽

I tried to like the place but the food and prices are always inconsistent. I've never had to pay for a peas size squirt of pepper. I ordered a cow foot soup it was way too salty to consume. My stew chicken was mostly bones. Jerk chicken dried out. Fish cakes too oily...i could go on and on. Again I really tried to like it however the food is so mediocre.

The place is the worst!!!! I ordered breakfast and was told they didnt have an item and they would replace it, no where close to the price! I asked for a $5 lemonade and was sent a snapple smh......And the fried dumplings were fried grease balls! Kne bite and you'll have all the oil in your mouth!! Dont waste your time of money!

They food is extremely expensive the customers service is terrible this my second time ordering food an again missed a order An when u call back to remind them they didn’t deliver all your food u still don’t receive it the delivery guys is pushy for tips Smh they need to relocate where rich folks resides who in the world pays 18$ for a small Rasta pasta then 2$ for delivery that 20$ for a small meal❗️❗️
Clean place, nice people, but the food is subpar. No flavor to the food very bland. Totally shocked since Jamaican food is very savory.

name: New Fun Sing
reviews: Good food, allways busy.
Ideally, one of the better Chinese Restaurants in the neighborhood.  The long lines, and busy kitchen are testament..
Worst half fried chicken ever ordered. Chinese lady in the counter with an attitude.   Only 3 pcs of shrimp in shrimp fried rice.
Nasty food.  Don't recommend it
High quality Chinese fast food food!!

name: Habanero Café
reviews: This is my favorite Mexican spot!

I looked for a Spanish restaurant to get some authentic food but I would have been better off getting food from the deli. There was nothing special about this place. I didnt leave hungry so that was the good note. Was disappointed, I wouldn't go back
Okay prices for very good food. They have a very nice interior that feels comfortable and accommodating.

Great food and service. Was waiting for a friend who was having surgery at Woodhull hospital and needed lunch. Only fast food joints around plus I really wanted a beer! Awesome tacos and beer selection, mellow atmosphere.  Big burritos. And again, great service.

The food is okay in my personal opinion. It lacked in flavor to me. I was hoping for that authentic Mexican cooking taste and it missed the mark. The service was great though. My son and I had a very pleasant time.

name: Georges Latin Americana Bistro
reviews: The food here is amazing I love this place I recommend having breakfast here

The female waiters are horrible . Here I’m February 29, 2020 sitting in here I ordered my food over a half of hour ago . Now they steady in here taking new order that came behind me and these people being served before me and I’m in here with my son . Now not only that they haven’t even bought me nor my son nothing to drink they haven’t even check to make sure that I was ok . I had to go get the drinks and then the waitress act like she the one that should be mad . So they lost they tip in money but I did leave them with a tip alright and that was to learn better customer service , which they lack in communication. If your not Mexican or show any sign of Hispanic you can forget about it . But little did they know I’m .
The place is small but the food is good and inexpensive. The waitress are fast and friendly.
1 star also too much... junck food.... what hell is that
Great food

name: El Burrito Nacho II
reviews: They keep using our residential phone number and won’t fix it!!!!!!!

name: Halal Gyro Cart
reviews: The guy is super nice. The food is delicious. I always add white sauce, hot sauce and bbq sauce on my chicken over rice and it's super delicious !

name: Milan Pizza and Chicken
reviews: I really wish the pizza was slightly better quality. I'd go here 3 times a week if only it was fresher. Yes I know it's $1 a slice, but it doesn't cost them anything to keep less pizzas in the window and just cook them more frequently. Perhaps keep only cheese and add toppings per order...
Best food and very clean. Nice friendly staff. I highly recommend this place. Nice cost for food.
Cheap and fresh
Nice service and good food
I highly  recommend this place 100%. The food is great and very delicious.

name: Natural Gourmet Deli
reviews: Every time I go into this store, I feel like I'm getting ripped off. Do not believe the 5 star reviews that say this store is 'unique'. It's just an average deli that overcharges.
Best food !!!!
I love there food
Cool employee good food 👌 love they Philly cheese steak w bacon on hero
Good bacon, egg & cheese on a roll!!

name: Ra Monita Rest
reviews: Great service and food the best alcapurias in ny
The best Latin food from the Caribbean
Best alcapuria in town.
Great Latin food

name: Genao
reviews: This place has the best food around. I always order from this wonderful  clean and friendly place and have even referred my friends to this place. Highly recommend!
Be careful with the bill. Price aren't the same as menu.
Delicious delicious food! I asked for a whole chicken and the woman offered to cut it up for me. Great local place, nice people.
I enjoy the bands that play its a true dominican spot i would say age range is above 26
Food is good and not pricey at all.

name: Princesa Bakery
reviews: So worth the trip from Queens to Brooklyn great service and quality food wish I lived in Brooklyn I would cut my stove off
One of my favorite places to frequent on Graham Avenue! Good food and fast service! They make good cakes and pastries!
Always surprises me with the dedication they make their cakes love it

Great Coffee. Great Food, they are just getting a bit pricey. Don't go as often as I used to because of constant price Jack's. At least don't order food because of constant price jacking. 

You can thank NYC Commercial Rent laws for this. Something I will not be supporting, "Price Hikes" to our food to support greedy landlords and greedy Governments.

Bakery and food okay to say... but I give it a 2 because the customer attention is horrid. Morning busy and have two people dedicated to phone orders instead to taking care on the line of customer - only one cashier sho is doing everything - no wonder there are always new people here ... and this place needs a remodelation... get to my car the order is wrong once again .... will return next year again - I never get that fuzzy warm feeling to return...

name: Cheeze Louiez Pizzeria
reviews: I've tried the Buffalo Chicken Pizza and regular cheese and both were great. Super convenient location and friendly service. Nice crust, good sauce distribution. Finally a great pizza place near me.
10/10 recommend this place! The way they make the crust is amazingggg, it's so crunchy and I can't believe everything is sugar free. It's so tasty!

I loveeeeeeeee this place! Great location. The pizza is amazing and that crust is to die for😍 what i fell in love with is their sweet and tangy chicken. It is heaven!! Not too much sauce, chicken well done and when your done you will be licking your fingers lol i will always go back. Excellent customer service as well. They have the whole package!!!!
Delicous and fresh pizza. My brother had the penne a la vodka..  Awesome thank you will definitely be back.
Amazing pizza!!!!!. Very nice and clean shop. Also excellent service. I highly recommend The margarita pizza.

name: Caridad China
reviews: The red snapper with tostones is so good. Service was excellent. My new favorite place in  Brooklyn.
This place has amazing food. The prices appear high at first but the portions are so big you can split one meal between two people. The staff was kind and the facilities were clean.
flavorful and tender meat. friendly staff
The place offers a vast variety of fresh food. I enjoyed eating here. The employees are always welcoming, pricing is fair and the spot is always well organised.
Food is great. But servers can be very rude and disrespectful at times. My last experience was the worse. I dont think I will be returning.

name: F&H Pizza Mercato
reviews: Great Pizza and Great Prices!

name: Gonzalez’s & Son’s Pizza
reviews: Awesome family owned pizza shop!! Fast and delicious food with right price. Definitely recommend the home made popusas.

name: New Golden House
reviews: Staff is very friendly. Our waiter was awesome. I don't recall his name but he was very friendly. Their food is also really good. I would definitely come back if I'm ever in the area again.

name: Food Bazaar Supermarket
reviews:
Anybody caught the virus after visiting Food Bazaar lately? 

In responses to COVID-19, the market is still allowing too much people inside the store simultaneously. With limited space, it forces people to unknowingly disrespect the 6 feet rule. Have to let more people waiting outside than the checkout line to lower the risk.

Secondly, shoppers were allowed inside the store with no covers on the face. This has to be strictly enforced to lower the threat. 

I felt extremely uncomfortable after the recent visit to the store. Saw a short line outside and thought it might be safe. But caught a surprise after I got inside. 

Please take this more seriously to protect your employees and customers.

This Food Bazaar Supermarket is good on a lot of prices. One of the good things about this supermarket is, it's very large inside. That makes for many choices to choose from. They have many different brands and sizes to choose from. You can compare the difference in prices. I will recommend this supermarket to anyone for all your home shopping needs.
I love their seafood department but their produce sucks!!!! The bell peppers are NEVER fresh without bruises on them....  they need to do better
The store was so clean and organized. It truly caters to just about every demographic. I just went in there for some crackers and orange juice, but it was an incredible store to have stumbled upon.

Pretty much everything you need in a supermarket. Best supermarket for miles so most days it's packed with business. If you don't mind waiting on line.  The fresh produce, meats, seafood, deli & a variety of other goods makes it all worth it.

name: Los Angeles Bakery
reviews: So disappointed... they have new owners. Idk what happened, it's not the same. I ordered tacos... what in the world did they give me????? That did not look  like a taco or tasted like a taco. It was eatable.

First and foremost don't come here for a quiet night out or a quaint brunch. The atmosphere is electric and loud and the vibe is amped.

Staff is always friendly and eager to assist in anyway they can.

Brunch is top notch.
Long time establishment that still delivers value and quality. And the service is friendly and heloful.
Bread was okay, wife bought some pastries and it was gross. Overall Good service and nice people but I do not recommend the food. Do not waste your money.
Nice selection of baked goods. Good prices. Great service. Some cakes are already made to buy 4 that last min surprise😁

name: WestWay Bagel
reviews: Great place for a quick bite plus quality food and selection!
Good food. Good staff. We came as soon as it opened so we got the star treatment. Would come back.
Love this place. The sweetest workers give great customer service and food is great too.

I went on the recommendation of these Google reviews.  I was disappointed.  I had the breakfast special if eggs and potatoes with bacon.  It was passable.  This isn't a bagel shop, it's more like a bodega that serves food off the grill and bagels.  The place has no character.
It has great service delicious bagels

name: Bushwick Grind
reviews: Stopped in to grab an iced mocha and stayed for a amazing grilled chicken pesto on sourdough. Food was great, but the welcoming atmosphere was what really puts this place above and beyond. Definitely found my coffee haunt in the neighborhood.

Awesome vibe. Very friendly kind faster. She was perfect. For sure nice foods.
I'll definitely visit again

The breakfast tacos were absolutely amazing! The service was super quick and the servers were so kind and helpful. I’ll definitely be coming back and looking forward to trying more things on the menu.

This is a great little place. It is smaller, with not a lot of seating. The quality of coffee is good! When I went there was three different type of fruity, citrus based coffee roasts. I tried the Boka roast (vanilla, pear and stone fruit) and Idido (floral, melon, citrus). I did the Idido as an Americano which was a great decision. I love darker roasts of coffee so I enjoyed that more. I wish they would have had a variety of roasts available. I tried the blueberry muffin and that was awesome, great flavor!!
The prices were awesome. The employees were super friendly! I would recommend this place!
Excellent customer service, delicious food, and wonderful vibes. You will absolutely love it here.

name: Rise Radio
reviews: Super cool staff. Great owners-they really care about people having a good experience. Cocktails are 🔥
The best espresso and service served in a very pleasant atmospere

I am so happy this cafe opened in my neighborhood. I love the decoration, a beautiful 80s vibe that makes you feel so comfortable, it has a nice backyard. I've been there only once for a coffee and I loved it immediately, I want to come back for pop up events, concerts and food. I hope more places like this will open in this neighborhood.

Great place to chill. Plus, good music (I've also DJed there; fun experience). 

Alfred and the staff are friendly and hard-working. The overall design is cool (the restroom with the giant mirror will definitely mess with your brain for a second) and the tea is pretty good. I hope this place is here to stay.
A beautifully designed space with incredible vibes. The food and drinks are excellent. I can’t wait to come back with friends. 10/10 would recommend.

name: The Bagelnaitor Cafe
reviews: Love the place.  New owner and renovation.  If you  want a fresh hand rolled bagel and not factory based food. This is the place to be.
Love the name of the store. The  Best bagels In the area. The costumer service is very friendly and professional.
These Bagels!! Best new spot in town 😍
The best bagels around.

name: J.K. & Sons
reviews:
Great breakfast place. Flavorful omelettes at reasonable prices. 
Quick attentive service. Friendly and courteous staff.

So I go there sometimes for me and my mother. And the food is cool my mom loves there Brisket but that’s not my only reason there is a man and lady that work there that are real nice and the woman that serve me when I go there she knows my order and mothers order real well. So I thank them so much for knowing and yea she and I will go again. As matter fact my mom will be calling for here order in a second lol
Foodnwas delicious. Service was amazing and the waiter was attentive even in their busy resturant. I will recommend this place to everybody.
Place is clean ..food is good the welcome u and make u feel comfortable there's lots of energy in the Restaurant, they make sure is your are OK

Food was gross. The homemade chicken soup was some sort of spaghetti with a thick broth from a can. The burger had no flavor and was soggy, some sort of rubbery frozen patty. The fries weren’t even cooked. Honestly this was terrible and I’d never get food from here again.

name: Milly's
reviews: This is where I had my first authentic New York Style Pizza experience. Casual place with limited seating. The pizza blew me away but again I don't have much else to compare to in the area.
Pizza is good not great 8/10. Service is good.  Kids truly enjoyed it.
Me and my mom, brother, nephew go there every Sunday  really nice people and good  service Pizza is amazing.
Awesome 👍 awesome customer service 👍 plus great Variety of slices
My daughter eats here almost every day and everyone is so sweet

name: El Nuevo Yauco
reviews:
I was told they have affordable and delicious lunch. After moving into this area, I always want to explore what buskwick has to offer beside the super hip and modern places. This is one of those. 

The place is tiny but definitely old school. With a bar table for 3 maximum and a few table in the back, I suggest you take your lunch to go. The menu is limited and always order want is popular to guarantee freshness and deliciousness.

The guy in front of me order a plate of chicken on rice and add some tomato to the list. I was drawn to that roasted chicken the moment we met. The decision is one of the best ones that day. The chicken is super juicy and well done. Meat falls off easily and add some hot sauce if you like. Rice is a bit too dry therefore ask for beans. Total is $6 cash and stop by next door deli for a drink.
Good food, good prices the owners are great people
Staff are the best, more like family
Awesome food all day long
This place is so cool. Very NICE. Food is good and reasonable.😊

name: Chipotle Mexican Grill
reviews: Chipotle is good but this place gets 5 stars because the service is amazing. Staff are friendly and accommodating. Best chipotle I've been to.

Always love this location as it is right under Flushing station. Staffs are friendly as usual. Food is always fresh and tasty. I recommend trying their queso if you have not. And there’s a  Starbucks right next door! All in all great location

This location didn’t deliver the order that I paid for. Then the only solution they could offer me was to order it again. The GM, Ash, is a nice lady but has no idea how to solve problems when her store messes up.

Thank You Lord Jesus for another day.

I know many can't wait for this to open just be patient they want to make sure they have all the staff, food etc. I will review once I go in and eat some good Mexican grill.

God Bless
Came here for my birthday on december 8th and it was amazing for my taste buds really great

name: Broadway Organic Deli & Grill
reviews: Large menu, good food, and fast service. They just delivered in under 30 minutes despite being really busy at noon, and they got everything right. Also great offerings as a corner grocer. This is my go-to spot.
Well staffed with nice people, large selection of the essentials including organic and eco-friendly. They have pizza and a grill, salad bar, smoothies and dessert

I got the Combo Lamb and Chicken Platter..,and small fries. I give the place 9☆'s.    The food was warm / hot when I recieved it, which was GREAT...,  and the order was accurate as to how I ordered it.  The delivery time could have been better, verses the estimated time of delivery. YES,  I'll definitely order from this place again.

This was our favorite deli on our trip. Their smoothies were delicious and fresh. Sandwiches are sooooo good and they are so friendly! They are open late until 3am which is awesome. Not sure why this place doesnt have a full 5 star rating because it is the best

Super burgers and super clean, recommend.
But, sometimes I wait my burger 10 minutes, and didn’t have ingredients.

name: A+ Express
reviews: There was a roach in my order like are we for reals ppl. Never again. Never

Cheap ($8 combo with entree/fried rice/egg roll) and huge portions, fed me for 3 days. Ordered the sesame chicken spicy, your average chinese take out quality, will probably ask them to make it less sweet next time. 

Ordered a party platter of beef chow fun another time for ~$40. Service was pretty good, they were helpful in trying to make sure we had all the sauces/utensils we needed.
Great food, very kind staff members, consistently  awesome vibes. They charge fair rates and the food quality is great. Keep it up.

I got the vegetable fried rice (ordered fresh) and the steamed broccoli 🥦 and string beans that were tossed in a very light sauce. The veggies were crunchy and the rice was nicely prepared. I enjoyed my meal 👌!
Their food is good and the price is right.

name: All About Indian Food
reviews: We met with friends at this spot for dinner. my friend recommended this spot.  Well, it was very successful. The crew welcomed us with a smile and we felt excellent. The meal was great. We loved this spot a lot and we shall definitely come back again. We recommend this place to all.

I have eaten at this place a few times now. I have to say that the food is absolutely amazing. They also have very speedy turn around. It only takes about 5-10 mins from order time to the table which is fast. They have an amazing dinner deal here 20 for a full dinner. I always get the Fried Bananas, Chicken Curry and they give you rice pudding and also the Nan is Beautiful. They also offer take out on Uber. The staff is friendly. The only thing is there are tons of guys waiting in the front of the restaurant that are waiting to take delivery. If they could please try to keep the conversation to a minimum or wait in the Kitchen. Great place.

We met with friends at this spot for lunch. my friend recommended this restaurant.  Well, we were not disappointed. The staff members welcomed us with a smile and we felt excellent. The meal was delicious. We had a great time and we shall absolutely come back again. Recommended.

I told my friends about this restaurant with my warmest recommendations. I visit this place often. I get very good feedback from my friends. The dishes they serve are fantastic and the stuff is efficient and cooperative. always when we visit this place we pass a lovely time.  I warmly recommend this restaurant.
Food and environment are mediocre, but does the job. Good for late night take out, not a fancy date night out.

name: Asian Yummy House
reviews: I actually loved their dishes and service, great location very close to my house. The employees are always very kind. Highly recommended.
The food is not bad but the look of the place could be better to be honest. The cleanliness of a business establishment says a lot about a place!
Food is good
Great foods, and excellent friendly staffs.The Boneless chicken w. garlic sauce is delicious
The food is good, they just need to be a lil more generous with the boneless ribs

name: Sanchez Deli and Fruit Store
reviews: This store has alot of mexican variety of food and groceries. I came for the food .Great taste -portions were alot-The service was great very friendly at all times ! It can be a little small store but other than that it was great.
Amazing service the food is also amazing I love that it’s a family own business if I could I would eat here everyday

Great authentic Mexican food. Most of what they use is homemade including the tortillas. They also have a full selection of Mexican products and they also have a nice selection of fresh produce. A great place to stop when you're in the neighborhood.
Food always prepared fresh and to your liking. Delicious, fast and affordable food. Warm staff members. Love this store
Love the food and the people that work there. I really recommend this place

name: Mi Barrio Tortilleria Corporation
reviews: I've been experimenting with all new ffod and drinks. This is a good place for new food.
Great costumer service 👍
Good for wash trucks and coffee sips
Great customer service.great tortilla.
Good

name: La Placita Puebla
reviews: Great authentic Mexican food. I got more than I could eat and all for a fair price. Would definitely recommend and come back to again.
Local spot. Food was good and edible. Great for a quick bite or on the run
Delicious, fresh, authentic, well priced. I felt the food was great given that it's a local taqueria where meals are under 10 dollars.
Great place to get authentic Mexican food.  Reasonable prices, however, they don't accept cards. Only cash is accepted.

Best soup in bushwick.
EXCELLENT FOOD....
spanish food heaven..

name: Peking Kitchen
address: 25 Marcus Garvey Blvd, Brooklyn, NY 11206, USA
reviews: Good food great flavor.

I would go there before i started having problems with cholesterol but when I ate there I enjoyed their food when you told them some specific ingredients they always follow through small place but good food
I ordered a pt shrimp and broccoli but i received a childs portion i wanted to ask how big is the quart....6.50 too much
Good food
good wings

name: Gentle Perch
reviews: Came here with a bunch of friends. Vibe is cool. Menu is small. Games available. Good atmosphere but the food was just pretty good. Missing the edge to get 5 stars. Final verdict is I would go back and maybe they’ll change my mind for a future review.

Wow what a GEM in BK! An amazing interpretation of Korean cuisine. While retaining traditional aspects. Everything from the food, drinks, and service was amazing. I loved the decor too, i think it really suits BK. Can't wait to go back!

Overpriced drinks for what they are. They were out of almost everything on the menu—I would suggest not switching over to a new menu until you’re actually equipped to do so. I asked the waitress for a cup and she gave me a dirty glass. Food was fine, but nothing revelatory. I definitely won’t waste my money here again. Very disappointed.

I had their kimchi stew and truthfully I wasn't expecting much because I've had a lot of Korean stews. However this restaurant put their own twist to this stew that gave an explosion of flavor. I definitely recommend coming here for a too notch Korean stew. The side dish was a potato pancake, also very delicious!
The pork was okay but a bit too salty.  The rice and veggies were good.  The service we excellent and quite attentive.  The portions were too small and I was hungry just an hour later.

name: Guadalupana Bakery
reviews: We love the flavors from our sweet breads 😍! It's all affordable. Even the Mexican coke comes with a great price tag. I recommend coming here for desert, breakfast and snacking. There's different kinds of sweets for the whole family and other essentials such as tortillas, abuelitas and candies! I enjoyed all I had. No flavor or texture was overwhelming and the bread was fresh and fluffy.
The best Mexican bread I’ve had in the US. Freshly made every time!

Now this a business that deserves to be here a true nyc business for Latinos who lived here for many years. I can’t express how the neighborhood is changing for the worst with all the hipsters trying to kick out the people from here.
What a fun bakery. We came home with an assortment of Mexican pastries. Super friendly and helpful staff.
Great place to buy authentic mexican bread.

name: Bravo Supermarkets
reviews:
Some of the products are expencier than other supermarkets in the area. The meat and chicken are never fresh and on summer there are to many flies in the butcher section. Some of the produce are old and over priced. the sanitary condition of the cold cuts you order depends on the worker taking care of your order. I'm simply skeptical I don't trust them so I never buy from the deli department anyway. 
At times the music is too loud on the aisles. Once you are deep inside the store and away from the windows if you need to make a phone call, You cannot receive or make phone calls like you normally do in other supermarkets. There's no free Wi-Fi either. most of the time the isles are full of boxes and is very difficult for two chopping cars to be side by side. Sometimes the isles you can smell dead rats and their solution to the problem is one cat. Four stars for the workers they are nice though and the manager Eddie he's a very nice person. Very pleasant to deal with and he's always eager to help the customers  as much as he can.
We were installing the windows graphics to them and they are so respectfully.... nice and clean supermarket!
New management, great prices & renovations. Love shopping at this location
Excellent
Listen, somehow they always have the best deals on eggs, like a jumbo egg 5 for $5 at times.

name: Sigmund's Pretzels
reviews: Best soft pretzel in NYC

name: Starbucks
reviews:
Amazing staff, amazing place, best community Starbucks. The staff at the hospital across the street, (including myself as an RN) live and rely on this place! Very few coffee spots or quick bite spots around the hospital, and this community Starbucks is is a much needed Safe Haven to take a 10 minute break during an arduous day in the medical field. Thank you Community Starbucks! 
Special shout out to the district manager, today he went above and beyond for me. Today a colleague of mine had an death in the family and was really having a horrific morning..... I ran across the street to get her a tea and croissant. Unfortunately this Starbucks was having plumbing issues and were not fully back online and functioning. Regardless, the district manager came out, profusely apologized, and explained they are almost open. I told him the situation and he got me the tea and croissant regardless of the plumbing issues! Thank you so much! You made my day and made my colleagues day! #PayItForward
A very pleasant and spacious Starbucks. With separate rooms. Good service and Friendly staff.
Love the place... love the staff!!!

This is a very dirty, crowded, noisy, heavily worn Starbucks with a great view of some of the grimier parts of Woodhull Hospital. The service is perfectly fine, and honestly it's probably one of the better options in the immediate vicinity, but if you can get on the subway and go someplace else that'd be my suggestion.

A Starbucks in this part of town is a welcome addition. Honestly, I was worried that this Starbucks would not feel as nice as others because of the neighborhood does not get the service it deserves (worlds worst post office), understaffed bank of America, etc. I was pleasantly surprised. There is plenty of seating including communal tables, bar heigh tables, and lounge chairs. Most impressive is the private room for meetings. As per usual, the bathrooms here are clean.

name: Broadway Bagel & More
reviews: So good I ordered a bagel and coffee through uber eats and my order arrived just as I specified. The flavored cream cheese was very tasty, the bagel was not burned and the size was perfect worth the prices.
Great prices, great selection, and great staff. I'll definitely be coming back!
Good deli and grocery. Great choice, quick service.
Delicious food, amazing prices, most lovely staff! So grateful for this new gem in the neighborhood
Ordered 2 plain bagels w/scallion cream cheese and bacon through Uber Eats. Broadway Bagels followed our instructions to the teeth and the food exceeded expectations. Would strongly recommend.
One of my favorite places to get brunch near my house! All the servers are so nice and I always feel relaxed here. The food is always top notch, I usually order the Sea Benedict.

Service must only be good in person. The person over the phone was not welcoming and lacked customer service. I placed an order on grub hub, order got delayed and it arrived 30 mins after the delayed time. And yes the food did arrive COLD. Not worth the price for the experience.

The place is super nice vibes wise and the location is sweet.
I was there for the three second time this week, and I have to admit that I'm not a big fan….
The food was not more than just ok and you felt it was overpriced for what it is. 
The service was good, but I couldn't avoid the feeling the server was tired.
Not sure if a 3rd time will happen.

I can only speak for the chicken club, but in the last several months, late 2019? They've switched to a frozen chicken breast that's always guaranteed to be extra chewy and bland.
Last club to be delivered: after several missed chances by them, didn't even have toasted bread, so it all came soggy. Going to take a break from here for a long while.. Learning how to cook them on my own!

  Best of luck to 983 but they've lost a repeat customer.

I had brunch here. While the food was great. - I had the chicken burger and a mimosa, I was really drawn in by the service. The bartenders, hosts, and table staff were all so welcoming. I will definitely be back for more food and drinks when in the neighborhood.

name: Blanca
reviews: That was unbelievable experience! Food was amazing. Every dish was so tasty. It's a very small restaurant with 12 table, service is great. Open kitchen concept, chief is right there making sure every dish is looks the way he wants. I love Michelin restaurants and I really think deserves one more star and hopefully he will get it soon. Highly recommended.

Fantastic experience. Friendly, warm, welcoming staff.  Great service that didn’t feel too stuffy for a fine dining restaurant.  Great variety of food with unique, well thought out flavor combinations.... 20 courses.  Fun music selections with the record player spinning in the background.

Hands down my favorite restaurant in the world. 

The quality of food and service grossly out weighs any other restaurant of this caliber. Much more relaxed in dress and feel, all while maintaining white cloth grade attentions. A constant variety of music pulls you on a journey while the always changing menu of divine food enlightens the soul. Main stay dishes come in many variables throughout the year, making a monthly visit all the more worth it. 

Laughter and happiness is sure to ensue in this Brooklyn staple.
Everything was pretty solid. Honestly. the bread with butter half way through really stands out which is same bread they make their pizza with. for the price I expected more. more pasta portion =)

Only 12 seats in this place to eat. You have to wait forever to get a reservation.  Then it's super expensive to eat there. Save your time and money and eat at little Italy in the Bronx.  A large variety of restaurants in a family owned enclave. And reasonable prices.

name: Momo Sushi Shack
reviews: I have been coming here for the past seven years and I can honestly say it’s still one of my favorite restaurants in  Brooklyn. The sushi is always fresh, customer service is always through the roof, and the lunch special prices is always worth it. If you’re in the neighborhood do not miss this place
Great food, kind employees, consistently fantastic vibes. They charge convenient prices and the food quality is excellent. Kudos.
Love the decor, food is top notch and creative

We visited here as part of an organised vegan tour of Brooklyn. Momo was amazing. We had a selection of vegan sushi and dumplings and they were soooo tasty! Service was fantastic with the waiter singing about each plate of food as he put it down on our table.  Was one of the highlights of the tour.
I regularly come by getting some food in this spot. I like the swift service and well made food. Kudos.

name: Taqueria El Fogon 2
reviews: I was in the area and decided to stop in for lunch I Had the street tacos they were so good! Chicken was tender,juicy, & seasoned to perfection. The salsas were really fresh and delicious as well. Service was great they made sure I was happy and had everything I need. Prices are very affordable, I recommend people to try them out!

Tried this place for the first time. I had the fried whole porgy n it was perfectly cooked n delicious. There was n issue with the delivery service but not the fault of the restaurant. There’s another spot closer to me that I usually get this dish from but I think that may be done at this point lol. I’ll try both places again n if the difference is still so monumental...I’ll have to call it. The first pic has a forkful already eaten lol sorry. The second pic shows the perfection n the last pic gives u n idea if I liked it or not. def try this place bc it’s fantastic!!!

This is a great place to eat! Love the food and the price is just right. I've had enchiladas and a chicken dish which was awesome. Try the horchata you won't regret it! The food may take a bit longer to cook depending on the day or if it's crowded.
When we arrived the place was empty and stayed empty for the entire time we were here but that wasn’t a problem. The food was well priced and tasted great! The staff was attentive and friendly.
The tacos were amazing, I felt like I was in Mexico

name: Ange Noir Cafe
reviews: Great coffee and breakfast options from crepes to eggs and salads. Gotta appreciate the dark gothic ambience - perfect for working or studying. Loved their service staff too. Good spot.
Perfect way to spend a weekend morning. Their breakfast sandwiches and bagels are really affordable. It’s a cool spot to get some work done or meet up with a friend.
Salmon bagel was fresh and tasted great. Very nice food, good vibe, and tasty coffee too. Place seemed a little understaffed as one guy was having to do everything.
It’s the coziest little cafe in the neighborhood. Soooo nice to relax in the couches and read. Music is great, servers are great, coffee is great, food is great. Yeah, it’s great!

Really really bad food and service and just in general rip off. Asked lady about oatmeal and she was trying give me oatmilk. Regular $1 oatmeal that u get in 99 cents store costs 8 and supposed to have apples, nuts, cranberries and stuff on top and made with almond milk.
My order came in the same 99cents store tiny oatmeal cup made with water and heated in microwave and nothing on top no fruits, no nuts, NADA. The lady gave it to me and a coffee - no bag, no spoon, no napkins, no thank you. I got my money back.
Never going back!

name: Koda
reviews: GREAT FOOD AND VIBE ESPECIALLY THURSDAYS ...

Food n Service is excellent. 
Great DJ's n music
Friendly n Fun Crowd
The food is consistently fresh and tasty, staff members hands over great service. I liked the cleanliness and mood. Will come visit again.
One of my go-to places to grab something to eat. awesome location, clean, and awesome customer service. A must try!

Great music though the DJ clearly lacks experience. Food has limited choices, but makes up in portions and flavor.
