The pupusas are made with love fresh to order from the sweetest and kindest person you may ever meet -- they're delicious. Go here.

I’m from Maryland, just outside of DC and it’s an area known for it’s good pupuserias. So when I moved up to New York, I didn’t have a lot of hope for having good pupusas here until I found Alegria’s! I had pupusas revueltas, de queso, and one de frijol and they were all amazing and the prices were great!! Please go check this place out if you are in the area or if you just want really good pupusas :D muchas gracias por todo Alegria’s!!

name: Il bel paese pizzeria & trattoria
reviews: Revisited like I said I would and again the food was outstanding.  Got potatoes and egg hero and it was exactly how I like it.  I also got some spicy calamari it was great, exactly how I like it.  I am a picky eater, but I really enjoyed everything.  While waiting for my order, I could not resist the pepperoni pizza which looked so delicious.  Again it was very good.  The sauce, cheese and pepperoni was so tasty.  Thank you Il bel paese, wishing you much success in your business.
Fantastic food and great prices. Real Italians own and work here! Five stars all around. We will be back!

This is my favorite spot to go to when I'm in the mood for authentic Italian food. Not only do they use fresh ingredients on all their plates but their prices are also amazing. Every single person who works here is extremely nice and welcoming. I literally eat here multiple times a week. If you're in the mood for real, authentic Italian food, I HIGHLY recommend this place!!!

This place instantly became my favorite Italian restaurant in the area. Owner and his employees are so nice. The food tastes fresh and reminds me of my trip to Italy. I really can eat there every day! Brick oven pizza was amazing!

Great addition to the neighborhood. Many different choices of pizza that will not break your bank. The pasta dishes are also very good. You could feel that ingredients are fresh and cooked by professionals. 
We ate here 3 times in 2 weeks and it was consistently - very good!!!

name: Yummy 88
reviews: So good!!! I had the general tso with rice. I know I’m basic 😋
The bean curd with black bean sauce was quite tasty! Scallion pancakes were a bit greasy but I did like the texture. I would go back, in fact i probably will go back tomorrow!😂
Chicken fried rice looked like they boiled unseasoned chicken and threw it on top of brown rice. Chicken was rubbery and soft. Could have just been a bad batch but wasnt good
Clean nice workers and inexpensive
They underserved rice for General tso chicken on a paper plate. That just aint right

name: Millie’s Cuban Café
reviews: The food is AMAZING! The vibe is tropical. Instead of a selfie wall there is a wall that tells the story of the owner's family from their time in Cuba via pictures. You're greeted well and treated like family. Oh....and the mimosas are made with FRESH SQUEEZED OJ. Need I say more? Millie's gets 10 stars from me.

Adorable cafe with hearty Cuban lunch. A good spot for a casual brunch, quick lunch or coffee date. I love the decor and all old photos too! 

I ordered three side dishes- rice, beans and maduros sweet plantains! It was a tasty meal but the beans were WAY too salty and the rice was hard and undercooked.

I’d nonetheless comeback to try more food!

Great Cuban food!!! So fresh and generous portions we ordered the Cubano and the chicken bowl with the sweet plantains on the side and it was plenty of food. I would definitely go again the quality of the food was impressive and delicious.

The spot is cute and quaint. The vibe is very nice. Well kept and well decorated. It is a hot summer day and this place is cool and refreshing. There is one person working the counter and he is very friendly. Short and simple menu with good prices. Free wifi. Homely little place. 

The portions are big! Especially the breakfast bowl.

I was early to a doctor's appointment so I decided to get coffee. I walk into Millie's at 8:50 AM. There was only one employee that I could see, and he was unstacking chairs in the dining area. I said good morning and he said they weren't open yet, kinda like he didn't know what to do. He left the door open while he was setting up the chairs outside on the sidewalk. I was immediately horrified that I barged into a cafe as they were still opening. I apologized profusely and tried to exit, but he stopped me and said it was ok. Since I was only getting iced coffee, he said, it was fine. He also said they were trying to open earlier, anyway, since people kept trying to get coffee early from the cafe. He did not have to take my order, since I was dumb and in the wrong, but he treated me with kindness in a way I haven't experienced customer service in awhile. This happened months ago, in October, and yet, I still remember this fondly and decided to share!

I thought the barista was super kind, very friendly, and also my iced coffee was really tasty! This is a really cute cafe with a lot of positive energy. I would definitely recommend to people, if not for the cafe, but for the delicious food, too!

name: The Skilled Archer
reviews:
I know this spot since the days it was called Coca Grinder. It was great then and it is great now.
What makes the place so wonderful to me is
The service, always friendly and smile (I'm sure it has to do with that sweetheart manager they have).
The food is always tasty and fresh. 
The prices are more than fair.
The crowd is always mixed and good. 
Highly recommended.

This is my go to place for food and coffee since I've moved to Brooklyn. I live a few blocks down and the staff has been absolutely welcoming and so kind every single time I walk in. If coffee wasn't the best part it's probably worth noting that I  sit on the same couch every single time and have a whole routine that is the highlight of my day. I can people watch, chill out, bring dates, eat happily and play on my phone. It's awesome. Vibe is always rad. Playlists are dope.

Love the vibe of this place. A nice cozy cafe in brooklyn offering delicious coffee and they also have some burgers and sandwiches (halal) there which I haven’t tried yet. But overall the cafe’s decor and their coffee will make you feel happy. This can also be your go to place if are looking to find a spot to work, you’ll see people working there on their laptops.

I really want to love this place; the food is fantastic & the space is beautiful but the staff is clueless. Every time I’ve gone there’s always an issue either with the response time, server errors or generally just seems like they don’t listen, forgotten items in orders, long wait times & all this with little to no accountability or apology. I work in the restaurant industry so I’ve tried my best to be patient and understanding when mistakes happen but it’s now clear to me that the FOH staff is ruining what could be a truly 5 star establishment.

I’ve been a regular at this place since it was called Cocoa Grinder. I was really excited to see the change/additions to the menu but disappointed when I finally tried them out. They didn’t take the time to even cut the tomato and the patty itself was ice cold.

name: El Sol De Cholula
reviews: yummy quiet modest spot. cemita con milanesa de pollo was great.
Love this place, best tacos in the area and very affordable.
Love the tacos! Great quick food option in the area!
great for a quick bite. delicious chorizo taco, friendly staff, lots of seating
Good food have been going there for years the lady/owner is not the nicest person but the food is overall good

name: The Wheelhouse
reviews: Cool staff and tasty sandwiches. I recommend the build your own grilled cheese. I will say that the decor is laid back and nice and the drinks are a bit lacking. I had the eggnog and it was very watery but the grilled cheese was amazing! It’s totally worth a try if you’re around and want a solid sandwich!

This place ROCKS. Seriously, maybe the best cubano I’ve ever had. The atmosphere is very inviting and the staff are so nice and friendly. I’m very glad to have happened upon the place and highly recommend any of their sandwiches. I will say the tomato basil soup was a little lackluster, but that probably has more to do with my own preference for saltier soups. I’m sure most wouldn’t have that same thought.

My husband and I LOVE the sandwiches from Wheelhouse. However, whenever we call for pickup we get lots of attitude and recently they just straight up deny taking our order over the phone. I was in the restaurant business for years, and think this isn’t necessarily a reflection on the staff, but the management. There’s never more than one person working, so when they’re busy it’s tough to manually input orders. We order like once a week, maybe even more, and have started to wonder if maybe we’ll just get over your grilled cheese and give our business to more appreciative establishments.
I go here almost every Sunday for the panavia tornado sandwich and the tomato soup. They usually have some decent beers on tap too
The best sourdough sandwich I’ve had in Brooklyn. Crispy, savoury and juicy. I highly recommend if you need a good hearty Sunday meal.

name: Happy Garden
reviews:
It is all you can expect from a Chinese fast food, it is cheap ant not very clean. 
I wish and I could say the food is so good, but it is not.

Good Chinese food most of the time. Last time I went they were very busy, and overcooked on of the meats I ordered. I still will go back since I like the food, I'll just be sure to check the food before I leave.
Affordable Chinese food take away. Generous servings.

I think attitude could be better , also cash only.  "What you want?" is what you hear when you walk in lol, it's chill though. 
Gave me the wrong order...didn't say anything when you say "bye thanks"
General Tsos Chicken and Fried Rice. Exactly the flavor that you expect and delicious fried rice at a great price

name: El Encebollado de Victor
reviews: Good food, very poor service.
The best  restaurant
Solid 3 stars + encebollado is their forté...they never fail. Other items are on the not so tasteful... will return in 6 months to  see if other items improved. Price is just right...

Really good food 

Seafood 

After a good party.  Great ceviche

I didnt enjoy the food or service. I had chicken stew with white rice and beans and the chicken seemed as if it had been heated up because parts of it were cold. They also charged extra for beans so the order came out to 16$. I gave two stars because the place was clean.

name: Fire House Deli & Grill
reviews: I love this place and am here every day!  The owners are so nice and know me and make me feel like I'm at home.  Would highly recommend!

Got some sliced cheese. The owner appeared from behind the counter with greasy hands and asked me with a huge attitude, "What is this?!" I told him it was sliced cheddar and he said $4. I gave him my $5. He just disappeared behind the counter and yelled "Thank you!" without giving me the change! A lot of people around the neighborhood has complained about different problems every time they walk in. The male owner is usually very rude. They do have a good sandwich menu but I'm not going through the trouble to see these people again. There are other better places around the neighborhood.
$25 for a pack of 4 Juul pods?  I don't think so. Not even sure that's legal, but even if it is, go a half block in any direction and get 'em for $20
Great food selection, gyro sandwich was amazing. Very clean and organised with good bodega selection.

name: Cholula Express
reviews: Everyone is always friendly, place is always clean and the food is always delicious. I eat here weekly.

this place is so good :D and the ppl are really nice
muy buen servicio

Un lugar pequeñito y nuevo , la chica que lo atiende es muy amable , la comida se siente fresca y sabrosa , tienen variedad de platos Mexicanos , y aguas frescas hechas al momento , los precios ,
$$, tomando todo en conjunto las bebidas y extras, cantidad de comida lo vale .

name: Nook
address: 45 Irving Ave Unit 1, Brooklyn, NY 11237, USA

name: Mi Bella Cholulita
reviews:
Very nice and clean place. 
The food taste delicious,  one of the best Mexican  restaurants  around.  The staff is amazing.

This place is soooooo delicious and everyone who works there is so sweet and friendly!

I stumbled upon this place while walking around Bushwick one day and I’m so glad I did because the food was so amazing and the meat was so flavourful and perfectly cooked!!!!

My official go-to for amazing tacos hands down!
I came in here looking to use the bathroom and decided to order a chicken taco. The food here was great. Service could have been much better but overall, it was a decent experience.

The restaurant was really clean and the food was fresh and delicious. I had a chicken taco a la texana and the tinga quesadilla and had enough left over for a snack later. The tinga quesadilla was bombbb

This place is absolutely amazing and very reasonably priced. The entire staff is super hospitable and friendly. Definitely been the most authentic and delicious Mexican place I have found in Brooklyn. I recommend the Al pastor.

name: Le Garage
reviews:
A little loud, a little crowded, but it's nice atmosphere inside. You escape the dullness of the Brooklyn streets as soon as you pass the threshold. Servers are nice and the menu is friendly for everyone. If my fiance liked it, you'll like it too. 

As of this second, we have devoured everything on our plates and ordered even more. The portions are perfect and everything tastes spectacular. I highly recommend this place to anyone looking to have a tasty brunch with friends and family. 

10/10

P.S: Waiter didn't ask if our food is good or not, and I seriously like that. He was super polite :)

We'll be back soon.
The place offers a large variety of delicious food. I love eating here. The employees are always super friendly, pricing is affordable and the place is always kept clean.

This is such a gem in Bushwick! My husband and I went here for my birthday and it was low key but very special. The food is spectacular and the service was attentive and caring. I would recommend to anyone looking for authentic french cuisine in a quite setting with creative cocktails.
Your local dinner, food is basic but tasty, service is Ok

I celebrated my birthday yesterday in this great restaurant. I am glad to say that we enjoyed a phenomenal evening and the venue was undoubtedly one of the reasons for the outstanding evening. The team  cooperated in a graceful style, the food was delicious and my buddies were so  cheerful. We shall surely visit again for more joyful events. thanks very much.

name: Maite
reviews: This site is my favorite place.  Of all restaurants I know I love it most. I never miss an opportunity to go to visit this restaurant. Whenever  I I need a delicious meal, this place comes right away to my head. splendid and varied  food and a large menu.trained staff, and nice mood. And very important, the bill is good. I praise this place with pleasure.
Really interesting menu and excellent customer service!

I love this restaurant! They offer marvelous food, they have a rich menu, The chef in that place is a professional, I like very much tasting all their food. The food is consistently of high qualtity, the attitude towards the customers  is helpful. I often go to  this place and I not even once was disappointed. I recommend it with no hesitation.
We had an awesome time in this place. We loved the extraordinary vibes and the food. The staff were very welcoming. I’m glad we finally decided to visit this spot.

Went here last night and it was amazing! Basque and Colombian restaurant. The food changes from time to time so the server suggested that we take a picture of the menu and the drink menu to share with our party of 6 people since we were on the other end of the menu. We decided to order the following from the attached menu picture: (4) empanaditas (1) duck egg (2) Burrata (1) lasagna (1) pork belly (1) gnocchi with truffle (1) shishito peppers and (2) chocolate cakes (12) drinks and tip included, it came out to $407 for $68 per person. All REALLY good in my opinion but everyone loved the empanaditas. The duck egg was okay but our least favorite. Not bad for a Friday night dinner from 9PM - 11PM. Quick service and great environment.

name: Bruce & Armani Gourmet Lounge
reviews: Had a burger and fries last week and the food was AMAZING. This is a must for good food and reasonable drinks with an amazing staff.
Great environment, good food and very good customer service .. shared some time with owners they down to earth , people just need to know about this place , also very good prices for the quality.
Delicious Hispanic food;  Very fresh and of the day.  CONGRATULATIONS.

name: Circo's Pastry Shop
reviews: I needed a cake last minute for my daughters 17th birthday, I placed my order with Suzie. She let me order 5 days before I needed the cake. I told her an idea of what I wanted and she delivered. The cake was made out of kit kat and the inside was Vanilla Custard. Price for cake was decent.

Most delicious, authentically Italian honey balls on the planet! 
Anthony is the best!  He went above and beyond to help me with a special order to arrive today for my mom's birthday. She was extremely surprised, and may have eaten about 50 of them the minute she unwrapped the tray. Thank you Anthony - I'll be recommending Circo's, and ordering from you again and again and again.  :D

The cakes were amazing and they look FABULOUS!!!
The owner has been very kind with me, explaining me took a French class. I wasn't surprised. The cakes looked like the one you can find in France.
I'll get back to your patisserie.
Thank you, it was perfect.

Simply delicious. These beautiful cookies arrive fresh on a lovely cellophane wrapped tray adorned with bow. It’s easy to taste that they are made with the best of flavorings and ingredients. I order them for myself and for family and friends, and we all love them.

I really like and enjoy this bakery. My wife and I got our wedding cake made here and this has been a hit with us ever since. If we happen to be passing by here, it's a must stop for us. We like the cannoli so much that we mostly stop here just for that. That's our reason to stop there and end up picking a lot more pastries/goodies. This place come highly recommend for any special occasion/event. Try it, believe me you would not regret it. Oh yeah, ask for the owner because he one of the nicest people you'll talk too.

name: Panadería Mexico
reviews:
There cheese cake very rich.  My parents liked
It so much. End up going back for more.
Love their pastries here their churros and tres leches are Bomb they also have a bunch of other great stuff as well always go out of my way to come here
Filled doughnut was delicious. Three brands of tortillas to pick from all fresh, and the local Mexican cheeses are also all fresh. Amazing.
I got hurt one day I went in there I asked for one bandaid they didn't want to give me one and there was a first aid kit behind her
Every time I come here and try to give this place a chance it’s always the same bread is stale and dry 🤦🏻‍♀️

name: Gaby's Bakery
reviews: Best tres leches cake in all of Brooklyn. I've never had so many praises from my in laws. Just so authentic it's incredible.
Great bakery to get hispanic pastries and the like.
Cakes are yummmmm!!! Great prices too
Love there cakes 💗💗
My favorite Bakery, tres leches cake & chefs cakes are The Best

name: Pan Rico Ambateño
reviews: Girlfriend and I stopped by this place because the cakes and pastries in the window caught our eye, but then we saw a sign that they had salchipapas....whaaaaat! So we went in and got two orders to go. Total was $10 and the food was phenomenal. We’ll come back soon for the sweets since that’s likely what they’re known for.

name: Knickerbocker Bagel
reviews: Nice oven fresh bagels and bread, the bulls eye eggs are the perfect breakfast. Nice staff, lines can get long but they are still fast. Would go again.

Fantastic! Custom made food to order. Went back a second time and just as good with great service. Parking might be challenging. Corned beef bagel is outstanding. Any of their various cream cheese offerings is fair game.

I have been going here for years and decided to finally share my positive experience today!  I walk in, everyone knows my name and most of the time I don't even have to place my order as they know me. Bagels always fresh and the best tuna which is always fresh
Great little spot, great coffee. I miss just saying "coffee, light and sweet" and having it made right. Lil more salt on the everything bagels please, but no complaints!

Great bagel selection. Breakfast sandwich of your choice goes well with an everything bagel. Pastrami Reuben on a garlic and onion bagel is a home run. A little pricey but the staff was pleasant and my sandwiches were perfect. I will return.

name: Dweebs
reviews: This is such hipster coffee spot in Brooklyn, lovely! Not to mention that breakfast food was good,  the coffee itself, bit to strong for my taste, but still good. Staff was super nice and friendly. I loved it. Did get to go 3 times in my time in Brooklyn NY.

Dweebs has a great overall vibe, with a cute little terrace to enjoy your coffee and meal on. The food and coffee were both tasty. The breakfast burrito wasn't anything to write home about, but I suggest giving the place a visit for the ambience and coffee!
Love this place. I always get their lox toast ingredients put on an everything bagel. And a cold brew please!

Really friendly service.  Got a coffee, some apple cider, and two croissants.  Pastries were fresh and delicious.  Nice limited outdoor seating with pretty autumn flower boxes.  My daughter loved that there was a printer for patrons to use, great place for students.  We will definitely be back!

In addition to coffee, I had the grilled cheese here, and it was amazing! The addition of dill and radishes, as well as the use of crusty bread, made it unique, filling, and not at all greasy and heavy. The atmosphere here is homey, and it was nice to sit out on their little porch space. Overall a great neighborhood spot!

name: EMPIRE NUTRITION HERBALIFE
reviews: Exelente lugar para comer saludable y mui buen servicio

name: Brooklyn Kava
reviews: Nice local Kava place I can walk to. I definitely wish there was more room and seating. You can order outside without having to go in which is a nice option. The drinks are definitely strong and they should be for the steep prices. Think like $10-$15 just for one. A little much but it’s Brooklyn. I kind of wish there were more flavor options but nothing liquid sugar couldn’t fix.
Good product, wish my kratom was a bit sweeter but thats based on personal taste. Cool atmosphere.

We arrived at this restaurant for dinner. my friend recommended this restaurant.  Well, it was very successful. The crew were very polite and we had a great feeling. The meal was fresh and delicious. We enjoyed every moment and we will visit this place again. Warmly recommended.
Great environment.  Great Staff.  Great Kava ❤
I love this place. They’re so nice and the atmosphere is very cool and a lot of locals hang there

name: Lazy Suzy Cafe & Shop
reviews: The best oat latte I’ve ever had. I’ve been relying on it to kick start my day. The staffs are friendly and welcoming. It’s also the perfect space to settle down and get some work done. You gotta check out the interior decor!😍

Lazy Suzy is an awesome spot to work for hours, with tons of seating, outlets, free fast WiFi and a futuristic, clean, open and minimal design. Huge backyard open all the time for taking calls and getting some fresh air. The coffee is solid, but the food offerings could be better. Add food and this would easily be one of the best places to hang out all day in bushwick.

Wide open spaces, decent coffee are what I found at lazy Suzy's. Big open parking lot in the back would be amazing if I had a car.  But as it is the light just pours into the building and makes hanging out or working a truly pleasurable experience.  If you live in the area check it out.

I’m sort of picky when it comes to cafes because I find a lot aren’t very inviting or cozy. I also have bad anxiety sometimes when I go out. I’m really happy this place is super close to my apt. It’s spacious and comfortable. The barista was very friendly and the cappuccino was delicious and (I’m picky with those too especially if I’m spending over $4). This place was worth it! I can’t wait to come back with my computer and hopefully be productive.

Very nice cafe, great coffee and very confortable and spacious with tons of light
. Great to bring your laptop to work or read, its got outputs next to each sitting space!!!

name: Maria Hernandez Park
address: Knickerbocker Ave &, Starr St, Brooklyn, NY 11237, USA
reviews:
We have a 6m baby and are looking for the parks which are suitable for calm walk with a stroller and baby’s sleep. Unfortunately this is not the case. Central area is often full of skaters who make quite loud noise. Trail around is very close to the roads with its horns and sirens. 

Trails’ quality is poor, stroller is shaking heavily which does not help baby sleep at all. Although we live not far from here, we prefer to go to other parks and playgrounds. Maybe when our daughter becomes older we will return here.
Wonderful community park in the heart of Bushwick. Lots of courts for athletics, huge  grass areas to relax, lots of benches and TWO dog parks (for big and little pups).

Easily the best park in Bushwick/Ridgewood- especially if you are looking for a dog park. It's normally crowded in good weather, but it's always a pleasant crowd. Great place to eat some tacos or street food and read a book.
I wasn't there for the park itself but the mobile vet was there. But it was nice to see the dogs there chasing the birds. It was a beautiful park. Nice and clean.
It's a beautiful park always clean and go there to jog .  You can go to walk your dog and enjoy the fresh air

name: Subway
reviews: We like a lot hanging out. Yesterday we came to this delicious place which we didn’t know before. We spent a delightful time there with delicious meal and an efficient stuff and a distinguished  chef. We put this restaurant in our phone list  and we shall no doubt return very soon. We deeply recommend.
Eating at Subway hits a certain spot man. The soda fountain has a lemonade machine next to it which has a good selection.
One of the best customer service,they way they serve awesome..I just love it...and very clean
It is clean and it provides good food.
My order came out wrong, they're rushing everybody to order fast, paid for cookies but  they were not in the bag

name: Calibella Bakery & Piqueteadero
reviews: Great inexpensive food, I'm totally addicted to the corn arepas, to die for!
Colombian food is very good. Very small and very crowded... But other than that the food is great
Always I love this place , is where me and my love enjoyed the moment

I love the sweet breads, all the big loaves with cheese too! This place is a must-go for any low-key quick bites. The empanadas are great too, but this place's baked goods really shine. Viva Colombia!!
nice,place,good,Atencion,every,nice,people,five,days,we,drink,coffee dear

name: McDonald's
reviews: Slow service on a Monday morning but the kicker was when the lady on charge of pickups was just holding up the receipts rather than calling the numbers. I finally looked up and she’s giving me the biggest RBF you’ve ever seen before she just sort of tosses my cup over at me. I’m accustomed to being treated coldly at best by staff as a white man in Brooklyn but she was way out of line.
Has a very kind and respectful service and doesn't take too long to order

Very nice McDonald's!!! It is always clean and always friendly staff working here. The bathroom is nice and clean. Like always I ordered 2 large smoothie and it came out good. Also there is 2 more restrooms on the second floor and a lot of empty tables and seats. Enjoy your McDonald's!!!

Newly remodeled McDonald's, clean and got the order right. I'm writing this review because this McDonald's stands out. My food was hot, fries were fresh and salted just right. Plus they gave me ketchup and sauce for the nuggets without me even saying anything. A nice detail.  Thanks to the crew there and keep up the good work. I'll be back if I'm in the area again.

Breakfast is the bomb and coffee is a plus.. I never have a bad day with employees they are well manner,helpful and friendly.. I have met the boss,the owner of this establishment and he is well aware of how the business runs and what the costumers needs..its clean and lots of room to eat and to brings kids too... You going to enjoy this place.. have a Great time with friends or family..

name: Tony's Pizzeria and Restaurant
reviews: I love this place, seriously. I usually just get slices but this time I ordered a whole vegan pie and garlic knots with marinara. I suppose I mumble too much and was given a cow cheese pie and pepperoni knots but they were so nice and quick to remake my order I didn't care at all. The owner even offered to deliver my order for free but I was in no rush so I waited inside. I was a little sad they forgot the marinara for the knots the second time around and I didn't notice until I got home but whatever, the knots are delicious on their own. Tony's is the all-time best ever. Just look at that perfect pie! I honestly can't think of a time I haven't left this place a happier person. From their massive variety of slices and pies to their ample selection of incredible desserts they have consistently damn good food down pat. No need to go anywhere else for this kind of cuisine. Everyone needs to support them. I'll be back soon!

Amazing slices.
Yes slices are $3+ (including tax)
But definitely worth it. I loveeee their sauce. They also sell slices of cake, cookies and sorbet.
Everything looks delicious.
They don't have any physical menus. Look online, it will show their prices too.

I love this pizza shop. The best in Brooklyn.  Family owned and I have been going here for 20+ years. They have upgraded so much that the prices have gone up substantially but the food is worth it. Considering it is always busy, the personal attention has lessened but they do try to give everyone the feeling of being a special customer. I used to go there as a teen now my grown kids even go there. They have been here forever and the food is hella good. Our favorite is their Lasagnas.

Came here for our first meal off the plane and man were we treated well. The customer service was great and the pizza was delicious - perfect thickness to the crust. I got the vegan buffalo chicken and it was to die for. They said they make almost every version of pizza vegan - so good!

I love this place. The food is so good, we got a cake for my friend’s birthday and it was AMAZING. Like actually amazing. The pastries are fantastic, the pizza is deliciousness in every bite. Also the people who work here are the nicest - they were so attentive and thoughtful. 10/10 would recommend.

name: Sapore Di Italia Restaurant
reviews:
I love this place! This was my first time here and I know I will be coming back. The vibe of the place is chill, warm, and open. Our server, Carlos was so great! 
There is also an All Gender bathroom available with pink walls. 💗
Fast and delicious! If you are craving pasta and are in a hurry this is the perfect place for you!
This restaurant was incredible. Great service, clean space, and delicious pasta. Our server Carlos was especially kind. Would recommend this place to anyone.
Good foods and great service! And it opens until late. We came in after 11pm and the server Carlos welcomed us warmly!
Not sure what the atmosphere is trying to be but the food is authentic and flavorful

name: Sazon Nunez
reviews: The  food tasted real good with plenty of flavor in it. I don't have any bad complaints about it
Basic, fair priced mexican food choices
Great plate we made, I will be back lol good job guys
Nice people but food is not so great.
The food is really good here I haven't try everything yet but I have some favorites already

name: Sal's Pizzeria
reviews: Old school NY pizza. Probably the best slices in bushwick. The Pizza man always makes sure the slices are adequately reheated so that’s a win in my book. There is a slight credit card charge, I would say it’s worth it. Need to take a picture of the slices one of these days.
Friendly staff and great NYC pizza. Love the garlic knots as well.

Was in the area visiting from Virginia and I was very pleased. Friendly guys, quick service, very nice pie! Pie wasn't too thick or thin, just right and the Hawaiian was amazing. My kids and husband were surprised. This place stands by a NYC pizza!!!!

It was great the pizza was amazing my kids tried the spaghetti and they loved it 
The workers are so nice and the place is very clean and so is their bathroom 
I gotta say my kids are gonna go there after school
Great neighborhood pizza shop. All the classics and a decent chicken parm.

name: Cafe at Klom Klorm
reviews: Good food and service

name: Chimu Express
reviews: Hey, seafood the Peruvian way, the only one around, new name but same awesome food, even better attention.

Exceptional food!! Great atmosphere. The owner was there and made us feel like part of the family. Everything we tried on the menu was great the seafood was extra fresh!! Highly recommend this hidden gem.
Chimu is SO good! The staff is friendly and food is delicious. My friend comes here everytime she is in NYC.

Walk by all the time and finally popped in for dinner. Had the steak and chicken combination with the pork fried rice. Oh my god so freaking delicious! The portion was great for the price and everything was so good. The pitcher of chicha morada was refreshing and tied everything together. Looking forward to coming back!

Nice portions of well prepared and tasty food.  Restaurant ambience (as opposed to trying to cram in a South American experience).  Could easily take a date here, or a small family.  I had several appetizers as opposed to a main meal, washed down by a sangria.  Was more than pleased with a blackened blood sausage, a rarity that most people shy away from; absolutely delicious.  Would love to return here to try the entire menu, but am based too far away in Jersey City.

name: Dunkin'
reviews: Another stop on my endless regional Dunkin' Campaign Tour Review 2020.
Line is long but worth the wait
I love dunkin donut because its taste fresh
Gave me an iced latte that was mostly milk. I was forced to pay for an extra shot of espresso. There are too many options out there for this nonsense.
Decent place very clean nice staff

name: Lee Garden
reviews: The star of their menu is the black pepper chicken. Everything else I would say is slightly above average for similar spots nearby. I find the staff to be really nice if you can chip away at their hardened exterior. They deal with countless jerks all day long, give them a break.
This is not the the most beatiful place, but the food is wonderful taste and fresh!
I like this place but when the door is so close to the seating area ppl outside like to smoke cigarettes and for a person like myself that has chronic asthma is very bad, especially when you eating.
Never disappointed good food
If u don’t have enough money n u want to finish paying with pennies they get mad.  Like if the pennies r not money

name: Blue Collar
reviews: Probably the best burger I ate in my whole life. I can honestly die in peace.

The single cheeseburger is perfect in every way! Definitely double up if you're hungry. Tbh didn't love the chicken tender sandwich, but the bun and sauce were delicious. The fries were particularly great.
Can't get enough. Burgers and hot dogs on point
It is exactly what it claims to be: straightforward burgers, fries and milkshakes. Late hours are nice, dine-in area available.
Clean, quite and good hide a way lunch or dinner spot. Great veggie burgers & floats

name: Mulata grill - Peruvian
reviews: The hosting, service, food and atmosphere were fantastic. It was so warm and inviting.  There is not one bad thing I can say about this place. I brought my mom and other family members to celebrate her birthday and all 7 of us left satisfied. I'm definitely dining here again and I highly recommend it to others

Food was beyond amazing and definately worth the wait. We had a table of 16 people. The tables were set up on time  and my family and friends cannot stop mentioning how good the food was. 

The atmosphere was relaxing. I will definatley be back another time.

The food is excellent the owners and the service are amazing. I go back very often with my friends. I have to admit the regular sangria needs much work. Was not a fan. However the Owner had me try the white Sangria. OMG it was out of this world. If this is your first time trying the food the Jalea is the way to go and the Tres Leche had me dreaming about coming back.
Mulata Grill former Chimu Express it’s a Peruvian/Grill fusión restaurant on Bushwick/Ridgewood Brooklyn that offers Peruvian 🇵🇪 dishes and grill chicken and ribs
One of the best ceviche in NYC!!! Love it sooo much!!!

name: New Santa Ana
reviews: Nice atmosphere, the food was delicious. We had the Super Nachos and chicken quesadilla. Love the drawing of the woman with the rifle.
This is the worst place. I came in and ordered one burrito I received my order an hour later. The food isn’t even that great. Worst customer service.
The foood are awesome
The food is absolutely amazing, the only downfall is in winter it's uncomfortable to eat due to lack of heat.
Really good tacos Al pastor 😀

name: Sol De Quito
reviews: Great place to eat if you like Hispanic foods, not too pricey. Great bang for the buck. Nonchalant atmosphere, good host, quiet during the weekdays. Best time to visit. Yes they accept cash and cards and there is a rest room.

My first time here and I define will come back.  Their $8 lunch 🍴 special was not only yummy 😋 but plentiful.  I had a seafood soup 🍜 followed by pork chops with rice and beans, and a glass 🥃 of lemonade.  All very satisfying.

Food had no flavor, the steak was not only rubbery, hard with no flavor/seasoning, and it was drenched in watery sauce, and the small amount of fries were oily and stale. Very disappointed not wasting my 30.00 bucks here again.
The food was great. I think they should add more food to the menu
Stopped here a good bit for takeout.  It's just at the park and also a nice place to sit and eat.

name: Taqueria Santa Fe
reviews:
Juan Pablo was wonderful. We had a sit in front of him, at the bar. We were amazed of how fast and absolutely delicious the food was.  He recommend some tacos and oh boy I need more!!! 
I will 100% come back here.

Cool place. The staff are chill. The tacos were tasty we got three types. The al pastor was spot on so tasty and the pineapple was perfect with it. The steak taco was good to but definitely needed to add both their house salsas to kick up the flavor and taste but still good. Last we got the chorizo... it was so yum. Tasted super authentic and the spice was perfect. Definitely can’t wait to go back and try again!

My partner and I ordered a burrito, nachos and tacos from Taqueria Santa Fe. After working all day in the field I was excited for delivery considering the stressful day I had during this stressful time. When it arrived the food was cold, the taco shells though supposedly soft were hard, and the nachos had only toppings and a mere 3 tortilla chips. The nachos came in a portion that was an afterthought. I have ordered here before and had a similar experience. Im sorry I never review but I had to. This was another disappointment.
Carnitas tacos are essential, especially with the guacamole sauce. The flavor is off the charts. I eat them at least once a week. Everything else is also delicious.

They were nice but that's all that was good about the place. 25 for some nachos, and fajitas. The problem was I had no shells with my fajitas or chips able to hold the steak. This grilled steak they serve was nothing but fat. I could go on but there are plenty of better places around. 1 and done for me

name: Abe's Pagoda Bar
reviews: Great drinks, great space with two coin-operated pool tables in the back room. Been here when its crowded and not so, try to aim to come here on off-nights so you can really move around. Otherwise, it gets jam packed. Love this spot regardless.
Great atmosphere amazing and delicious food great tasting cocktails ! This place has it all !!
What an amazing eclectic place here in Bushwick. Pool in the back, tiki in the front. What a fun place.

The place just open on Monday April 22.  Absolutely beautiful and sexy decor. Two pool tables and some arcades in the back. 
   More detailed review will come after the full menu is up and running & all the kinks of opening have been worked out.

This is a really fun spot with way better food and drinks than you would expect. Loved the crowd on Friday night, could see it might get too crowded at times but my first visit was spot-on, will definitely be coming back!

name: Inca Chicken
reviews:
The store didn't look too amazing, but there is always a crowd here, which is honestly a good sign! You cannot get picky all small stuff, when you visit Costa Rica, the setup is exactly the same... So their layout is okay.

I had a delicious chicken plater with veggies and fried plantain. It was really tasty and fresh. The guys who work here are friendly as well, delivering great customer service. This includes a warm inviting place to eat. Next time I visit, I want to see how breakfast is like. Looking forward to it.

FYI: There is a guy that looks Asian, he actually Peruvian... Do not assume it!
Great place for a pick up and get it to-go type meal. The chicken is moist and the green sauce is really good. I usually get a quarter chicken with the salad and mashed potatoes.
Good good, not always consistent, staff is okay when they want to be. They need to change up the options and drop the price on the ribs or offer a lunch special with it
Food looks good but it's not that tasty, but I like the fact they have choices for the side dishes
Get that green sauce.  Been here for like 30 years.

name: Taqueria Al Pastor
reviews: It’s too bad.. they almost got it right because the food and service are AMAZING.. but the prices are high and portions small for the area :-/ if they fix these I think they could do really well and people would go back. Maybe offer specials?! 🤷‍♂️

Wow, 
Probably the best tacos I ever had. The prices are fair and affordable so you don't have to think twice before ordering another one. 
I thought that the place looks beautiful and fit the food.
100% worth going all the way there, even if you don't live in the neighborhood.
The best tacos al pastor in NYC. Go and try it! The salsas are amazing!! It's a little piece of Mexico in Brooklyn! 🥰

Stumbled into this new spot in the neighborhood and WOW! The tacos here melt in your mouth with a blast of flavor and spice. Don’t think twice and come here!

Extra bonus is the loud traditional music 👌🏾
Awesome authentic food. Dare I say better than my mother’s. I notice reviews take points for not having enough vegetarian dishes... smh.umm.

name: Las Lunitas
reviews: I wish the place was bigger! Prices are very nice. Food is delicious, plates are big. Nice range of beverages and cocktails. Always feels like at home.
Great local spot for food to bad they closed down... the new taco spot is good.
Authentic.a.f.  this place does not disappoint.  Ill take one of everything..please
Great food and chill vibes. Staff and owner very friendly and caring.

The food is great and the atmosphere is really laid back.. I came in by myself and the waiter greeted me with a handshake and was super friendly. I had a Caesar wrap with fries which was tasty. It wasn't crowded but the service was a bit slow... It's ok though... I came here to kick back and have a meal.

name: Gyro
reviews: Small underated food truck. Deserves more attention!
best falafel around
I love their food

name: BK Taco Factory
reviews: 4.5 stars! One of the better Mexican restaurants that I’ve been to by far. The beef taco was great I also had a chorizo taco which had a hint of sweetness, not bad but different. The corn is also really great. It’s hard to find good Mexican food in Brooklyn. Glad I came across this place.
Super friendly staff, the pricing is fair and the food is very good! So far we tried some of their tacos and burritos, and it’s delicious!
One of the best tacos I've had in my life. Staff were super sweet too. Definitely a hidden charm. I hope they get bigger!
amazing tacos! great meat:taco ratio especially with the chicken tacos. meat is cooked really well, great textures. 10/10!!!!
Absolutely delicious!! We had a great server and each plate was a stand-out! The guacamole was superb, fresh and perfectly seasoned!!

name: Crown Fried Chicken
reviews: Customer service is very good. The older man at the front was very nice and patient when taking my time to order. I've been here several times at night and the food always satisfies me. The main appeal here is chicken and fries. Fries always crispy and chicken always crunchy and juicy. I wouldn't recommend delivery from here the food loses its freshness as it takes a while to be delivered. EAT ON LOCATION!!
Fries were horrible! Super dry and not salted at all. Mozzarella sticks were ok.
It's pretty good. Service was good. Food is just okay. More of a drunk food place rather than one I'd be craving to go back to sober, and open pretty late. No colonels here, but it's decent.

Enjoy the chicken and 🍔 and
 shrimp

Chicken here is banging and great value for money. It's good for your soul and your brain. I guessed the weight of a sugar cube exactly (which is 3 grams) and then how many are in a grape soda (16 cubes). Bossman gets orders boxed up pronto and in a friendly manner. Best late night spot after a bottle of tequila.

name: La Abuelita Deli
reviews: If your ever in a bushwick stop by and get a Torta! A true mom and pop shop, the grandparents are adorable (:

If you're looking for the most authentic Mexican food then this is the place to be! No need for recommendations because no matter what you order you know you'll be getting quality food. The best part is knowing that all specialty dishes are all made with the "abuelita's" recipes which have been passed down for generations so you know you'll always be eating the most authentic food. This is definitely a must go to if you're looking for the best Mexican food in Bushwick! You won't be disappointed!

Is the best food in the world always fresh and tasty the family who work there is very nice and kind and attentive service the place is clean the prices are not expensive and they serving bigger proportion
Menu is reliable and dynamic, the quality consistent, and the atmosphere healthy and welcoming.
It’s clean, the food is beyond good and it’s a family oriented atmosphere ! Def recommend for a quick authentic Mexican meal!

name: Ops
reviews: Very very very good. Can't give it a 5 because at the end of the day, it's not roberta's or a handful of others, but 100000% worth going. I did the margarita with pepperoni. The dough is PHENOMENAL. The pepperoni was great, but they should have put more on it. For $20 it need more pepperoni. But still a great pizza! Nice staff too. They are awesome.

The best pizza I’ve had since years!! Will
come back and come back and come back!! Fresh ingredients make the magic to the flavor and extremely nice service brings the comfort and casual atmosphere. Great wine selection and always option to taste before you decide for the perfect pairings. Delicious!!
Very strong pies. Mostly Neapolitan, but there's a vaguely Detroit style square pie that I quite enjoyed. Crust is soft and delicious, and the toppings are quite tasty. Also, excellent service.

Pizzas were delicious. My only complaint with them was that the mushrooms were pickled. I'd rather have fresh mushrooms on my pizza, but that's an opinion. 

My biggest complaint is the drinks. We got two of the specials from the menu. We had to close our eyes and comfort each other while we tried to swallow the juices of hell one by one. A logical person would send it back, but we thought it's some long lost karma coming to get us. 

But they use metal straws, so kudos for that.

The pizza crust is light and airy and just the tiniest bit tangy. The toppings on the pizza were fresh and delicious and a perfect combo of flavors. And pizza aside - the salad and dessert were also total delights. Try the house salad and whatever dessert is on for the day. The flourless chocolate cake was amazing. The place has a cute reclaimed look and a great vibe, plus wonderful service and a no-tipping policy. Definitely one of New York’s top pizza spots.

name: Klom Klorm
reviews: Delicious and authentic Thai dishes. The staff is friendly and attentive. Sangria is good. The garlic and the larb wings are both delicious. The crispy pork is the best. For a sweet treat, make sure to visit the Cafe on the side of the building for coffees, tea, delicious desserts, and even a bite to eat.

🚫🚫🚫🚫🚫🚫🚫🚫
*****Tuesday ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
Thursday 😕⭐⭐ disappointed 
Friday 🚫

My first impression and my last impression differs.

Maybe I ate to much from this establishment to soon

My meal was awesome.
It was hot!
It was spicy!
It was delicious.
It was so good I did a happy dance.
It was so good the spices in the  rice cleared my sinus right away.
It was so good. I did not put my chopsticks down to take better photos of my meal.
My only con was the status of the lime. It was a bit on the brown side.
We did takeout today.
I was not excepting what I just experienced with my tongue. 

For the last few months in been in search of a good Thai restaurant.

The Thai restaurant I have eaten from lately has been mediocre or darn right nasty.

Thank you for waking up my tastebuds and my sinuses.

Thursday  11 | 21| 2019
⭐⭐
Disappointment
Delicious food and prices that can't be beat. The service is excellent l. A great places to start a Friday night in the neighbourhood with interesting cocktails

Klom Klorm Thai Bangkok Style food in Bushwick Brooklyn! Nice clean spot, designed well. Seating indoor, outdoors. Well rounded menu. The flavors are easy going, light. Vegetarian choices plenty. The 2 plates ordered were delicious. Upbeat background music. Service was pleasant. Definitely going again to try a few more dishes, suggest you do too!l

Awesome Thai food and the decor is very nice inside. Best Khao Soo! Must try! Sad they didn't have drunken noodles although it's probably not an authentic Thai dish. Lunch specials also available on weekends, what what!

name: Taqueria Cocoyoc
reviews: I ordered food and I was 100% satisfied. I highly recommend this place. The food is delicious :).
Good food just wish they didn’t use styrofoam plates
The burrito was good, but they put an avocado and was black... Is the second time they do that.

Good place for mexican. Don't go here if you are in a rush they kind of take their time. The food has never been disappointing though and it's a pretty nice authentic place in the area. Staff are really nice.

I heard about this restaurant and was super excited to check them out. The first time I went it was such a great experience I decided to go again with my family. First off the waiter was such a delight, super nice & just great at her job overall. One thing I did notice was that the door was open which was not the best idea for it to be open especially in this weather. I asked politely if the door can be closed because I was looking forward just to take the time to eat in the restaurant but it was so cold I end up taking it to go. To be honest this isn’t the first time I’ve noticed this. Think about eating here because you will be COLD. But the food is excellent & the waiters are just simply the best!

name: Left Hand Path
reviews: Stumbled into this bar by chance, or perhaps fate. My party took seats at the bar, where we remained planted for several hours in conversation with the bar tenders, other patrons, and ourselves. We ended up blowing off our prior-arranged plans for the night across town rather than abandon the comfort we found here. Strong pours at an agreeable price, if you still need further convincing after those words of praise.
Tasty burger, comes with a bag of chips for 12 bucks.  Plugs for phones under the bar.  Nice bartenders. Kitchen open til 2 am which is great
Love this bar!!! Amazing bartenders and great cocktails. Their patio out back is awesome in the summer
Great drinks.  Pleasant garden,  at least when not too crowded.  (Don't come for the food)
Thanks Fritz to have made me discover another amazing place

name: Sally Roots
reviews: The restaurant/bar is small but nice.  Taste of the food was very good,however the portions were too small.  Not very fond of the beverages on the menu.  Staff is polite place looks clean.  If only they increase the food portions a bit it'd be a great place.
Fantastic food, great atmosphere and delicious drinks. Both brunch and dinner never disappoint.
Definitely liked the vibe of this place and the food. From what I tried it was good. The sweet plantains could have been left to ripen just a bit more. But that's here nor there.

I like this restaurant! They have sensational dishes, their menu is rich, The chief cook in that restaurant is very trained, I love a lot eating all their food. The dishes are always tasty, the service towards the customers  is very good too. I visit often this place and I not even once was unsatisfied. I recommend it to all my friends.

I ordered the shrimp skewed with rice and sweet plantains. It was very good, so was the pineapple ginger juice. 

It was kind of dark there tho. I need an extra candle to see my food. Haha 

I went back again and ordered oxtail stew with rice. It was wonderful. Such a good portion that I got to takeaway some for my lunch next day.

name: Akaru Sushi
reviews: I often take my friends to this place with my highest recommendations. I visit this place often. I get very good feedback from my friends. The the cooking is delicious and the crew is very friendly and cooperative. always when we visit this place we enjoy a splendid evening.  I recommend this place with pleasure.
Really good customer service and the food is really good. My family love that place.
I am always pleased with the level of craftsmanship that they put into the food here. It always taste free, flavorful and delicious. The service is also very good, courteous and welcoming.

So the sushi was good could’ve been better and the service was great but whenever my dessert arrive again it was good but I’m half way done when I see a long strand of blonde hair which I thought could’ve been mine but I have dark brown hair.. I didn’t say anything because they would’ve just replace my dessert and I was grossed out so I paid and left.

This site is my preferable site.  Of all restaurants I know I like it most. I always suggests to my friends to go to visit this place. when  I feel like having a superb meal, this is the place that comes instantly to my head. very good and many types of  food and a rich menu.great staff, and pleasant mood. Also important, the price is reasonable. I sent my friends to this place with pleasure.

name: Crepes & More
reviews: Went here really late at night with a friend. The one guy working was extremely quick at making the crepes. Fairly priced compared to other crepe spots. Great customization and great options. Definitely worth the visit for crepes.
Amazing place. I'm really picky about my breakfast spots and this place really hits it.
This place was awesome! Nyc is all about diversity so just relax and keep your racism to a zero
Because it is closes to me in the good sal
Okay crepes for good prices. If you're craving a crepe and don't care on the variety, this place is good.

name: La Gualaceña
reviews:
The service was great and friendly. They had a wide variety of food, however it was not that good.
We ordered morocho and not only was watery, it tasted like water with sugar and vanilla- with a hint of coconut 🤷🏻‍♀️ The bandera - the guatita was so watery, but it was tasty/ the goat also watery but tasty. The ceviche needed salt - had no taste, I had to add the non spicy-hot sauce (delicious) for flavor. The hornado was delicious.
We also had the arroz marinero which was just okay - it had imitation crab & tuna (WHY?!🤷🏻‍♀️🤷🏻‍♀️). 
I am Ecuadorian and know my food and people, and it seems that the folks that cook are from the Sierra which are not the best at making food from the coast. I recommend to have food from that region such as the Horando which was delicious.
I wouldn't recommend to bring children either, it's more like a sports bar feel... they had a soccer game on and all the intoxicated guests were screaming like maniacs and cursing. They not only scared me, but the 3 year old we were with. We only stopped by because it had good reviews in Google. Needless to say, I will not be coming back.
The waitress don't understands nothing they have no experience in a restaurant. She doesn't speak English and they are rude with the costomers
The food here is AMAZING but it takes about 5-10 mins wait for the food
Goid Food GREAT Service
Horrible service didn’t even give food when asked for it had to walk away

name: Gordo's Cantina
address: 140 St Nicholas Ave, Brooklyn, NY 11237, USA
reviews: the absolute best Tex-Mex food since I've been in Texas (this is not at all Mexican food if that's what you're looking for). This could hang with any of the Tex-Mex spots in Texas. would've posted a picture but i ate too quickly. The taco was literally falling apart because it had so much great food in it. I'm ordering from here again ASAP.

At first I was surprised that the fish tacos were $22, BUT then they came out and the order was huge, easily enough for two people and delicious. JR the bartender was very warm and welcoming. Great new addition to the neighborhood.
Solid food options for a new place in the neighborhood. A very scaled down menu, but everything we had was solid. A fan of the decor and I am hoping to come back once they get their liquor license.

A friend from SanFran recommended this place (go figure) and went there tn 03/09 and  had a great time. Went with 2 best friends and they ordered the tacos de mariscos, huge portion of fish, octopus, shrimp topped with avocado. I ordered the octopus tacos and wow, so tender and tasty, would so order this again.  The other friend had the veggie quesadilla, the cheese is friend and placed over tortilla, generous portion and so yummy. The food ended with churros and cappuccino. So good. Ck the pics out. Our server Dominick was so nice and his picks totally rocked. Will be coming back for sure.

Delicious new spot that stands out in a neighborhood filled with a ton of great options for Mexican cuisine. Service, guac, and tacos gobernador were all stellar. Definitely worth a stop, and another stop.

name: Mi Tlaxcalita Mexican Cuisine
reviews: I like to go with friends to this restaurant with my warmest recommendations. I visit this restaurant often. This recommendation is always successful. The dishes they serve are flavorable and the team is efficient and cooperative. always when we eat in this place we pass a splendid evening.  highly recommended.

The food is good it has a wide variety of different traditional Mexican plates, there is a mariachi that plays good music while you eat, the service is bad and they gave complementary chips after you finished your meal.

Yes , beautiful Mexican food each dish ranges from 12$ to 15$ depending on what you want.they have a bathroom , they all have beautiful art on the wall . Describes REAL Mexican food . I love this place me and my family always go here to try the food They also have music 🎵 that you can listen to and TVs Incase there is a game and you would like to see the game while you eat . The vibe is great here without a doubt :) . If you want to try really Mexican food you can come here and will find what you came for ;) 🇲🇽🇲🇽🇲🇽🇲🇽🇲🇽🇲🇽🇲🇽🇲🇽🇲🇽🇲🇽🇲🇽🇲🇽🇲🇽🇲🇽
I loved my meal! And the waitress was so nice. Also, I love the atmosphere of the restaurant it was warm and homely. You should try this place out..
They offer a vast variety of fresh food. I loved dining here. The employees are always welcoming, prices are affordable and the place is always clean.

name: Sol Sips
reviews: Food was so delicious. I ordered bacon egg and cheese sandwich and hot shot.  LOVED IT. Service was very slow though. Also a bit pricey for sandwiches. But sooo tasty

Im a vegan new to Bushwick and I came across this restaurant (via google) and saw the great reviews. The menu had some intriguing items and it’s a black owned restaurant so I decided that was dinner for the night. 

 The place is pretty cozy and quaint. The seamless menu online was a bit different from what was available when I got there. I wanted chicken and biscuit w/ collared greens on the side but I ended up with chicken scraps, cheesy pasta and collared greens all together.

Portion size was a bit disappointing for $13!! I’ve had amazing vegan fried “chicken” before and was not expecting what i received. It was more like scraps instead of the breast/thigh size pieces which i was expecting. I really wasn't feeling good after that meal.

This was such a treated. Ordered jackfruit tamarind panini, stuffed plantains with beans and peppers, and hot raw cacao drink. Honestly our meal was super delicious and filling. The service was great.
I suggest ordering ahead; it took a little while to get our order.
One of the very few black-owned businesses in the neighborhood. Great ital food.

I went back to Sol Sips( Soft Cafe @Sol Sips) and basically had the same wonderful experience that I had the 2 previous times. Service A+ , interesting conversations going on, varied menu and superb prices. I highly recommend this Vegan Restaurant!

name: Baskin-Robbins
address: 137 Wyckoff Ave Across from Wyckoff Med Ctr, Brooklyn, NY 11237, USA
reviews: Great Service and friendly staff. Drinks are always made right
A location connected to dunkin donuts. The staff are friendly, but the combined services make lines long. Plenty of seating

The staff let's homeless people lounge around, i got in to an argument with a homeless lady she was being disrespectful towards my mother & i, it's unacceptable & made our dining very uncomfortable. The staff should not tolerate this nor allow this to continue.
Friendly service and it shares the space with Dunkin Donuts, so, ice cream and coffee? Yes, please!😊
its a baskin robbins

name: El Charro Bakery
reviews:
Great local spot for traditional Mexican baked goods. Very affordable and the portions are huge! You get a steal tray and stack on everything you want.  Then put it on the counter. If you want a true slice of authenticity you have to go! Just try not to get intoxicated from the smell of heaven :]

P.S I really liked the chocolate chip cookies!

Here there are many options at getting bread. They have it fresh and warm. Sometimes you just need to call when the take out the fresh bread and you go at that time. Their bread taste so good, they also serve drinks and make cakes.
Very good authentic mexican bakery. Very good prices and top quality. better than the other Mexican bakerys in the area
Love the cakes,and the bread is so fresh an hot still 🥰 awesome 🤩💗
Best prices for great tasting bread. People make orders from all over nyc

name: Variety Coffee Roasters
reviews:
LOCATION ✔️ AMBIANCE✔️ STAFF ✔️ COFFEE ✔️ RESTROOM ✔️ TABLES ✔️ VEGAN CHOICES ✔️

Excellent cafe in central Bushwick location, with excellent staff, great coffee, and nice big space, with plenty of tables and lovely clientele. My friend and I were there VERY early   And table was easy to find! Nice service counter with available water fountain and glasses provided. Nice spot.

Really cool place with good coffee and good Pastries! Can definitely recommend the pumpkin vegan cake, so good. We were staying in the area and as we really enjoyed the place, we came back 3 days in a row. 
Would have give 5 stars if staff was more friendly

Variety Coffee is one of the best local roasters out of Brooklyn. Im usually grabbing my beverage "to go", but decided to soak up the chill atmosphere the day after Christmas. The cafe is usually bustling and there is rarely never a place to sit. But on this day, I sat next to their lovely tree and took in the subtle pine scent. Their coffee is super flavorful, which makes a delicious oat milk latte. Their pastries are by far some of the best in the area, especially the muffins. My fav is the blueberry, pumpkin, cranberry -- super moist and tasty. The space is reminiscent of what I'd imagine an old apothecary shop to be -- warm wood bar and brick walls give the space a cozy, welcoming feel. Staff is friendly and ready to make you the best drink! Glad I took a moment to sit and take it all in today.
Top notch Napoletan style pizza with unique options. Came here near closing and the staff was very accommodating & friendly. I do t live close but would go out of my way to try again.
The best coffee in the neighborhood! Their baked goods are really good, too. Try the butter croissant, you'll like it.

name: Milk & Pull
reviews: good coffee, bagels and staff! cute spot with seating area in the back.
Does the job. Americano $3. Quiet workspace. Warm.
Reasonably good coffee. Lots of seating but usually busy. Every spot has access to a power strip to charge your devices.
Good coffee and a nice place to get some work done or play with the board games in the back
Cute place, good coffee.

name: C M Coffee Shop
reviews: perfect portions, great food, reasonably priced, and excellent service

Very good food, they don’t charge for delivery or do they have a minimum thank you for that. Those $2 extra dollars could go into your delivery person pockets. However service is always great. I hope they get a bigger spot cause they will do so well. Rooting for you guys!
Super delicious breakfast burritos! Fresh tortillas, perfect potatoes, served quickly and hot.

Great and fast Spanish American place to get some breakfast and it’s right next to the train station on wychoff and stanhope across the wychoff emergency entrance. It’s Cash only for now. But let’s talk about that bacon egg and cheese omg. Sometimes I get a double/double “dub-lay dub-lay” which is two eggs, cheese, and extra bacon get that with a $1.00 coffee and you will have an amazing day ahead of you. Ok I won’t lie I get it 3 x a week for like 5 years now since it’s so good.
Very dirty the fat cook never wears gloves

name: Alebrije
reviews: They have a authentic healthy Mexican food and many different types of fresh ground coffee
Personable staff, great pricing, and unreal tacos! You know the family who runs it is from Mexico when you taste the tacos al pastor! I’ll probably go again tonight 😂😂😂
Really good food. Everything is fresh, will be returning. Just wish they had charro beans
Family owned restaurant. These guys a friendly sociable kind hearted people and the food is amazing!
Great Food, best vibes:)

name: VEX El Cafe
reviews: Been my go-to most mornings on my way to yoga. Same guy behind the counter- always sweet & makes my latte perfectly! Just bought some beans for home & the roast is also great.

The atmosphere was relaxing, and everything appeared clean. I think the decor and nautical style was interesting. I ordered a whole wheat bagel with cream cheese and pumpkin butter and a large coffee, but I do think they were a little over priced for what I received. The coffee was good but maybe not worth $3.75, and the bagel was pretty simple and soft (although the toppings were good). Overall I'd recommend trying it if you want to just chill somewhere with a book or a friend, but if you're just coming to grab breakfast and run out the door you might be a little underwhelmed.
I walked 10 block to try VEX coffee, totally worth it, this is one of the best oatmeal raisin cookie I have, no sugary at all and the americano DELICIOUS.
Great tasteful coffees, and I especially recommend the bagel with almond butter and apple butter!
Really cool and personal barista and great home brew

name: Steve's Pleasure Palace
reviews: I happened upon Steve's Pleasure Palace while attending a conference for farming equipment while in New York. On a whim I decided to stop in and see what all the fuss was about. Little did I know that it would change my life. I showed up for the pleasure, but stayed for the friendship. But don't let this man distract you from the fact that in 1998, The Undertaker threw Mankind off Hell In A Cell, and plummeted 16 ft through an announcer's table.
A Good Time

name: D' Montazo
reviews: The service is always quick, awesome character, very nice staff. I will come back again when I arrive here.
The beast my babies I I love u wit all my heart and forever
Best Spanish spot in Bushwick, they really care about there customers. They work extra  hard to make the experience great. They can use more good customers to help them stay a float.

I have ordered from this restaurant for months via seamless. I always order the same thing, family combo #1, which consists of a whole chicken, rice, beans, salad and a soda. This time I decided to order an extra beans and rice so that I could have some on the following day. My children ate the night it was ordered and when I went to eat it the following day for lunch around noon. I found multiple maggots in both beans. I was extremely disgusted and upset as my children already ate it and I had 1 bite before noticing. When I reported to seamless they called the restaurant and advised them and they stated they would not refund me. Which ultimately wasn’t even what I wanted. I just wanted them to rectify the situation. Seamless did in fact give me a credit on my account. If you chose to order be careful of what you eat. 

BTW. I have photos but can not upload them on here.

Super Loud Music = Not good.
Chicken stew - bone fragments in every bite. smh Not good.
Waitress = caught her rubbing her nose while she was polishing silverware at the bar. Oh that did it. I lost my appetite. She's lucky I tipped her well.

name: Sicily's Best Pizzeria & Restaurant
reviews: From the first moment  you step in this restaurant  the waiters give you a good feeling. Very comfortable hosts, it is a nice restaurant to  pass time with buddies or with your date. enjoyable  cooking, creative  chef, comfortable  price and generous  service. Highly recommended.

MY GO TO CHOICE FOR A SAFE AND DELICIOUS MEAL!

It's day 16 of my wife and I being locked in and it was time to treat ourselves.  I've had Sicily's Best a few times and loved it but of course I was nervous to get take out.  It seems like Russian roulette out there with business that either take this health crisis seriously or don't.

Well, this will be our go to treat now during these weird times.  The door was propped open so I didn't need to touch it and the owner was making pies with a mask on his face and sanitizing his hands regularly.  He offered me a squirt of sanitizer for myself and told me that he's overpaying for it, but he wants to keep his workers clean and healthy too.  I watched as he pulled my pizza straight out of the oven and into a box with no other contact.

The pie was as delicious as always.  It was supposed to last until lunch the next day but it didn't make it past the night.

Was recommended this place by a woman my girlfriend and I now refer to as Aunt Christina (aka Maria) while we were visiting Charleston, SC. We have never been to Ridgewood before but this was a worthwhile little trip. Gaspar was awesome and super friendly. All the food was great and fresh. Left full and happy. A surprise recommendation that turned out great, glad we stopped by.
Really tasty pizza. I’m glad I stumbled upon this place in the area. They’re very good

I had a very, very, very long day - due to a huge snowstorm and a busy day at work. I ordered a pizza from here before I got on the L and by the time I got off, not only was it beautifully prepared but the man who I spoke with was super attentive to my dairy allergy. He washed all the equipment even -- if I could rate above 5 stars, I would and I have never, ever said that in a review yet. Kudos to Sicily's best right here in Brooklyn! Ayyyy

name: White Castle
reviews: Nice place clean and nice staff fresh food would definitely recommend going here if your looking for a nice clean White Castle

I love a couple of W.C cheeseburgers, every now & then. They have that unique taste & I find them to be deliciously satisfying.  Love their milkshakes. The fishburgers are wonderful. Their fries are good. I think there's plenty of variety on the menu & you can find something you like.
It's White Castle, so it's great. Been a fan my whole life. This one is pretty fast and had nice service. Definitely awesome for some late night fast food.

Quick service. They wished us a happy Thanksgiving, and were in good spirits- playing lively music. My sister, who is a vegan, was psyched to get the impossible sliders (which were cute little square burgers, and were also adorably packaged). She also had a side of fries and a diet soda (they have a machine with all kinds of flavors). I got her a White Castle mug as a keepsake- very inexpensive, at $6 and change.
I love this place. Everyone is very kind and fast. Very clean place to eat with family.

name: Elmekkah Bar and Grill
reviews:
Great drinks 🍸🥃🍾🥂🍷
Hookah is on point🌬💨💨
Food is delicious 🌮🥙🍗
And the crowd and music are cool. 
Comedy show is on Tuesdays too!
Staff were friendly and polite. Sitting section was good and comfortable. I went here with friends after works. We spend great time. Drinks was good. Food was delicious.

Very nice place. Used to live in the area. Very nice spot. The food is amazing especially the grilled cheese. The music is good. And they do good parties there. Nice place to chill play pool and relax. The bartender is very nice too
Small but feels like u in a big club nice people
Great hookah

name: Wyckoff restaurant
reviews: Its not horrible. Its worse than that. Its non refundable, non replaceable garbage. Medium rare, low quality buffalo chicken and the mac & cheese looked like red soup. Ever seen red, watery, mac&cheese? Me neither. I was so mad with how the mng responded to my call back, I almost went over there, just to throw it at his face! They really need to start giving us the option to give no stars and still be able to review...its that bad. Dont take it from me only, also from everyone else who got stiffed by this place.

I just ordered via grubhub and was not happy at how extremely long it took to reach me. The sandwhich was soggy like it had been made wayyy earlier. The salad was good, avocado fresh. But between the sandwhich and length of time I had to wait I am not impressed.
Do yourself a favor and look elsewhere.... im pretty sure the one 4 star review they have is from the bilingual lady thats answers the phone...

wow couldn't believe what we ate the food was dry, tasteless and so oily, I would have like to talk to the cooks because everything was made with little effort.  The place is very plain( was not expecting much), the waitress I believe was new but was attentive and very nice.

It's a very expensive place you better off going Fifth Avenue to a classic restaurant, baked potato chicken leg and one small potato the size of a soft ball $10 dollar it's very annoying with these ridiculous price we in Brooklyn Bushwick not Fifth Avenue

name: Lucy's Vietnamese
reviews: This is an awesome modern twist on Vietnamese food! And watching the Vice documentary really brings the story of this shop to life. The brisket pho is great with tons of noodles and brisket - I couldn't finish it all! And note that the broth is mushroom based instead of beef based, so you can truly have a vegetarian meal. The shop is tiny so expect to grab and go or wait for a spot to sit, but it's definitely worth it!

The broth is amazing! It is complex and has so much depth, also its vegan and vegetarian friendly. They stay open relatively late which is awesome. There aren’t many seats so you have to grab them if you can; there’s 6-8 seats total inside. I’ve had the chicken pho twice now and it is very good- the chicken is tender, the broth is so delicious, noodles good, all good. Great quality bowl of pho. The prices are very reasonable for the quality and having vegan options. I paid 12$ for my bowl + tip. Service is quick. If you’re in the area, I recommend stopping by.

The flavor profile of the pho ga was discordant and too strong, which is my same sentiment for the broth. Chicken was not delicately poached but overcooked and too dark. I’ve visited 20+ Vietnamese restaurants in the NY area, and I would not recommend making a stop here.
Melt in your mouth brisket

Overpriced for the portion size of the noodles, the amount of broth was ok. Bok Choy however nice it may look, isn't good with pho and adds only visual appeal, not  to the flavor of the broth. Bahn mi at 14$ cost twice as much as other places. Customer service was okay, they forgot to give me my drink  and when I asked for it they looked at me like I was wrong and didn't even apologize, however small of an issue that may be it's still kind of rude. Overall overrated.

name: Nicandra's
reviews: The rib appetizer was delicious and the meat fell right off the bone. The cavatelli was light and balanced and the angel hair pasta had a well portioned piece of deliciously tender octopus. And Charmaine was awesome! Will be back but next time with a bottle in hand (BYOB) :)
Small space but gives you a personal service like a somewhat one to one feel to it. Food is genuinely tasteful and authentic. Reservation  is a must!
The octopus pasta and cream brûlée’ are really good

This place is ok. Ambiance is 3. Service is 5. Food is 3.5. The food isn't spectacular, but it's good. Not memorable but filling. The best part of this to me was the complimentary parmesan sauce given before the meal. It comes in a shot glass, but I could easily have eaten a soup bowl full of the stuff. I did note that the appetizers are better than the entrees, at least that's my opinion based on what I ordered. Sorry, I'm not a millennial so I didn't take pictures of the food. All I'm giving you is my personal opinion and you can feel free to disagree. Overall a 3.5 but there's no option for that. For a regular restaurant 3.5 is good. I reserve 5.0 for an exquisite memorable experience. I just didn't feel that here. Wrong setting for that.

This place BOYB! The pasta is to die for! Absolutely delicious! You can truly taste how fresh the pasta is. I ordered the squid ink pasta and I loved it! Can't wait to eat there again, because it was amazing!

name: Dromedary Urban Tiki Bar
reviews: Awesome!!! Plainly amazing!! It’s Saturday 2pm in the afternoon and I’m lit 🔥, totally enjoying myself with my bestie. Frosty Flamingo 🦩 delicious 🤤. Does Sunday brunch with bottomless drinks!!
