Great place to come for a cheap beer or a fun tiki drink. The bartender Danielle was are super nice and very engaging. They usually have karaoke on Thursdays which is super fun. The food is definitely above bar average, the cheeseburger is delicious. Definitely a fun place to hang out.

Actually this bar while deeper in bk is great! It has a large indoor space, with great selection of drinks. However proving feels like your in Manhattan. 

Drinks are strong and they have some funky specials with cool ways of serving then to you. 

It's well worth the travel and take a bunch of friends for a good night.
Not an all out tiki bar but still a tiki bar. Great beer and a shot deals. Low key place that allows dogs and serve food so you don't get into too much trouble

Went here for a Tuesday night trivia. Liked the quiz conducted by trivia general. The food was ok; tried the plant based meat burger and found it unique, though I may not order it again. If you are into trivia nights do visit the place on a Tuesday night

name: Taqueria Acatlan
reviews: Ordered off Grubhub.  Order was correct and arrived on time but the tortillas were stale :( I ordered as soon as they opened.  Maybe should have waited till they had time to make fresh ones? Will try again and hope for the best as they would have been great with fresh tortillas!
The service is good but the food much better, I'll give them 5 ⭐ but they can improve in the cleanliness of the site, must visit this place if you are looking for real Mexican flavours!!
The best tacos on Ridgewood area , definitely worth the wait so happy with my food , campechano taco are the best 🤤🌮
The food is always fresh and the flavors are bold and delicious. I can't get enough and eat here once or twice a week.
Very good tacos, quesadillas and soup. If you want to try spicy dressing and more goes there. Delicious food.

name: rico chimi
reviews: A decent place to come in with a group, don't expect fast service (English is not their first language, it's a 50% chance that they will get your order wrong) my food was not the best but it's not horrible [nothing special really] but from what I've heard from people it's a hit & miss.

Patacon... it's 2 platanos with chicken, lettuce, tomato, and mayo keychup.. when I say the ultimate Spanish mix, I mean it. It's a Dominican cuisine that is thankfully in Brooklyn. Usually stuff like this you only get in the heights. Super tasty and very filling!!
Great food, good prices... Open all night...
They started to make the gyro small in portion and changed the chicken they use which taste worse than how the chicken that they first put in the gyro
Nice place to something quick to eat.

name: Rogelio's Pizza
reviews: Dropping a star not the cost of food quality, or price (they're great)... but bc they were VERY busy, and, sadly, equally unorganized.  Reminding them of what you ordered, and having to check the bag because there's a good chance they forgot an item (or two).
Cool pizza no taste IMPEACHED NOW
Cold pizza No taste
No taste Pizza was Cold
The pizza is really good and the price is only one dollar

name: Color Me Greens
reviews: I've been here several times. Everything is good, that I've tried so far ...salad, wraps, green juice. The guac was okay, but I ran out of the chips. I tried a protein shake for the first time. Very tasty, and filling, definitely worth the $8.00+tax lol. I had some before my workout and after, I didn't need anything else for the night.
Love coming to this place after the gym or from the train for quick protein shake or meal.

I'm really wanting to wait a bit before rating this place. I'm interested to try the black bean burger. The veggie burger was a disappointment (a typical brand that many of the Deli's use.). I'd recognize it anywhere by its texture. A suggestion to management "please consider another brand for your veggie burger. There are hundreds of better tasting ones with better texture as well". The spicy fries were great and hospitality was nice otherwise.

Excellent little place to stop in to if you’re looking for something healthy whether it be a juice or a smoothie or a ginger shot.

Update:  came here again and have waited 20 minutes for a $9 smoothie.  Incredibly understaffed

I am assuming the owners of this spat they don’t care about the customer, The girl she has an actitudes problem she close at 9:30  every time she working she is not like the other Spanish lady, nice and she closes at 10 pm or more. I’m really disappointed. The excuse is that is slow, well if they no treating the customer right.

name: Lucky Garden
reviews: I simply enjoy their dishes. I always get good service there. The place is well organised and the employees are always nice. Keep up the good work.

This is my favorite spot in area. There are others that I might have overlooked, but this place has a very strong family bond and that can be applauded. Their food is good no doubt. Careful when you ask for bbq sauce on the food, they tend to put alot. It could use more cleaning intervals, but it is comfortable to eat in. Also, dont pay mind to the model in the pic. :O
Lil hole in the wall chinese spot. My coworker got us take out. Chicken wings and rice. It was okay. Nothing special.. Can live without it.
good garlic chicken , lots of vegetables
Margeaux ate here and they liked it!

name: Cholula Deli Corp.
reviews: I am Mexican. Their food is just not good. It’s not bad either, but for the prices and the sloooooooow service, I was expecting something better. Pancita had potato and carrots in it (?) and ended up as a thick, not pleasant porridge-like thing. Salsa for chips is quite bad( but complementary). Chilaquiles verdes were just above ok. Do not recommend.
Excellent food. The presentation is always wonderful

Very Good! 
I been coming here for years and tried almost everything on there menu 
......service is Good! Food very Good great place for local grub , tacos are Okay . there soups are amazing. There tortas(Mexican sandwich) on the money! There  authentic Mexican dishes  are the best , highly recommend if your local!
Been going there for years. Really good authentic mexican food, just like mom used to make.
Great authentic home cooked Mexican food.

name: Paucar’s Deli & Grocery
reviews: Given a total makeover. sandwiches are definitely worth a try!
Clean & neat. Can’t find the best sandwiches like Paucar’s anywhere! Definitely worth a bite!
Would really recommend to everyone !

name: Sabor Tropical
reviews: How I called for chicharrón with mote, and they want to charge me 60$ , THEY ARE BUGGIN THEY ARE VERY RUDE. I’m Ecuadorian myself and I’m just disgusted by this place !
The service is friendly and fast and the food is good and reasonably priced!

Got the cazuela de mariscos. Filled me up and so good. Tried the caldo de bola and encebollado, it lives up to the Tropical brand. Delish!  I want to give zero stars for the cleanliness of the bathrooms though.
The real name its Talon it's nice prices ok.

The food here is amazing (to-go) . I wasn't sure what to expect, but I was wonderfully surprised by what I recieved. It tasted amazing, the service is great and it was just a great experience. Not sure what the dining experience is like.

name: New Apolo
reviews: Inexpensive good quality Chinese food! The servers are very nice, and they treat their regular customers like gold from what I can tell. Both my bf and I had the blue Hawaiian drinks and those were really good, and did the job. Overall I would definitely go back, and for sure recommend.
The food is consistently fresh and yummy, staff members hands over great customer service. I really like how neat it is and character. I highly recommend this spot.
This is not a place if u trying to watch your calories..but the food is great..big  plates!!.. & they sell liquor
The best Spanish Chinese around!

ALWAYS good food! Fast service, great for big families without having to break the bank! 
Ask for Karen!

name: Place Fried Chicken & Pizza
reviews: Two slices of pizza for $3 - tastes decent.  They often have a $9.99 special for 12 pieces of fried chicken.  The fried chicken is very good...

Really good food and super affordable. Really like their grilled chicken sandwich and their pizza and it’s cheap. Ordered delivery with a couple people recently (~week) and it came surprisingly fast (location is abt 15 minutes away). I have no complaints
Everything here is the best. Flavor and price can’t be beat. Service is friendly. Great neighborhood spot.
Love coming to the place ever since I was 3 not expensive clean place and more
Fast service good chicken fried or grilled to Pizza and pastry

name: Rosita Sunday corp-grill
reviews: Excellent spot to have some food when in a hurry. Their customer service is fast, rates are convenient, great character. Will come back again
The staff was very nice. The food was Amazing, and VERY CHEAP ! like their lunch and dinners are only $8, Overall very tasty.

I order a Cuban sandwich and the bread was really hard, the pork was dry and old.  The Pata soup, was disgusting, and the pork bolon, plantain was sweet as hell.  Definitely I would NEVER order here again, the $33.00 dollars worst ever spent ever. For this type of food, is better to eat at Burger King.
Aunque la apariencia puede no causar la mejor impresión, la comida es rica, fresca y con precios razonables, para mí el mejor el área

name: El Encebollado de Rossy
reviews:
ECUADOR 🇪🇨
Excerpt from Eat the World NYC:
There are stretches of Wyckoff Avenue, of course, that you should steer clear of these days. A combination of dangers and threats from fixed-gear bikes chained to every surface; large, apparently unshowered and unshaven men in plaid roaming everywhere, and the ever-present risk of drowning in craft beer get worse the closer you come to Flushing Avenue.

Luckily as you near Myrtle Avenue, and especially when you cross to the other side, the ubiquity of women dressed like they live in the 1980's goes down, and the chances to find excellent food goes significantly up. One such restaurant to eat well and avoid the dangers of all these other things is a small Ecuadorian nook named for the dish it features most prominently: Encebellado.

On a second visit, with an unexpectedly buzzing late afternoon crowd, a bowl of encebollado regular ($12) was tucked into and savored. The regular version of this popular soup is filled with meaty whitefish, cooked of course with onions as the name suggests. With maritime themes painted on the walls, it is easy to close your eyes and smell the Pacific Coast as if you were sitting in a seafood shack near Guayaquil.
Great Ecuadorian cuisine very traditional food , encebollado is to die for, prizes are very reasonable , they serve lunch for only $9 (see picture of lunch).
I can't get enough of this place. This is one of the best Ecuadorian seafood restaurants in the area.
This restaurant is a perfect place to go too, good food  great price range but the place is kinda small but still worth it

The hot seafood soup or also called Sopa marinera is delicious, fresh, big plate, it reminds you of the Ecuadorian coast and culture. I truly recommend this place even though its packed , it's worth waiting for it,  you will not regret it.

name: The Bushwick Diner
reviews: Really friendly environment with a wide selection of food available 24 hours a day.
I just moved to Bushwick 3 months ago, and ate at this place a good 7 times already. The food is made with love I swear. Best diner in Brooklyn hands down.

I was visiting New York, my friend recommended this diner as it was close by. It's a diner with a modern look, affordable price from what I've experienced so far in New York.

Staff are friendly and service is good. Currently writing this review on my second visit.

UPDATE - Second visit didn't go as smoothly as the first, orders were incorrect due to basic details such as having eggs cooked differently as requested from being asked and a few other minor things.
I went on a late night when I couldn't sleep. The servers were helpful. The good was actually pretty good even when it was 4am in the morning. And price was good too.
Small quaint place. Had Breakfast was Awesome with my Friends. The Atmosphere is Friendly with Excellent service.

name: Paloma's
reviews: This place was fantastic, chill, nice music and great attention, everything was so good. Loved the tacos, loved the beer. What else do you need? Loved it.

Tasty but also pretty expensive. The nachos were $13, about a dollar a chip (not exaggerating), half of which arrived soggy (We ordered delivery). Also ordered chicken enchiladas. The flavor was good but there were bones in it. Would try again.
Best Burrito in the Neighborhood. Perfect in size, the rice well cooked and the meat was well medium. The side salad was super fresh, guacamole was super tasty, def be back for more.
Solid food, good atmosphere. The place is a little small but good all around. Below are enchiladas verdes and the paloma shrimp and scallops

Love everything about this place. Staff is very friendly. The food is very delicious. My favorite dish is shrimp chimichangas and tacos al pastor. Love these so much. All their dishes are delicious. You have to get their sangria. Delicious. The place is very cozy and makes you feel welcomed. I love having a good meal at a place like this. I'm there every week because I love it so much.

name: La Mesita
reviews: If you’re looking for delicious and authentic Mexican food, this is the place. I couldn’t believe they had menudo soup too! It seems very few Mexican restaurants do these days. It’s a new favorite, theirs is a must-try.

Small and quiet restaurant... wanted to try some authentic Mexican food so pass by there.friendly server , I believe she is owner too. As didn’t have much ideas about Mexican food she recommended us some dishes. The best thing is she had vegetarian dish too as one of us is vegetarian. Hope this place will do good in future and will have more traffic. Good luck and thanks for making our time
My Enchiladas were amazing. I got 4, so it was a really big portion. Definitely I will be back
We ordered to go. This is the best fish burrito in town we ever had. Big portion, good flavour, very filling. Loved it, highly recommended
My go to place on seamless. They close a bit early but if I can catch them when they’re open I always go for the chicken burrito. Fast delivery and consistent deliciousness.

name: Fansway Teriyaki Kitchen
reviews: LOVE this place. So yummy and cheap, they always have nice specials but their soups are just delicious. Always adjusting to your needs and requests, steamed dumplings for the little ones are a yummy and healthy option. nice and friendly employees. Clean spaces and decent bathroom. Overall great fast food restaurant.

Definite Wasn't Pleased with this teriyaki spot.. it was a very big disappointment to spend $28..& NOT ENJOY IT:( The Ice Tea Was So water Down & The Pork Fried Rice Was Favor less & taste like Steam Grilled Rice & Broccoli Tasted like it was jus pulled out the back yard.. It was So Bad I wont be eating Chinese food for a while..  NEVER AGAIN!! WILL I GO BACK TO THIS TERIYAKI SPOT:(
Great place to get my teriyaki chicken fix

One of the best Japanese food stables we have in my borough i used to go all the way to queens mall to eat Japanese food it was good but in here its better in service and the atmosphere is unbelievable great. Very homey comfortable too the greeting when you come in is a welcome with a smile it makes you feel like home very welcome.. The food WOW is not a disappointment its delicious and the smoothies thats very sweet and tasty..i recommend to try and you will not regret on coming here..

Such an amazing place here, me and my boyfriend accidentally found this place..in the case of hunger but I put my parents on to this restaurant and they LOVE this place. Amazing people here. Cheap and taste better then Chinese food!😍

name: Fansway Teriyaki Kitchen
reviews: I cant believe how damn good this $8 plate of chicken/shrimp teriyaki turned out to be. Put the “tasty sauce” that they have at the side counter. It tastes like halal guys famous white sauce, if it had a hint of wasabi in it. Try it

Greasy.

Taste ok but greasy as hell.
Cheap eats.
I purchased wings but I had to toss them.
They were slightly undercooked

Can't believe how delicious and cheap the food is. Always friendly staff, they adjust to your needs and requests like steam dumplings for the little ones, yummy and healthy. Their noodle soups are just so damn yummy you have to try it. Overall nice and clean.
Their shrimp is really good. Cheap too. I got the teriyaki chicken soup too. Bless.
Love this place,great food,great prices,and super nice people

name: Popeyes Louisiana Kitchen
reviews: This restaurant is doubtless one of the coolest place to eat in the region. Every time I go there I am extremely glad. They preserve their high  standard service and the topmost level of food  they serve. You no doubt will love this restaurant. Very  recommended.

I loved the chicken!!

What a great place I found on my travels! Everything was right about the place, I really liked it in there. The chicken and fries were cooked to perfection, the music was good and the staff were very efficient.
I had the 3 pieces of chicken option, that I had with fries, biscuit and diet coke. I had trouble finishing it, it was very filling. Cheers!
Whos managing this place at night !? 3 Employees working chicken all out in the back.. what type of vibe is here ? Get it together
Very gud chicken sandwich.. Kool new packing didn't hurt either..
Nice clean and friendly

name: Esmeralda's
reviews: This restaurant serves typical Ecuadorian dishes as well as lunches. The lunches are served Mon-Fri, and include a choice of soup, entree, and drink for a great price. The food is delicious, and portions are generous. They would definitely benefit from having a few more servers, as this place is always busy. The interior is not the nicest I've seen, but if the food is delicious, who cares?
The servers had us waiting for a while to be seated and food took for ever but when our food came it was definitely worth the wait. Authentic Ecuadorian at its best !

For me this is the best ecuadorian restaurant in New York.I promise you,you will not be disappointed.The food here is delicious.I think that everything that they cook here is delicious. Eventhough, the food takes time to wait,when it comes and you taste it it will be worth it.

We ordered sopa de pata and bistec encebollado. Both dishes were delicious, big portions and according to my bf who is Ecuadorian, the flavors were spot-on authentic.  Service is good, and even though our food took a while to come out, it didn't disappoint. The ají was the perfect spice level for me (really spicy) and I shared my rice because it was a lot for my dish. We've been to this place a few times and it's always been good. It's Cash only, so be prepared.
So much food for such a great price! AND it was absolutely delicious. Thank you.

name: Merinda's Deli & Grill
reviews: Food is good, just overly priced. The chicken over rice doesn’t come with white sauce and hot sauce unless you add an additional $1.00 each. I thought it came with that sauce so I didn’t add it on !!! I would recommend this place.

Merinda's Deli is undoubtedly a 5 out of 5!! The halal was amazing and made with care, the turkey hero was fantastic and all made to perfection. Mind you, this was a late night order and it is a huge rarity that the grill was still up and running. Very convenient and needs were met!

two days ago was our first time we visited this good restaurant. But It is absolutely not the last. We had a good time with the generous service, with the excellent  food and booze and with the honest pay. We will surely return there soon.

The service here is horrible. They overprice everything and take advantage if you buy more than one thing to overcharge you. Bought 3 sandwiches and a couple of snacks and they tried to charge me over $40 on food. He didn’t even even put the amount on the register just did the calculations on his head. When I told him to double check it on the register he got mad and started talking in his language with the other person there aggressively and and laughing in front of us. It turned out that it was no where near the $40 he was trying to charge me. It something that has happened more than one time and ppl should know the kind of things the actual owner does. The rest of his employees don’t do that but when the actual owner is there beware because he’s the one that overcharges.
If I could give it 0 stars I would. If you go in there in person and meet the actual owner you will be over priced and disrespected.

name: Atlixco Grocery Deli
reviews: i alway go there the husband & wife is very nice...
Good ,Quiet place with Great Variety of Selection and friendly owners. I recommend this shop for a Quick Bite or snack.
everyday when i go to school i always bought my sandwich there and ive been going since the last 7 years and they are nice  people
More nice
Muy buena atención

name: Cholula Deli
reviews: Good vibe, tasty food
Great food and service! The tacos are excellent, as are the chilaquiles
Cholula restaurant always has the best food at great value! Their food is the best!!
Definitely a place worth visiting, the food is awesome and well prepared, the costs are reasonable and it is constantly neat here. Kudos.

Rude service. No longer ordering here. Step your customer service game up!! They’re going to fall through the cracks with all these new restaurants coming up with great consumer service. Learn how to answer the phone and take an order with respect.

name: Resto Esmeralda
reviews: Is good food and the attendance is very good
Mal atención al cliente se tardan mucho

name: Burgers N' Shakes
reviews: Small place but awesome food! Great shakes, amazing flavors! The burgers are delicious, cooked exactly how you order! Love this place!
THEIR SHAKES ARE AMAZING!! They put so much love into it. Really appreciate that

This place is unsanitary!!!! In the wake of this Covid-19 pandemic they were not wearing gloves or masks!!! If I could give this place ZERO stars I would...when they were asked about why they weren’t wearing masks or gloves I was told by a young lady in there that they weren’t sick. I am both appalled and disgusted! They have an A rating and it definitely should not be...I hope this reaches out to people and everyone pays attention because this is a serious matter that shouldn’t be ignored

My burger was delicious they custom made my burger with plenty of protein since I'm not eating bread. I ordered a burger with cheddar cheese and bacon. It was prefect medium done, bacon was crispy and plenty of it, the cheese was divine. A must go to for great burgers and shakes.
Perfect! Great customer service. Super fun menu. The shakes are fantastic. The Oreo and the fruity pebbles shakes hit the spot.

name: Antojitos Ecuatorianos
reviews: Bad horrible just bad

name: Gourmet Deli & Grill
reviews: Having lived 150 yards from the deli for over 6 months, I have been appalled by the service and demeanour of over half of those that work in the shop. They are very unpleasant, bordering on rude. As someone who visited the shop at least 5 times a week, the 3 men who work behind the counter are very reluctant to help. The men behind the deli are quite nice and make quite good food but I would avoid this place if you can.
Not bad
Pretty happy with this spot. I usually hit them up on the phone 10 minutes before coming through to pick up. Try the beef BLT (they don't serve pork which is kinda cool) =)
Permanently closed

name: La Fogata
reviews: Is not a great place but you can chill after work , there is a pool table, Latin American Vibe & also is safe.
To dance is a great night with friends
It's a good hang out environment, had definitely improved with new management and owner. The DJ knows how to keep people happy and dancing
Beers are watered down. If your not Mexican, nobody won't talk to you
Cool spot. Hookah needs work and the beers need to be a little colder.

name: Pan Rico Ambateño
reviews: Simple and good.
The bread is delicious, reminds me my hometown and childhood.
So so
Sencillo y delicioso con variedad de opciones baratas. Necesitan añadir bakery a la descripcion para que se lo encuentre mas facil gente que no se habla espanol
Pan 😋 muy rico

name: Catania Bakery
reviews: The best cold cuts around. Very clean and the bread is extravagant.

I would give it a 0 star if there was an option! The bakery personnel was super rude and kept ignoring me. When she finally paid a little attention, she was pretty offensive and impolite. You don't expect this kind of behavior from Catania employees. 
Extremely disappointed!

Local staple. Bakery items always fresh but quality is down compared to 20 years ago. Also Italian bread is not as fluffy inside as in the past. If owners are reading this remember that your long-time customers are your real customers not the millennial implants that now saturate the neighborhood.
Love their strawberry cheesecake and cannolis!
Been getting my mom's strawberry cheesecake here for years and years plus numerous birthday cakes for the kids in my family.  Great neighborhood bakery.

name: Sweet Coffee
reviews: I came here on a Sunday night around 5:30PM with a friend who lives nearby, and I got their pan de bono and an empanada de carne. The pan de bono was amazing! It was quite warm when I got both items, and the pan de bono was delicious. Very cheesy with chewy bread, and it was very buttery which I didn't like. I ended up getting a second one of these. The empanada came with a little plastic container of green sauce which was delicious, but there wasn't enough of it. The inside of the empanada was super bland and needed the green sauce to make up for it, but there wasn't enough green sauce. The empanada was super potato-y and there wasn't much meat flavor. I actually didn't really like the empanada. But definitely the pan de bono! It was also a bit pricey at $1.50 for the bread and $1.75 for a tiny empanada.
Empanadas are delicious, crispy on the outside and filled with delicious seasoned meat. The chicken and beef are good.
If your looking for authentic empanadas and Colombian bread this is the spot!!! Will be back defenetly

I love their coffe and their specialty breads (called Pan de bono) 
Cute, small and relatively fast service. The only down side is that they are a cash only business. Highly recommended
I love this place and it’s baking Colombian treasures. Always fresh, always delicious. Super sweet & kind staff. Get your pandebono to sweeten your day.

name: Mi Estrella Bakery
reviews:
Good cake, good prices. But customers service? I don't know. I pre-ordered a small cake $15 in the morning to be picked up in the afternoon, when i got there she said your total is $27. 

I don't know what happens but we speak the same Spanish language, they made a big cake instead of the small, so gues what i have to pay for it, even though was her mistake

This Bakery is one of my favorite places.... They make an amazing tres leches cake and I get most of my case if not all of them from this place my family and friends always ask me to get them cakes from here. I have send them numerous new customers that have taste their cake and fall in love with it, just like I did. If you are looking for a delicious, soft and creamy tres leches or even a quadruple leches cake this is the place. And their customers service is amazing.... they made a super special cake for our wedding everyone gave us compliments on how tasty the cake was. Muchas gracias por un trabajo excepcional y delicioso.
they have great cakes and really good prices
The cakes are probably the best tres leche cake you will find in the city. They made the right balance of sweet and spongy cake. The flavor are amazing and the staff service is very friendly.
Delicious cake! My little sister loved it :)

name: Armandos Grocery & Bakery
reviews: Before very good now,they want more money for the cake....to much.they going to loose alot of people's because that.
Amazing cake from Armandos Bakery just the way i asked for it for a bridal shower.

I walked into the store and a man was behind the counter. He didn't greet me or ask what I needed.He just stared at me. I went into order the tres leche cake after reading the reviews that it was good. I didnt really care for the fruit inside it. Without the fruit part it was decent.
Love the cakes and the prices!
Great family very friendly very good people. Their cakes always #1 with my family. Best tres leches cake your taste buds will crave.

name: L'imprimerie
reviews: This place is amazing. They have the social distancing guidelines down. The baked goods are out of this world. They also have a pizza kit for essential workers for free which is super kind

Love the bread from this place. It’s a family favorite. When we can’t make it to this location it is the bread carried by other local businesses in Bushwick. I love their vegan pastries and the call out of the vegan bread types.

Gus makes the best bread and baked goods. BK is lucky to have a artisan bakery like this! Always a joy to visit. Try the chocolate croissants! Buy some sourdough for dinner! We make sure to visit when we are in town

Nice French bakery/cafe in Bushwick. The almond croissant has some meringue on top. It is flaky outside and buttery/airy inside. Clear layers with a perfect amount of almond paste. The paste is a little bit liquid though.

Great spacious neighborhood bakery with beautifully baked and delicious baked goods including an assortment of croissants, danishes quick breads, cookies, as well as various country loaves. There's definitely something for everyone. Coffee is also perfectly prepared.

name: Mayday Space
address: 176 St Nicholas Ave, Brooklyn, NY 11237, USA
reviews: Excellent space for artists of color and allies in the community. First timer and it won't be the last!
Big space, nice and clean but doesn't have heat. It was a little cold but it was fine
Nice floor and amazing space but very hot!
Atmospheric place I miss from my soviet childhood )
A great space to share your aspirations to inspire others.

name: Mixtape Bushwick
reviews: A tiny to-go coffee bar with solid coffee beans roasted in Brooklyn. It also offer a few bar stools for chilling-out. Some choices of pastries and sandwiches to go with coffee. Like the blue-themed mural.
My favorite third wave street coffee stand in Bushwick.
Street-side counter service with good coffee. Mixtape goes to show that you don't need WiFi, plugs, and competitive seating arrangements to be a good cafe. Mixtape is one of my all-time favorites.
The espresso is so good!!! Also the bagels are really good. I’ve gotten a latte here and then drank it and ordered a second one for the walk home

My neighborhood go-to. The breakfast sandwich is great and ten times out of ten it's the perfect place for spotting dogs. One time a woman working the register asked me what animal was depicted on my beanie and I told her it was an otter. Alas, it wasn't until after I got home that I realized it was a seal.

name: Cypress Inn Cafe
reviews:
Not the old Cypress Inn Cafe any more :(    No Frankenstein, no huge sandwich, no Viola. 

Their coffee is good though. It’s from Oslo Coffee.
My regular place. They are lovely. Sometime coffee is a bit strong, but food is great, staff is great!

Cappuccino is always well balanced and excellent. Only $3.50 for a large cup. Great way to start the morning. I also enjoy the hummus plate for lunch if you're not overally hungry. If you have more of an appetite, their sandwiches are large and well made. Always good to stop for food or coffee in the morning or lunch time.

Super cute little spot with wonderful art and delicious pastry treats. The cold brew is strong and refreshing, cannot miss it! The staff was kind and helpful even when it got busy, and as trans folks we immediately felt safe.
Very delicious...!!

name: Chispa
address: 259 St Nicholas Ave, Brooklyn, NY 11237, USA
reviews: This place is like the best of both worlds. Love coffee, come here. Have a friend who doesnt like coffee but loves a good beer? Come here. This place is super chill and it's really relaxing. Very nice staff and the prices are good.
A spacious cafe with plenty of seating, good coffee and plenty of outlets. Great place to work

Love the place amazing coffee good beer extremely chill ambient I will come back again try the pizza too its very very good highly recommended the barista was extremely chill will be coming back again
Great Coffee,  Grqt place to chill with friends

Quiet, clean, TV, seating, friendly baristas, a wealth of plugs, WiFi, and still waiting for the beer and liquor license. All the trappings of an ideal cafe. As much as I love this place, I suggest Chispas change their brewing methods, because I've tasted better coffee at gas stations.

name: Altitude Brooklyn Coffee
reviews: Really nice little spot in this neighborhood - it’s such a chaotic and busy intersection of streets on the outside, that this is a cool little spot to come in and chill out. What I really liked is that they have a nice little seating area up behind the coffee bar, up about 3 or 4 steps, really great spot to enjoy your coffee and read, write, research, etc. Coffee was pretty good - the only reason I put 4 stars instead of 5 is because I didn’t try any food so honestly I just can’t say how the food is. But if your in the neighborhood and need a spot to chill out for a few minutes I recommend this location. Also nice clean little bathroom.
Weelcoming new espresso bar with deliciously refined coffee drinks of all formulations. Try the matcha latte or the vanilla lemongrass tea for a non caffeinated concoction .

I've tried everything at this shop as of Jan 2020. The coffee and espresso is excellent. They try their best to pick good flavors, and mix it up every couple weeks. The baked goods are tasty as well. One of their newer items is brunch on the weekends. Its definitely worth trying here, especially the nachos and toast. My favorite thing  here is the Guatamalan hot chocolate with espresso. Best hot chocolate in the neighborhood imo.
Last thing I want to mention, is the service.  The barista loves coffee is is willing to explain everything to you if you don't know much. They are constantly trying to change things up and keep quality in check. I'd recommend this joint to anyone.
Lovely staff. I really enjoyed working there for a few hours on Sunday.
The coffee was great, excellent environment, attention and atmosphere!!! 10/10🙌🏼

name: New World Nutrition (Free WiFi)
reviews:
Their smoothies are amazing! I was walking by and was ushered in by this lovely lady who told me to give it a try. Best leap of faith I took that day!

High protein, low carbs and super nutritious—perfect after workout supplement.

Walking into this location the environment was lively. The guy behind the counter greeted me with a smile and suggested one of their top selling smoothies. I was surprised about how good it was and how affordable! The place is very clean and I’ll definitely be back to try another smoothie.
I feel motivated comino here cause the people here are super positive and care about the custumer need, and the drinks tase amazing mu favorite are the waffles qith coffee
I love the environment here, always keeping it positive and the drinks taste so good!
delicious smoothies and nutritious people are very friendly, I recommend this place is very nice 😍🤩

name: Guadalajara De Dia 2
reviews:
First of all food is over priced, second of all how do you call your mexican restaurant 'Guadalajara' but do not make tortas ahogadas or any products that are actually from Guadalajara. Anyways I ordered a cemita plus 4 TACOS to go and I only got one small green sauce!?!?!?! with those prices...? ps at night its full of drunkies.
Primeramente la comida esta cara, segundo como vas a nombrar tu restaurante guadalajara y no vender por lo menos la torta ahogada.

The tacos are SO FILLING, even the veggie option! I tried to get the shrimp soup but they recommended the oxtail instead and I'm so thankful bc it is so good! I have yet to eat an oxtail but the broth and veggies (potatoes, green beans) are absolutely fantastic. If this soup is available without the oxtail pls lmk bc I need it in my life. Beware: ya might get ramen/pho sweats.
Food is overpriced. While I was paying the cashier I left my daughter finishing her meal they just took my plate with out asking if I was done or not wouldn't recommend this place
Food is excellent and waitress she is really nice and helpful.

Never visited the store/restaraunt front and decided to go dosn there instead of the usual Seamless order. The restaraunt as more to chose from on thr menu vs. Seamless menu. Delicious and fresh authentic Mexican cuisine.

name: K&K Super Buffet
address: 341 St Nicholas Ave, Ridgewood, NY 11385, USA
reviews: Went to take my wife out for a anniversary gift with kids and the place is okay. Not too fancy. 1st- the food was way overpriced. 2nd- almost every dish (they barely have anything to be honest) was old or cold. And most were empty. The quality of the food itself is pretty explanatory just look at the pictures. The pizza was HORRIBLE. At the end of the night I was very disappointed and just couldn’t believe this is where I ended up taking my wife and kids. Would NOT recommend to anyone. PLEASE GO TO THE QUEENS BUFFET INSTEAD, that place has much variety and isn’t as bad as this.

Good for group meetings.  Reservations are available. 
Pick your own food from the food displays. Prices are great. Parking lot is good.
Not bad won't be eating there regularly though they have to clean the place better

Went there with my family we only ate 1 plate and they took the plates without asking and stared at us while we ate. Then rushed and gave us our check. Food was cold and nasty 🤬 if you looking for amazing buffet DON'T come HERE!!

Was recommended by a friend, I have no idea what was so great about it. As I was searching through what to eat I saw a roach as well. Will not go back again. Horrible staff as well, staring and talking about us as we looked around.

name: Jade Seneca Restaurant
reviews: One of the best Chinese takeout ive been. Fresh rice, aromatic. General tso pic attached.
Honestly the food is really good... Go get the lunch special! Having come here for the last 7 years, I definitely recommend this place!

This site is my number one restaurant.  Of all restaurants I know I love it most. I always suggests to my friends to go to visit this place. Whenever  I I need a delicious lunchon, this place comes straightaway to my head. excellent and all sorts of  food and a large list of dishes.courteous staff, and great ambience. Also, the expence is fair. I recommend this place with no hesitation.
My favorite is vegetable fried rice and vegetable dumplings fresh tasty clean Chinese food of the hood
Great food, great service. Easily one of the best places in the area for a quick bite

name: Little Caesars Pizza
reviews: Reliable chain pizza, good service, and down the block from the train station and several buses.
The service is amazing! When you order they have it hot n ready!! I would recommend this place 100%, and I’ll never change my prediction!
Order on the phone told me 10 mins get there 25 mins my food wasnt cooked waited 20 more minutes no thank you

Idk if little Caesars pizza isn't how it used to be or if it's the location. The plain pizza wasn't very good. There Italian cheesy bread was too oily and didn't have that same good taste like it used to, some thing was wrong or missing. The staff are friendly, but sometimes not attentive!

It's chain pizza. Nothing amazing here, though they always seem a safe bet if you want some quick, cheap, simple pizza at whatever hours. Mainly come here for the deep dish pepperoni. 

The place is fairly small though and often times the place to order and wait get rather crowded. They also don't seem to honor their hotntready mention, though I am fine waiting the five to ten minutes.

name: El Castillo De Jagua
reviews: There food really is the best my fav restaurant better than rico pollo on myrtle im just say rt this the spot
Love this spot great food great waitresses go here all the time

name: El Sabor Del Austro
reviews: Good and not
Homemade Ecuadorian food that taste great and a very humble spot to eat.
It is the best place for typical Ecuadorian food..... I recommend going and enjoying it 😁😁😁😁
Ecuadorian home made food, the place is very HUMBLE, but their food is surprisingly good
Delivery ....they take to long......even for a simpler plate.

name: El fogon Costeno
reviews: Always great service and great prices. Highly recommend.

Really cool bar, open late, with chilled relaxed staffers serving drinks making sure everyone is having a good time and nicely lubricated. Feels real low key and intimate yet perfectly busy at the same time. Loved it.
Good good
Very fresh seafood. Free parking and right next to kayak rental. Bring your cash. Remember to call ahead to find out what they have!!!!
Really good clean

name: El Manaba
address: 341 St Nicholas Ave, Ridgewood, NY 11385, USA
reviews: The food is excellent but the service is absolutely awful. Sat for 10 minutes before a waitress came to our table asking if we had ordered yet and they were standing right in front of us eating. Then she dropped off the food and didn't come back until 5 minutes after I had piled the plates on the end of the table. We asked for the check and apparently one lady told the other and in the end we had to get up to get the check from someone at the bar because no one brought to us. Sad thing is that it hasn't been the only time. If their food wasn't so good I would never ever go back there.

The cold and uninviting atmosphere was matched by the cold food and uninviting attitude of our waitress. If I could give 0 stars, I would.

Everyone’s food arrived cold. Rice was clearly left over from a previous day. They tried to get around not having one of the dishes we ordered by adding some of the ingredients to a very different dish and claiming it was what we ordered.

Waitress kept rubbing her nose while taking our order. Disgusting. There were people so drunk they were practically falling off their stools at the bar at 1 in the afternoon but still being served more drinks. Irresponsible.

Food is too expensive to be such a low quality experience.
Finally good Ecuadorian food
Dirty forks, a piece of plastic in my salad, and still pay more than $100. The food cold. I dont know but am not going back there. Sorry.

Food is good. They charge you if you want to take food home like wth? Who does that. Service was okay... music was very loud in our ears and it was like 5 o’clock on a Sunday. Will most likely order to go next time.

name: Cachapas y mas
reviews: I ordered the roasted pork cachapas. It was good, but I guess I was expecting a lot more based on the hype surrounding this place. Next time, I'll definitely try the cheese cachapas! @goodforjo
Plates are tasty but the portions could be bigger. I ordered a cachapa, and the size was small and could have more cheese. The passion fruit juice was really good
It is a really really good place. Nice and spacious and clean, yeh food is awesome. Ver tasty and it’s not expensive. My favorite is beef patacón. You’ll love it. They also have delivery
Really good food. I was not even familiar with Venezuelan food prior and it won me over after the first try. It's well seasoned and love the condiments it comes with. Cachapas were excellent. Mmmm!
So delicious. Unexpected gem of a place. Golden staff. Really wonderful. Huge, huge plates. If I went back, I’d split portions.

name: Mally's
reviews: Awesome quesadillas. Tacos are made on fresh handmade tortillas which is very filling. You're good with 2 tacos.

I love the food and the taste. This place may have changed cooks but they keep the food authentic. The Al pastor taco is my favorite. The taco are made of homemade tortilla. The price is fair 3 tacos for $10 deluxe or they have regular that is about $8 to $9. I would recommend calling the place prior to ordering as some days they close early or closed for the day.
Best home made taco's in Ridgewood.
Simple but delicious,  great Food, great people....
Their food is often overly salty (for my tastes) but always very delicious and served with love.

name: El Dorado
reviews: I like the variety of food in the place.  It is a big place and good customer service and every time I visit the place my order arrives quickly.  It would improve the lower volume of music
Looks like a standard diner, but the food is way better. I recommend the mofongo, it's well-made and huge. Good prices and friendly staff, I'll definitely be back.
The food here delicious & the staff very nice can't wait to go back
😋 Consistently amazing food. Huge portions. Great prices. Nice staff. Go there!😋😋
The food delicious & staff is so nice can't wait to go back

name: Jorge's
reviews: They give you so much food, the food is amazing hot, the music is amazing and the staff is wonderful! Would definitely recommend and tell a friend!

I don't know if he was the owner or manager, but the way the employees are treated is 100% unacceptable. There is no reason to mistreat the people you employ. Period. I will not be spending any more money here.

Yesterday was the first time we came to that restaurant. But It is definitely not the last time. We had great time with the attentive service, with the superb  dishes and wine and with the honest charge. We will definitely visit there in a short time.

This place definitely deserves a 1 star because they have terrible customer service, they take forever to bring food and when it comes it’s cold, also they always forget to bring a part of the order than they’ll take forever to bring what they’ve forgotten to bring. This happened many times to me and I advise y’all to buy Spanish food elsewhere.
Always good food and they don't over season the food

name: Jade Asian Express
reviews: My go to spot for chicken teriyaki.

Amazing Taste! 
Fast! Delicious! 
Shrimp Teriyaki is a must! 🙌🏼
The employees are so nice and the food is great, plus everything is reasonably priced.
They have really good chicken teriyaki

******special thing is they cook right in front of you. So, you don't need to worry about weird ingredients.
Taste - 4 stars
Service - 5 stars
Choices-4stars
FYI, try the orange chicken. The least oily I've ever had

name: Crown Fried Chicken & Pizza
reviews: My favorite fry chicken place in all area. Good stuff, good price $ and they serve good amount of food. Recommend 💯
Resonable price and delicious pizza are selling but not cleaned floor and bathroom.

DONT EVER ORDER FROM THIS PLACE!!!! SCAM!!! CALLED THE PLACE AND HE LITERALLY LIED TO ME!!! SAID THE FOOD IS ON THE WAY AND WAITED MORE THAN HOURS NEVER GOT THE FOOD!!! CALLED THEM AGAIN NEVER ANSWERED AND WENT TO VOICEMAIL!!! IF YOU CANT DO BUSINESS AND GIVING BAD SERVICE CLOSE IT OUT!!! YOU DONT DESERVE ANYONES MONEY!!! IF THIS ALLOW ME GIVE NEGATIVE STARS I WOULD GIVE YOU THAT!!!  OR NO STAR AT ALL!!!!
Great place to eat and chat. Lots of fun experience. And it's Uber eats drive friendly
They continue "A" grade from starting the shop. But New employee make it "B" from March 2017.

name: KFC
reviews: Biscuits were hard and chicken was dry and cold. Which led me to believe that the food has been out all day! Not the first time I’ve had a bad experience with this kfc. Not ordering from here again. With what is going on rn with the pandemic and all, Please make sure that the customers who are buying are getting fresh food.
This store is in very nice location L and M train stop. But I the place need and update don’t look too good.

They were slow to serve and chicken was overdone. No smiles on anyone's faces and certainly no pleasantries exchanged. I was going to ask a question about a combo meal and the man just pointed over to other woman at counter as if the question was too much for him. Isn't he working there? He's behind the counter. I was going to Popeyes fried chicken but it was further down and i was running late. I will probably never eat there again. By the way to conclude the chicken posted on pictures when place comes up on maps is FAR from what u get. Very nice looking in photos. The woman behind the counter is neither polite or nice. She should have worn a sign saying shoot me I hate my job. To the manager/owner this place needs a DO OVER.

Nice convenient location right below the Myrtle - Wyckoff station on the L and M subway lines. Service and food are good, but many times there is a long wait, even when there is only one customer ahead of you. The colors and lighting are horrible, though. They and many other KFC locations need to invest in new paint jobs and lighting fixtures with warm light bulbs. It's a restaurant, not a warehouse from the 1970s.
Service tends to run a bit behind.  Bring something to read.

name: El Montañero
reviews: I was very satisfied with the service. The food was clean, tasty and good. The delivery was timely. I ordered grilled chicken breast with rice salad and almohabanas and buñuelos.  My dad really loved it. Great service!  I will definitely order again!

Honestly I just ordered 3 Valluno wraps and 2 Large  Frijoles through seamless. I really wasn’t expecting the most amazing wraps I’ve had in along time. I’m always critiquing Colombian restaurants because their food is always too salty or tastes oddly funny. But this is one of the few places that I’ll say that I’ll be eating from in the future. I even called the restaurant to let them know how good it was. I honestly recommend you going there and trying their delicious food. You won’t regret it.
Small intimate space. Nice for dates or family dinner. They have it all.... in-house bakery and authentic Spanish food. They also serve alcohol if it's that type of night.

Loved the food!!! Servers are awesome as well and will remember you if you come by enough.
Highly recommend as a breakfast place!
Ordered the veggie omelette
My wife and I went in to purchase a carrot cake and a red velvet cake and they Both Cakes Were horrible.... A disrespect to the culinary arts...smh

name: Coyote Bohemio
reviews: I have been here a couple times. They never disappoint. Great food and great service. My son loves their chicken burrito. For the price you get plenty of food. Well worth it!

Gave this place a shot tonight because it was raining and I didn’t want to venture out to one of my usual haunts, all I got was this severed foot.

I paid $27 for shrimp cocktail and one al pastor taco, and i got no hot sauce, no limes and literally a salt bae sliver of meat sprinkled across two lukewarm tortillas. I bit into nothing but dry tortillas. Disappointing to say the least. I tried calling 4 times before leaving this review but they didn’t answer my calls either. It’s a shame, the shrimp cocktail was actually quite tasty. Won’t be coming back.
Great mexican food, great staff im always here employees are very friendly and reasonable prices.
Home cooked, authentic Mexican food done well.
Good food,  good prices. Service is ok

name: Susanos Pizzeria
reviews: food is very bad quality and does not taste good. delivery is rude. the man shouted “delivery” to the phone and ended the call. I ordered my food to be delivered between 7:30-7:40pm, I got it at 7:10pm. (What if I am not at home at that time?)I paid in advance (and of course did not tip him because of his nice manner on phone) and he was ironically saying “thanks for the tip”. RUDE!

The best deals for the quality in the neighborhood at a convenient location. I love getting fresh spinach slices. They have good choice of drinks as well. I have never been disappointed. They do not have a very high card limit like many other pizzerias do. The team works hard and does great.

I live pretty deep in bushwick, where there are not many good pizzerias around. Susanos was fast and the food is delicious. I got the chicken rollatini and a chicken broccoli slice. Food was fresh and tasty.

Delivery was contact-less, FREE, and quick.

The manicotti is good and the pizza, depending on what you order, is decent to great. The best though is hands down the buffalo chicken pizza. Probably one of the best buffalo chicken pizzas I’ve ever had. Highly recommend.

Great food, super friendly and super delicious. The customer service is perfect! And no matter what time it is.. if they don't have it.. they'll make it. Been eating here since I was a small lad. Bring your family, friends, dates. 10/10

name: El Salvador
reviews: Very good place to eat not really busy would recommend mostly served salvadorian food
Nice place my husband love their Food😍😍😍😍😍😍❤💓❤💓❤💓👍👍👍👍👍👍😊😊
Great pupusas!!!

The pupusas here are good but always order to go. The service is trash. If you're not drinking and are a woman they won't give good service. The waitresses even sit with the drunk customers and drink with them.

Staff is rude. Waitress came out with an attitude & the wrong order. I ordered (1) steak taco and she came out with a full on platter of steak, rice, beans, guacamole... i told her I didn't order this but she said I did. I know for a fact I didn't order this because I was broke. I told her I couldn't eat all that food. She took a look at my chubby build & said it would be easy for me to eat it, it should be like a snack for me. Anyways, she refused to acknowledge that maybe I was right and maybe she was wrong. She never even entertained the idea that she could be wrong. She was JADED & SHOWED NO REMORSE. To add insult to injury, my friend’s chicken taco was ice cold to the touch. As soon as he picked it up, it folded and ripped in half. Everybody here should know that ain't nothing nastier and dryer than a cold corn taco. We told her but she hit us with the spin move and walked away. I think there’s a customer service crisis in this city!!!

name: Julie’s Pizzería & Restaurant
reviews: Higly recommend this pizza! Very tasty and all products are fresh!

You know when you think of the quintessential New York City pizza slice? Thin, perfect cheese and sauce proportions, a little bit of herbs in the sauce... this place is one of them that does that perfectly.

Ordered through GrubHub and its was the best delivery I had since this whole pandemic! I ordered the Penne al Vodka with shrimp and my mother had the Grilled Salmon with Cheese Ravioli with tomatoes sauce. It came with fresh bread that was soft and a slice of lemon. Very very very good!
Great time! fast service too! Cozy place to hang with friends.👍🍕🍔🍟🥤

I ordered from here for months but they must have new owners because the cost went up the size of the pizza went down along with the quality. The ordering process is okay but the pizza isn't worth it

Julie's has great pasta but the pizza is so tiny.

name: Listo El Chimi
reviews: No joke - you could fly to the Dominican Republic, fly back to NY and your food will still not be ready. The App said they would be there in 45 min and they took 2.5 hours. If you're hungry, don't order from this place.
Food is great, but the service is as bad as it can get. Just terrible costumer service.
I've never had a a Cuban sandwich as good as the one they make at this spot 🤤 plus the lemonade they make was good aswell ♡
The food is great. Perfect for a night after drinking

I ordered a beef chimi, chicken and cheese cachapa and a platter with fried smoked pork chops and chicken with tostones. I live in New Jersey so I wanted to taste it all as I don't know when I could be back. Everything was on point! (The tostones weren't as crispy as I would have wanted them to be, but that's alright)

name: Happy Fresh Taco 墨西哥餅
reviews: Great place. the worker knows my particular order even after I left the area about a year and came back.
Terrible Tex mex knock off. Avoid

Wish I could leave a 0 star review for them. I ordered via grubhub and they took over an hour and a half to deliver the food. Food was delivered cold and when I contacted them the guy gave me an attitude saying it was my fault for not putting the right number when I put the number in the delivery instructions. And then refused to refund the order. Absolute waste of money.

Decent prices but mediocre tacos. Quesadilla cheese wasn't fully melted and tortillas tasted stale and filled with way to much lettuce to meat ratio. Seasoning and salsa was bland and non existent. Would not recommend despite the quick service.
If you are busy or don't have time for enjoy a good mexican meal. They just prepare tacos,  burritos etc for take out or delivery

name: New Mexico Place II
reviews: Cozy Place. Authentic Mexican food. Unfortunately On my last Dine In Experience the chips are unevenly cooked and the guacamole is cold not fresh and a bit sour because of what I assume to be much lemon juice used. The Huaraches however are fantastic portions are big and prices are low.
Best enchiladas ever !!! I love this place , it’s the best Mexican food in ridgewood!! Definitely recommended, it’s worth every penny!!

My friend and I had the Nachos with steak and Al pastor meat. They were delicious and well portioned. Enough for sharing if you're not too hungry. The server was really nice and attentive. I will definitely be back to try other dishes.
The food took an hour to come, the food was dry and I found pieces of bone in my taco, not only that but my quesadilla had zero cheese and was mostly veggie.
Not bad just portions is too small. Good service.

name: Los Hermanos
reviews: Good food, good peoples

name: Royal Pizza
reviews:
Wonderful pizza place with good pizza and caring employees. 
Place has been around for decades.
One of my favorite places to go.
Great food, very welcoming staff, consistently great mood. They charge affordable rates and the food quality is good. Fantastic work.
I constantly stop getting some food in this place. I enjoyed the quick service and well prepared dishes. Highly recommended.

I will order another time for their pizza. But I ordered penne Vodka and it was so bad!! The pasta was over cooked, the chicken was really dry, the sauce was really greasy. Did not come with grated cheese or a piece of toast with the pasta. The soda I ordered did come on the delivery either. The salad was fresh and the delivery was on time.
This is the place to go to get not only good and fine jewerly... but to get your kids ears pierced...he has done all 3 of my girls from my 12 yr old to now my 7 month old...Nd great customer service

name: Carlo's Pizza
reviews: Love this place been eating here as a kid pizza just keeps getting better! True nyc pizza
The slice I had was okay I had better ,this is ok if you have no other option.
Love the sicilian slice & chicken Cesar slice..quick and yummy!
Always happy with food. Last night order if chicken masala, don't know what it was but had to thrown out after 2 bites ,spaghetti just as bad, bad experience to late to call
Chicken ceasar slice is the best place is great great service good pizza and always great to sit down and watch a soccer game

name: Jim's China King
reviews: Extraordinary ambience and very welcoming service. The meals were crisp and delightful. Will surely recommend this spot to anyone. Fair rates and generous meals. Great work.

Fortunately not very picky, but my friends tell me the food was too salty and the ginger ale was flat. That normally isn't reason enough for me to leave a 1 star review. However, they chose to turn the plastic containers upside down when they put the food in so that they would have to put less in. Missing out on a few bites isn't a huge deal for me but they did this for all 3 of my orders. I've never seen a Chinese place do this. It's more about the principle of it to me, I have no doubt they consciously turned the containers upside down in order to include less food. Pictures below. Won't be ordering here again

I told my friends about this place with my warmest recommendations. I visit this place often. I get very good feedback from my friends. The dishes they serve are appetizing and the stuff is efficient and cooperative. Every time  we eat in this place we pass a lovely time.  highly recommended.
Best food, very nice staff, always good character. They charge fair rates and the food quality is great. Keep it up.
Serving up some of the best Shrimp and Broccoli I’ve had. Perfect spot in the neighborhood if you’re looking for fast, friendly service and delicious Chinese food.

name: Fresh Taco
reviews: If you are not planning to spend much but want medium to good food then you should definitely check this place out. Their service is quick. The chicken and steak was extra chewy, not what I like, but it wasn't bad. The spaghetti was surprisingly good. The nachos needed more cheese, but if you prefer little cheese then this is for you. Although, the food doesn't fill you up.

A great take on Tex Mex. Under the chicken is the beans and rice. I didn't get a photo, but they have house made hot sauce that is amazing

+ This is S2, Cost 11$ with a Can of Coke
I always love the food here! Everything is seasoned well and it's always fresh! This definitely hits the spot when hankering for some Tex Mex!
fresh, Made to order. The prices are even better.... we love fresh taco
Fresh Taco is authentic because no one makes quesadillas like them.  We moved from ridgewood to south Richmond hill and go back to fresh taco to eat our quesadillas.

name: Ltauha
reviews: Yummy, great food! I had the chicken sandwich and it was pretty darn good. The staff are attentive and the place has a lot of brunch like options. In terms of what’s in the area, this is probably one of the best brunch places I’ve been to thus far so I’d recommend eating here.

I went here yesterday with my family for brunch. There are a lot of options for brunch. Everyone ordered something different and everyone enjoyed their food. The staff were very kind and attentive. The only reason I knocked off a star is because we were seated in the middle of the room which is in direction of the wind when the door opens. Our drinks and food got cold quickly and I felt chilled. I wonder why the restaurant doesn’t utilize an outer door as a shell as most restaurants do during cold weather; especially since the place is so small. I would definitely visit again though! The food was good!
Consistently friendly and attentive staff serving delicious meals including some very enticing specials. Skate fish sandwich is so tasty. Highly recommend!
Perfect brunch, great price
This is a great hidden gem. The owners / management really know how to run a restaurant. I’ve been coming here since I moved into the neighborhood 3 years ago. Keep up the good work guys.

name: Estrella Del Mar
reviews: This restaurant is truly amazing.  Their food is so delicious.  The have fresh octopus salad that will blow you away.  Their mofongo is so good and there are so many to choose from. Their soup is hearty and delicious. The service is fast and very friendly. They also have a bar. Bathrooms are very clean. You will not regret going here to eat.  Spacious back area for large groups.  Big screen TVs showing sports .  Coffee is so good. And the price!?!  You will not believe it because for such great food it is not expensive at all.  Love this restaurant.
Good mofongo, good food. But not a good service, i eat here very often but never a good service
Consistent as usual!

We used to live nearby to this restaurant and it was our go-to! EVERYTHING here is good! We now live in Long Island and will take the trip back just for their food! Long Island lacks good, authentic Dominican food. We have tried several local to us and do not measure up at all!
Very tasty inexpensive food don't forget to try the Sangria yum.

name: Lee's
reviews: This is one of my favorite restaurant I’ve been going here for over 10 years the food was great the drinks by Kenny was incredible it breaks my heart to see that they are no longer open for business idk what happened but I’m gonna miss Mr Lee’s Restaurant a lot 🤦🏾‍♂️

I can’t believe the audacity of this restaurant. My family and I spent over 150$ on dinner and were more than satisfied with our food. The portions were nice and big and we were excited to have food left over to bring home. When we asked to take the rest of our food to go, they happily took our semi-full plates to the back of kitchen to wrap it for us. It wasn’t until we got home that we realized, the restaurant took more than half our leftover food off of our plates. After paying so much money, thinking we got such great service, little did we know they gave us a small portion of our leftover food, which we already paid for. More than half of my plate was missing. All that money wasted on food I won’t ever get to finish. NEVER AGAIN!! If you do decide to eat here make sure to bring your own Tupperware to wrap your leftover food. I can’t believe they had the nerve to take food off my plate. I’m so hungry right now, I was really looking forward to my leftover food...
Great service,clean bathroom and great food. What more can a hungry man ask for. Ohhhh...can't forget about the drinks.. Great place to grab take out or if you want to enjoy a nice sit down meal.
I just love the grill garlic shrimp and the springs roll.
Love Lee’s Restaurant- For so many years now- Thinking I’ll have dinner this week there

name: McDonald's
reviews: Fresh food fast service. Absolutely nothing to complain about however I do have to say that they gotta do a better job on following instructions because I requested no pickles nor onions in my food but I found myself taking them out by hand while eating. Besides that everything else is perfect.!

This has to be the worse experience I have ever had. Now, this McDonald's wants to force you to order at the kiosk and then still go to the register to pay which makes absolutely no sense. Thank you for all the great moments I've had there as I will never step foot into this McDonald's again... I am going to drive a little further up Myrtle and go to the one on Myrtle ave and Cooper as I get treated like a human being and not a like robot.
I love it!
It's relatively clean. The service was adequate. The automated ordering is nice.
Very courteous staff! Food is nice and hot! Great atmosphere and comfortable! Just try to leave before the hungry 3 O' clock school kid rush gets out! LoL!

name: Lin's Garden
reviews: Had a awesome experience in this spot with my son. The food arrived fast and the customer service is just good. Prices are convenient.

The prices and quantity of food are very reasonable. Quality, however, seems to be a tier lower. I got a combination of fried seafood ($5.50) which just really didn't do it for me, the food was rather tasteless. Fried rice was fine, didn't have very much salt (which is fine, just added some soy sauce). Food was hot, didn't have to wait very long. Very nice employee.
Best Chinese delivery in the neighborhood. Always get the order perfect, reasonable prices and super fast delivery. I have ordered from here for about two years and have never been disappointed.
Good service, faster and good food
Nice service,nice food.

name: Balcon De Quito
reviews: Great service & tasty food for reasonable price. I plan to go again and try out more items from their menu. More photos to come!
Pricing isn't great, took to long for food to get made, service and experience was terrible, overall not going back. There are better ecuadorian restaurants in Brooklyn.
The experience of the restaurant was very good. food was excellent, and the service was also very excellent. The restaurant was also very comfy and very clean.
Good for lunch
Good food

name: Seneca Fiesta Corporation
reviews: Good place.. to enjoy a could 🍺
Best Latino bar by far, security and management are Great people.
It's a good place

This place are rats they charge double
Never again going back
Está más o menos

name: The Seneca
reviews: I do not love the area but the bar was nice and relaxed. The prices for the drinks is reasonable. The music was good and the activities where very entertaining. The dishes where a bit on the smaller side...

The place is beautiful and huge. Would be amazing for parties and friends from out of town but sadly the prices and food just don’t make it inviting. The beer selection is vast but the prices are outrageous. The mixed drinks are worse for the price but could be so so good if just more $5-8 drinks. Limit the selection, curate the food a bit more (is it all american? Is it southern? Is it vegetarian friendly? Is it a coffee bar?) and get that website updated with a google calendar to list all the events!  I see on your chalkboard outside things advertised but when i want to be reminded of what happens on what day I cannot find the information!  This has great potential and is very cozy but just needs to have a price point to match the neighborhood.

Definitely not a 4.5 start place. My friend and I waited for over 45 minutes for our food and saw people who came in after we ordered get their food before us. When the food finally came it wasn’t cooker the way I ordered it. By the time they brought it out again my friend had finished her brunch and my Benedict was still not cooked well. Disappointing experience.

Found this place on Instagram before visiting, they’ve done a really food job branding themselves and creating a steady stream of events. Only been a couple times, one of the times we were under the impression drinks were 2 for 1 but our bill proved that was tragically not the case. Still, nice casual atmosphere good for a small gathering or unpretentious date.

This has been a neighborhood favorite for me, since it opened. I would host mommy time meetups, I love everyone who works (& worked) here. I have brought so many people to this spot, they fall in love too. We have celebrated my birthday here. I love the food, I rather pay a little more for farm to table food. Love their specials , happy hour. Food ! Lol and dessert , when they have Ice Cream haha inside joke #aroundridgewood #lifewithjess #itsjessNYC

name: I Sushi
reviews: Always order the avocado rolls with brown rice and they're always good and filling for a decent price. Cashier guy is cool, you can tell he's just there to do his job lol. They give you your food as you wait by the counter. Make sure you're being charged correctly, though.
I order takeaway and I couldn’t pick up my food, because nobody respond on the phone and entrance is closed! 🤬 I do not recommend this place!
Very delicious meal, at least in this area, I like this restaurant the most, especially fried shrimp.

I ordered via UberEats and received hands down the worst sushi I've ever had. It was far worse than even the worst supermarket sushi I've had. All of the fish (aside from the salmon, which had an abnormally thick layer of slime on it), was dry and crusty on the top, and had obviously been sitting. It tasted far from fresh. I managed to find a small handful of hairs in my sushi, spread out surprisingly evenly amoung the rolls/sushi pieces. Finally, I decided to contact the restaurant, at which point the woman who picked up began screaming at me (while forgetting to listen) as soon as I gave her even the slightest of criticisms.
really fresh sushi with a selection of 12 sauces

name: Himalayan Momo
reviews: Delicious dumplings! Tried the beef and chicken, 8 for $6.
Delicious!  Hot sauce is really hot.  I always get the vegetable momos.  Quality is consistent.
Really tasty food for a great price!

name: Zema Deli Grocery Inc.
reviews: Great food and fast service.
They moved across the street, and the location is better and bigger, but still packed because they are awesome. I wish them the best luck in their new place.

I almost stopped myself from posting.

I want to go and eat there all the time without any competion from you hungry people.

If I comment (5 stars) I'll never get a seat.

This is truly a charming little spot to go to (in the early morning or for lunch) before you head to the train station nearby.
Love their sausage egg and cheese sandwiches! Sausage links not those patties from the deli’s!

There is no place
Around this place
Like this place
So this must be
THE PLACE!
Gory's Place

The BEST breakfast spot around!!!!! 
#facts

name: Quick n fresh
reviews: Tasty Indian food, fresh and quick as named! Friendly and responsive staff. Mainly take-out and delivery,  only limited counter seating for dine-in.🏽 Clean if tiny place. Hopped in to try this very new little spot I saw days ago. Easy to miss. Next to the newstand-deli and directly across from Myrtle-Wyckoff Aves train station. I will be back for a quick bite, or take-out. Oh and their garlic naan is heavenly, if potent! Delicious!

It’s my pleasure that we a authentic Indian restaurant in my area “ Quick n Fresh” they all the varieties of Indian dishes also they making guest choices dishes, now we have a choice to eat different dishes in different days. I invite everyone come & enjoy the great dishes. Thanks “ Quick n Fresh”
Wow finally an Indian restaurant with all the delicious food in my neighborhood
Now we have dine in area as well .nice food nice weather n nice staffs superv .go and visit with family and have dine in.nepalese food is going to serve soon
The best Indian take out spot in New York. The staff are very welcoming and attentive. The food is fresh and  quick i love it!!! 100% will recommend to others.

name: Garam Masala
reviews: Really great place to drop by for lunch or dinner. They had delicious flavorful and aromatic food. The restaurant itself was clean, new and great service. I recommend the lamb korma and garlic naan.
I cannot recommend enough. Delivery was timely and the food was incredibly delectable, the saag paneer especially! Will definitely order again.
Sooo goood absolutely recommendation great food !!
By far one of my favorite spots in Ridgewood! The food is amazing - must try!!

The food is extremely good, you can BYOB and the service is incredible. Example, my friend is on a weird diet where she can't eat onions. She asked the server if she could order curry without onions and they were extremely accommodating. Come, people, deliciousness awaits!

name: Bklyn Cart Halal Food Est. 1997
reviews: Located immediately outside of the Myrtle-Wyckoff Avenues Subway Station L & M. Friendly service. Hardworking individual. Gyro was pretty solid and very filling for the price ($5!). Definitely go for the lamb over the chicken. There are some rocks nearby to sit on and eat.

Pretty solid chicken over rice, I regretfully killed it all in the middle of the night. Regretfully because I wasn't hungry, but it was very delicious. I'm pretty sure this place is always open. If you're in need of some halal at a normal or crazy hour, come through.
Great spot. Definitely recommend the falafel and lamb over rice
Delicious food and good service too
Excellent food at very fair prices

name: Mexican Food Cart
reviews: Bad, pricey food cart that uses expired meat. Come here if you want food poisoning like I did from this cart TWICE.
Great food ,amazing service , reliable late night eats!

Always get my local tacos from here 😁 Their tortillas have gotten better too. Flavour is great. Service is standard, nothing special. The smell of their food captivates you as you exit the train station🤤
The chefs make their tortillas fresh on the premises, delicious authentic Mexican food.

Service is poor, though food is decent. Woman is rude. Went for months, couple of times a week, she actually got more rude despite being a recognized regular. In fact, she seemed resentful for inexplicable reasons. Eventually I noticed she is like this with other people too, with rare exceptions. Go elsewhere, there are tons of other, more professional and better food trucks to patronize and not get a nasty disposition.

name: While in Kathmandu
reviews: Prompt and friendly service. The food was great and generous portions for the price. The only downside is that this place is cash only (but there are signs indicating that as well as an ATM for those who don't come prepared, like me).
Went there for my birthday dinner last night we had a great time. Everyone enjoyed the food and ambience . Lovely decor. Service was top notch. They have outdoor seatings as well.

This place is REALLY good. My top brunch choice in the neighborhood. It’s really hard to find healthy food in Ridgewood, so it’s been refreshing having this as an option. The food is always high quality and tastes delicious. The outdoor seating is also really nice on warm days. The only thing to keep in mind is the wait is a little long. So come hungry but not TOO hungry.

Delicious. Everything made from scratch to order. Fresh ingredients. Attentive service from Andy. Food does take a little longer but it’s well worth the wait for everything to be made to order with no shortcuts!
Tasty food with friendly service. Come with friends so you can try it all! Ask if your dish can be made vegan-it may not be listed on the menu.

name: Tamales Atlixco
reviews: Los mejores tamales en new york

name: Food Bazaar Supermarket
reviews: Nice variety and selection with fair pricing. Also very happy that the registers always ring up the advertised price. Not like the associated supermarket on Seneca ave and Stockholm St that's usually very expensive and has mediocre quality and u have to check out that you are charged the advertised sale price.

There are many New organic products and very convenient for free parking.
I love any kind of international items like Korean pear which came from Korea. 
Most Cashiers are very kind.

Great supermarket for Vegans
Finding a good selection of vegan food for cheese and milk is never easy, but this market has a surprisingly good selection and prices. Their frozen section is also good, but getting Quorn products would be even better. 
I now take a short train ride here twice a month to stock up on vegan options along with some other staple bargains. The staff is always helpful and friendly too.

Above average variety of produce and certain food categories. Prices are mixed with multiple bargains depending on your needs. Definitely not a premium store.  Worthy of a stop if you are nearby but be weary of peak times as the parking lot can get crazy with drivers that have no regard for safety or driving courtesies.

One of the best in town ..being going here snice i was born ..everything you need you'll find him ..good sales ..go check them out you would love it ...always a place to make you feel happy walking out ..believe that!!!!!

name: Plaza Piaxtla Bakery
reviews: A well kept secret, delicious pastries and cakes beautifully decorated that taste delicious. My personal favorite. Friendly and accommodating owners.

Love tres leces could make me fat
So fire
Tres leche cakes are always great and very inexpensive. I buy them for all my functions. A+
I’ve ordered many cakes from here, hands down best bakery. 👍🏼💯
The best Tres Leche cake around

name: International Bake Shop
reviews: Best place ever! Pastry and bread are always fresh. And the Macedonian Lady that works there is super nice! Amazing place! Thank you for this experience. :)
Got a huge loaf of homemade bread for $3.50 and the owner threw in a yummy breadstick for free! I’ll have to come back to try the other baked goods.
Bought a fresh, still warm bread
