Gentrifiers, this is a place that does what Queens can be. 

The bread is always fresh and hard to stop eating when it's warm. The sweets are solid, too.
One of the most welcoming family run local businesses. Their breads are great and their pastries are so special. This is a true quality place.

name: Calibella Bakery
reviews: It's a joy to have a Latin bakery on Seneca Avenue.  The place is always clean and all the food is excellent and is not old food.  I love coffee and good customer service
Delicious bread and friendly service. A great new addition to the neighborhood

name: Joel's Bakery
reviews: The cakes at this place are amazing and affordable compared to the crazy quotes you’ll receive from other bakeries in the area. What I love about them is that they will take on any challenge when it comes to cake design. They are my family’s go to and I would order this cake for any event in NYC. I’ve ordered cakes from them for parties I’ve planned in Bushwick, the Bronx and Harlem. They are the best!
Not a very good place. The pastries are dry and not of good quality – that's why they're cheap, I guess. It's all about standards. Also very cramped, there's barely room to stand.
Great cakes at very good prices...friendly staff.
Great bakery. The best prices. Oatmeal great!! Coffee Great!!!Cakes and pastries Great!!!

Good coffee good oatmeal good hot chocolate
Only bad thing is the size it's very small so it's just a grab and go

name: Cafe Nala
reviews: Cute and cozy local cafe. Close to the train so it's convenient in the morning for a quick breakfast on the go, and seating is also available if you want to stop in. Breakfast was great and the service was amazing. I would highly recommend the energy protein balls!
Friendly and fast service! I had an americano and their egg bacon sandwich. They accept credit cards and cash, barista was helpful with the menu, great local coffee shop. Highly recommend!
It has a new name: “cafe nala”. It is a completely remodeled place which is very good because it does not look like the old house.  With the new remodeling I can see the most modern place.
Great cafe , friendly staff, delicious food . The Irish breakfast and the protein balls did it for me. Highly recommended
Great cafe! Best Irish breakfast in Ridgewood.

name: The Stoop
reviews: Our new favorite breakfast/lunch spot! Every dish I’ve ate at The Stoop is phenomenal. I highly recommend their bagels and veggie cream cheese! The egg and cheese sandwich is insanely good. My boyfriend loves the mac n cheese sandwich. The staff is always pleasant. Thanks, guys!

Loveliest new coffee shop in Ridgewood! Excellent vegan sandwiches and donuts and great coffee already make me happy, but this place has extras...super comfortable workspace with plugs and wifi, killer light with huge windows, and clean, chic decor. Plant nerds like me will appreciate the greenery everywhere, and the proprietors are fabulous.

The mother-son owners here are doing something really great. Everything is a homemade recipe and you’ll find most (if not all) of their vegan substitutes are made in-house. Not to mention the atmosphere is amazing. It’s the perfect place to work from home or grab a bite on the way to the train. It’s so reasonably priced too!

Had a wonderful egg and cheese sandwich here. Nice start to a business in the neighborhood- can't wait to see how they grow. Maybe have a dirty dish bin available for customers to bus their dishes at the end of the meal

new family owned business in the heart of Ridgewood ❤️❤️❤️ we were so excited for this finally to open, their donuts are incredible, the staff is super friendly and i love their interior decoration. The Stoop welcome to our neighborhood.

name: Milk & Pull
reviews: Great bagel sandwiches! Had a smoked salmon one and also the one with turkey and avocado. Both really good. They were so nice they gave me a taste of their pistachio cardamom cake, SO delicious too!

I’m still dreaming about the Iced Dirty chai with oat milk I had the other day with a salted caramel brownie. Every sip and every bite was amazing as the first taste! A very memorable coffee shop experience. So delicious.
Nice shop to chill and do some work. Coffee was good!

Great little cafe that founds it's way into Ridgewood, a town that has changed significantly in the past 3 - 5 years. The coffee art is pretty and you get a big cup of coffee filled to the rim. Almost afraid to spill walking back to my seat. The donuts and other breakfast treats are a good compliment. Get that sugar rush and help keep you awake for a better part to start your day.

Our favorite place in Ridgewood/Bushwick!!!
You need to try Roasted bush bagel - pure perfection.
The atmosphere is great, you can come and drink coffee with friends or just take a laptop and do your things. 5+

name: Ridgewood Veterans Triangle
address: Myrtle Ave. &, Cypress Ave, Ridgewood, NY 11385, USA
reviews: Bad

name: Rama
reviews:
Consistently great food, friendly staff, and a killer lunch special: two appetizers, a main + a drink for $8-9. Recently renovated so same great food, but now served on swanky ceramic plates. Somehow I have never seen the place crowded.

The name has changed along with the remodel, so now it’s Cham Thai (originally Rama Thai)
The service is always swift, lovely mood, very nice staff members. Will return again when I arrive here.
Friendly service and tasty food! Hidden gem in Ridgewood.
The service was so nice. Our waitress was pleasantly patient with her first timers questions about the menu. The food was so fresh and delicious.

Honestly I wouldn’t even give this place a 1 star but I had to in order to write this review. I ordered chicken pad Thai and it was so dry— no sauce and very bland absolutely no taste. (It wasn’t sweet or spicy) Do yourself a favor and order someplace else.

name: Super Pollo
reviews:
It was ok.
Salmon was hard on the edges.
Fries looked old but taste ok.
The chicken was a little on the dark side.
I loved the salad.... mainly because it was the only thing that looked fresh.
Everything else sucks as far as freshness goes. 

I did not like the fact the my order was not stapled....... 
🚫🚫🚫🚫🚫🚫🚫🚫🚫🚫🚫🚫🚫🚫🚫🚫

I actually enjoy rotisserie chicken in here
Usually just take out and eat at home
But today I decided stay and enjoy table al fresco to be honest kind of disappointed of the service, apparently they only have two server on a Friday night. 
Also I felt left out, maybe because it was just me and no a table with four people or six ( I think server was thinking it won’t be making enough tips with me)
Anyway I’ll just order to go from
Now on
Visited several times with my wife and we never leave disappointed. Love the pork chop with rice and beans. Very good avocado salad. Also have happy hour for drinks. Great neighborhood place.
The food was good and the service was quick. However, I asked for my leftovers "to go" and was charged a service fee for it. I find that pretty ridiculous.
SP is now responsible for at least 60% of my body mass, but I loved every meal. Best chicken in NYC. I know how crazy that sounds, but its true.

name: Ridgewood Eats
reviews: I havent eaten here in quite some time and I have to say it was a much better experience this time around. The food was great and the service was just as good.  Menu items have changed and next I will definitely try something new.
Ordered for delivery a few times already and was so happy that they actually listen to the instructions and not mess up my orders.  The food is also very tasty. Very happy with this place.

The service was great! Although there was some borderline communication issues, it wasn't enough to ruin the experience! Some menu items had pictures to show how they would be served (e.g., the brownie a la mode show in the picture), however others did not, and once you've gotten your order, it may not be what you expect. Every server is friendly and paying is legitimately easy, even though they have a separate counter to pay. I highly recommend Ridgewood Eats to anyone who is looking to have a comforting meal and a good atmosphere to enjoy chat sessions with friends!
Food was pretty  good although I did find an eyelash on my plate but unfortunately it was after I had finished eating. And these things can happen anywhere so I didn't make a big deal outta of it.
Good food good service clean place freindly staff

name: Domino's Pizza
reviews: This is the second time I have ordered delivery from this place, and the delivery WAS NEVER MADE. After 4 hours I got a phone call from a rude woman saying she had the pizza. When I told her my guests were already gone, she hung up and would not pick up again. I spoke very nicely to her despite how long it took,  and she still behaved that way. I would recommend no one ever order from this location. They wont change until they face serious legal action.  Clearly the management is using this technique to make money without providing the service. When I called the next day to tell the manager,  I was told they wouldn't refund and to try to dispute the claim through my bank. So they won't refund for food they never delivered,  much less delivered in a reasonable amount of time. I hope enough people complain about this location,  and they face the consequences they deserve. Very unprofessional.

You have to double up cheese and toppings (and pay for it of course) at this location if you want to get a pizza. Otherwise, you'll end up with a naked crust. Really disappointing. I'm tired of ordering a pizza and pay for the price of two. I recommend folks to order from another Domino's location. I'm personally fed up. Never seen a pizza with such a severe lack of cheese and toppings. For a time, I guessed the delivery guy used to systematically eat my cheese... You do what you want people. But on my part, I won't order again. It's over now.

These guys really work!! In a Super Bowl night they were making sure you got what you ordered. PS: People, be reasonable, if you know it will be a busy night don't come and get over these guys for running out of something, it's completely normal. They try their best meanwhile you're at home scratching your butt. Keep the good work!

Usually I never have a problem with this Dominos, I like the food it always arrives on time  never an issue there. My whole issue is the ridiculous hour schedule of a Sunday night. If your whole schedule 6 days out of the week is till 2, what is the overall difference in closing an hour earlier on Sunday. I know it’s a rather petty issue but it doesn’t make any sense. Mine as well keep a consistent schedule and keep it open an hour later. Other than that I like, but that Sunday schedule doesn’t make any sense. Totally messed my Sunday night up.
Was very satisfied! I was also happy I received an email of a free 2 topping medium pie! Buy a pie! Win a pie! 😎

name: Madison Pizza
reviews: Was with her sister on her birthday. Pleasantly impressed with the surprise of the kitchen, they made pizza and wrote greetings on it. Love them...
I love this pizzeria. The pizza is the best. My favorite slice is the buffalo. The people that work there are all so friendly and welcoming.

There are many choices when it comes into pizza in the city, we accidentally stumbled upon this place trying to get some authentic New York pizza pie while heading to the airport. Right when we walked in, we were greeted with a smile and friendly greeting, when we got our pizza it blew my mind how good the pizza was, amazing!! The cookies are fantastic too!! Melted warm chocolate chip cookies, be sure to order extra, you won't regret it. 

This experience has gained our business for life, we will always go back here when visiting New York City.

Thank you!!
Best gyro and wraps in all of upstate NY! Stop in and see for yourself! Ricardo is the best chef!
Wonderful hospitality, and hot food made with special care. The food was sooooo good! Glad to have this pizza spot nearby!

name: Taco Bell
reviews: I love Taco Bell . These guys prepared my order so perfect. The staff was very mature and professional. The environment was clean and very relaxing.
It's Taco Bell best of the fast foods. I've never had a bad experience and this one lived up to all the other visit per usual

This was a cheesy Gordita crunch and it seriously was nasty, it was soggy and it even made me sick. I only ate it cause I was hungry. I will not be eating here anymore. They were just close by the department of health for what I heard was a rat infestation. The employees are really nice, but that place is disgusting. They even let this homeless guy chill in there which I don’t think is wrong but gosh it’s a business and a restaurant. That place is nasty.
Always my favorite location to eat in all of NYC. However, surprised that this establishment is dirty. All tables are dirty and the trash bins are filled to the top -- very surprising.
I really loved the food and customer service, good area close to my apartment. The employees are always super friendly. Would recommend to others.

name: Tasty's
reviews: First time trying with the wife and it was absolutely amazing. Food was great and very tasty. Wonderful customer service 👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻

Order seamless from Tasty’s often and sometimes come in for a late lunch and am always happy with food and experience.  Came in this morning for a Presidents’ Day breakfast for myself, place was 3/4 empty, and they denied my request for a booth.  

I get it if it’s busy - but was really disappointed with this and left and went to a different breakfast spot a couple minutes from Tastys.  It’s disappointing, I get it if it’s busy, but it was 8:45am and was not busy and they could have accommodated a single for a booth.
The price is great and so is the food, the staff is really nice. I have been going here since like 2005 and still continue going.
Food was good but the space is very small the booths are for people that weigh 100 pounds me as a big person I am couldn't fit

This place offers breakfast, lunch and dinner staying true to the diner format. They serve incredible food with affordable prices, I recommend coming here for a nice meal with Friends and family at any time of the day. You’ll be greeted by the amazing staff that works quickly and efficiently even with a full house, came in while it was packed and was seated after 10 minutes. Truly an amazing place in a wonderful city.

name: Yummy Chinese 美味
reviews:
Never had a complaint about this place. Speedy Delivery, great portions,  affordable pricing warm food - everything is just great! 
I especially love it when they write "thank you" on the egg roll wrapper....warms my heart. 
Highly recommended. I don't order Chinese takeout from anywhere else in this area - my only go-to spot.

Always on point and nothing is ever missing or wrong in the order. Very fast (off-peak hours) and very true with their delivery times all other times. Best spot, always order from here and it’s just awesome that they never disappoint! Ordered again and arrived 10 mins after placing order on seamless. They included the spring roll free with the order!
Delicious food and pretty fast service. Honestly a hidden gem for fast food chinese in the area
I tried vegetarian chicken meal and white meat style, not bad!
My favorite place to eat. They're the best

name: Creme&sugar
reviews: So tasty orange ice cream with dark chocolate. I wish I had bought bigger one... 🤩 Nice service. It’s worth trying.

Although quaint and a much needed addition to the neighborhood, The portions are small and the ice cream(while good) over priced. We paid $15 for two scoops and the cone was stale. There’s a two sample rule which is fine, but would help if they gave enough ice cream to actually taste the flavor.

This review is fore ice cream I had in the summer. The store s small so eat it outside. But they have stuff for cold weather too. I had sparkling strawberry. I like it because it is unique! Sorry I uploaded the wrong photo and cant seem to delete this.
Cute hang out place in the corner of the hood, tamales is exceptionally delicious
Amazing authentic Peruvian food. Can't wait to go back for the pork tamales. Bring your dog for some dog friendly ice ice cream. Worth the trip

name: The Ridgewood Ale House
reviews: Great spot to chill. They have great hookah (I recommend mint flavor).food is great. Drinks are great. music is great on the weekends . & Service is also on point 👌🏼
Overall decent.Good to watch the game with  the crew and enjoy a few drinks.Didn't think the food was that amazing but it's not bad.The staff was friendly.
Never eat their food. The only thing semi decent is the pizza, and only when your drunk. I only go on weekends sometimes for the music. Stick to beers or shots. Drinks are not good.
Went there with friends.. awesome atmosphere.. drinks were not so great. Order 2 virgin piña colada and pineapple was sour.. they didn't even  offer a free drink .. food was good.

Amazing food! Good drinks! Had a bday celebration and Jewels/Jules was the only one there and did an amazing job servicing over 20 people by herself! She was very professional, cool. Calm and collected despite our party of alot of tipsy people!

name: San Remo
reviews: I am giving 3 stars because I ordered a family meal and the order arrived fairly quickly. So the three stars are for their speedy delivery.  I ordered a large pie, an order of mozzarella sticks and buffalo wings. The pizza was very tasty. So were the mozzarella sticks. The buffalo wings, advertised as such with a side of blue cheese dressing, were tasty. However, they were breaded but plain. No buffalo wing sauce to be found other than what is in the photo I have attached to this review. I feel they could do a better job with the dish. Don't advertise it as buffalo wings when that is not what you are providing. It was pretty disappointing.

Went here today for the first time. The pizza was really good. The person that took care of me was very nice friendly and helpful. I would have given 4 and 1/2 stars if I could. The only reason I wouldn't give 5 stars is because I do have a favorite pizza place, that I like the pizza better, but, it is in Manhattan. This is my new neighborhood favorite pizza.

This place has some of the best pizza around. Great sauce, not doughy, and with plenty of options. My favorite is their margherita pizza. If you are in the area, stop by. You will not be disappointed.
TERRIBLE! Ordered an Italian hero, it was a ham and kraft “American style cheese” sandwich. And the eggplant parm hero tasted cold and uncooked. Worst hero I’ve had in NY

Decent pizza for a good price. Don't let the three stars dissuade you from grabbing a slice if you're in the neighborhood. Crust is thin and crunchy, I would have liked more sauce on the pizza, but that's a personal opinion. They gave me some after I asked for it which was nice. Overall a good experience with friendly staff.

name: La Flor Del Paraiso
reviews: My childhood fave! Amazing Latin food always made fresh and delicious soups. Always feel at home and the staff is very sweet
Food was delicious as always love the service, waitresses are very friendly. Highly recommended
Delicious Dominican, food great prices.
Love this place. Workers: very friendly and the food is delicious.  Clean place.
Food taste sooo good. Taste never changed since I was younger. A little expensive though

name: New Texas Chicken and Grill
reviews: The best fried chicken, fries, hamburgers, and biscuits in  all Nyc.... love this spot been going for about 22 years.... hygiene is on point love that cooking area and seating area is always super clean... will eat here before eating at any bigger national  chain... you must check this spot out
Food was gr8. Clean and good service

Love this place. The fried chicken is good, but my go to is the grilled chicken sandwich combo with potato wedges. Food is made to order, fast, and delicious. Perfect for late night drunchies or if you just don't want to cook after work.
Fried chicken is fantastic (fries are delicious as well). The staff are always nice and courteous.
DO NOT GO TRASH 🤢

name: Randy's
reviews: I visit this spot a lot since I work nearby. I like how the service is always awesome and they keep the spot well kept consistently. Pricing is convenient and they serve large portions.
The food is good, but they need to hire someone who is people friendly, with customer service skills that doesn't come across as to eager and greedy to take your money so fast!

Hey food is not bad, but ordering on the phone gave me an headache taking the order. Orders are tiny, for the price. The price you pay for small order you can get a large anyway else. Don’t order here if you expect to be ripped off and still hungry after you eat. Instead order from my fave place which was closed today 😭, China Garden on irvine.

They get away with they're rude behavior because they know they can. They have a prime location. I ordered and it took an hour to get to me and I had to reheat my food because it was cold. I live 3 blocks away why is my food cold why it took an hour to get to me. And than they only give me 1 soy sauce when I asked for additional soy sauce its absurd

My quart container of wonton soup spilled inside the entire bag, and ruined the whole order. Food was inedible. Called the restaurant and spoke to Sofia, who was obnoxious and rude and refused to reimburse me and hung up on me twice. Never ordering from here ever again. Food is not that great and this was the worst customer service I have ever experienced.

name: Nepalese Indian Restaurant
reviews: This restaurant offers extraordinary service as well as yummy menu. One of the best spot ever. The food arrived quickly and the rates are fair. Highly recommended.
Food was good. Service was good and friendly.
I just liked their food. I always get awesome service here. The place is well kept and the staff members are always welcoming. Would recommend to others.
The food is regularly well prepared and tasty, employees provides fantastic customer service. I like how clean it is and ambience. Will visit here again.
Lovely place with either booths and some tables. Place great for chatting with friends over a meal. Attentive staff, good menu variety. One of the comfortable, simple restaurants in the neighborhood.

name: Rico Pollo
reviews: My spot for Dominican food. If you're looking for that "home flavor" in This area of Brooklyn, this is the place to get it. The food is just amazing.
Best place in Queens!

Food was good at first when they first started now is disgusting!!!!!!! The oil  looks like they never change it is so unhealthy,they no longer cook like before I’m so disappointed I don’t know if they have a new chief or they became to famous and decided that they didn’t care anymore about how their food is.... never again lost me as a customer 😑😑😑😑😑
Food is good. Not the cleanest place..we were eating and their were roaches crawling on the walls. My son refuses to go back. I order my chicken tenders from there they are delicious
Oh me and my husband we going there again I don't need anybody who and he don't either but believe it or not it tasted like I cooked it I love the place they treat you good is yes good good good good

name: Hungry Burrito
reviews: I wish I had taken a photo of the chicken burrito I had but I inhaled it too quickly 😂😋 it was delicious and well seasoned! The sauces they put on the burrito were tasty. I also had a virgin daiquiri which was also delicious. I will eat from here again 😊

Food was quality. Price point was fair for a decent restaurant in Brooklyn. Atmosphere was nice with a hole in the wall feel. Out door seating was perfect for a pleasant early fall night. The Burrito was too hot to hold and eat so fork and knife it was... Still pretty good and above par for a Mexican restaurant.

This place right around the corner to my house. And i have not for one minute gotten tired of bringing my family here. The servers are so kind and friendly and the food is just amazing. And they have. Happy hour so you know your getting a deal on those drinks.

Hungry Burrito has good food, a great atmosphere, a great happy hour drink menu, but the service from the server Alex, was warm and friendly in the beginning and his demeanor waned as the time passed. It seemed like we were a bother to him. We were a table of fifteen and he forgot to put water in some of the glasses, and forgot to give some of the people in the party plates for their appetizers. He seemed to only be friendly when he was asking if we wanted another drink. Alex happily took our initial drink orders and even made suggestions. When he was given back the menu and told that we had reordered and paid for the food his attitude changed. I would recommend Hungry Burrito anytime to anyone. The food is excellent and the prices are reasonable, but the waiter affected my rating of this restaurant in a big way. I always say that sometimes a chef may has an off day or off moment that affects the food, but good service should never be lacking in a restaurant.
The place looked very nice, I ordered the burrito. It was very good. I recommend.

name: Las Chilangas Restaurant
reviews: Best spot in town ... food was great and tasty ,             we will definitely be back soon !
The food was delicious, the service was perfection and while we were there they were playing Juan Gabriel

I was anxious to try this place when I noticed it was opening. I decided to cruise over tonight and get a burrito to go. Everyone I interacted with was super nice, and my carne asada burrito was delicious and well prepared. I’m excited to eat in the restaurant next time and try more of the menu.

The food is really good and the people that work there is very friendly, the place is cozy, my girlfriend and I we have a good time here. 
I’ll recommend this place to try all the garnachas from us DF.

Breakfast here was so good - huevos rancheros and chilaquiles both were perfectly done. Prices are super reasonable and staff was incredibly friendly. Great addition to the neighborhood, I’ll be coming back soon!

name: M&S
reviews: There food is fresh made and there prices are great for that food.
Just okay. Products are inexpensive.

Delicious Ecuadorean food with a real authentic flavor. I had the sancocho (fish soup) which was perfectly seasoned and guatita. It reminds me of my grandmothers cooking. I also had the empanada de queso which was cheese heaven! A little hole in the wall gem. Highly recommend.

Thank you!
Good food😋😋
Customer service suckssssss!

name: Rolo’s
reviews: The best restaurant in Brooklyn -- coming soon...
We are so excited for this!!!

name: Bambino Pizza the Original
reviews: Bambino's Pizza is the best. It tastes delicious all the time I go for pizza that taste and texture is always the same DELICIOUS.....You should goband try it. You wont be disappoint it.
Thoroughly enjoyed the meat lovers pizza.  Popular place and I can understand why.
They make the best white pizza!!! The owners are super friendly too;)

You'd be better served to walk a block down to San Remos near Cypress Ave. 
The crust here is bland and overly chewy. The sauce tastes like it came right out of a can.
Word of mouth in the neighborhood has declared this the worst pizza around.
Mom likes the taco pizza, but even she won't come to this place now.
The owners SEEM nice, but a number bad experiences have taught some customers and other local business owners otherwise. Beside all that, the place is way overpriced for the poor quality of food.

Not a good business for our community.
Love this place!

name: Burger King
reviews: i give it 4 stars because inside it was super hot and the humidity was extreme. the food was good though, and the place was clean. the latinas working there were very kind with me

Visited her right before they closed for a quick bite to eat on Halloween eve. Food was dry, fries were cold, and the girls seemed as if they didn't want to work. Have visited this location once in the day and no complaints. I guess it's all based on the time of day and the person working.

When in here at 9:17 p.m. February 6th went to order some food manager was too busy on the phone all the gentleman that makes the sandwiches or too busy making clapping sounds in the back and then manager comes to the front and starts picking his nose right in the front night shift gentleman with long black hair manager gentleman that makes the food sees me standing there and the managers on his phone and doesn't even got his attention to take my order

Not the best but also not the worst Burger King I've been too. They have a seating/eating area on the upper floor and some seating on the entrance level area as well. Food is ok for what you pay for it. Don't have high expectations because you may be displeased with your results. It's just fast food for a ok price. I think these burgers have a better taste then McDonald's but nobody beats McD fries. That's just my opinion.
Just what I needed.I warm place. To enjoy my meal while collecting my thoughts

name: Cantina 33
reviews: Great vibes! Amazing Food! Can’t wait for things to pick up for others can really enjoy the atmosphere and food they have to offer.
Everything in this place is carefully designed to make a unique experience... Nice atmosphere, delicious food and great service!
Really awesome spot for the neighborhood! The food is SO good and the cocktail menu is really creative and our drinks were delicious! Would highly recommend stopping in to check out a new place!

Food was good, but we were told the entrees were big enough to share between 2-4 people. When the food came we were very disappointed to find small portions, even just for one person. The only reasoning I can think of is they claim the plates are big enough to share in order to justify the price (roughly $35 per plate) - I felt cheated. Their menu is also very limited, not too many options to choose from.
Friendly crew. Cool place to stop after work.

name: XOXO Kitchen & Bakery
reviews: Delicious foos, great service!

name: Porcelain
reviews:
Porcelain is a gem. It's so relaxing, the coffee is amazing, and the delicious wine is well priced. It's strikes the perfect 3rd place vibe that every coffee shop / bar goes for but rarely achieve.

The space is beautiful. It's vintage in all the right ways that makes you feel like you're being held by the space. Everything feels very intentional.

The owner, Mike is very sweet and is the kind of person who you look forward to when they come over to your table with another strudel.
Haven't tried the food yet but a great place to get work done. Quiet, pretty, not too pricey. Staff is actually nice! My new regular spot
Love this place. Excellent service, beautiful decor, excellent food, coffee and tea. My favorite spot for getting work done, and an added bonus is plenty of spots to charge a laptop/phone.
Fine food! Super service. Wonderful wait staff.
Love this new neighborhood spot! The staff are really friendly and welcoming. Wonderful ambience! Will definitely be coming here regularly to work/read. Coffee is A++++.

name: Tornado Crepes
reviews: The girl working today is absolutely delightful! She’s very quick, friendly and efficient. Absolutely recommend this place, great crepes, great employees.
Crepe was good but place says it opens at 11am but owner opened at 12pm

The one person working there used his gloved hands to touch money, the same gloves used to touch the crepes and other food products. Not sanitary at all and not to mention a health code violation. Place was small and humid too.
Simple.  N tasty
- love them ! Delicious

name: Cham Thai Cuisine
reviews: We ordered the Green Curry and Massaman Curry -- both were amazing!! So glad to know we have a great Thai restaurant so close to home! We are excited to try the rest of the menu.
Tasty Thai comfort food in a simple setting
The best thai fried rice!!!!🍴🍴🍴🍴

name: Grace Chinese
reviews: It was clean and fresh. Delicious!
Great Food Cheap
One of the best Chineese restaurants in the area. The food is excellent and exactly what you would expect from it and more. Highly recommend, if ever in Ridgewood must try.
clean and fresh food
Great food 🥘

name: The Acre
reviews: Beautiful new place to eat.

name: Mr. Thai
reviews:
I order the lunch special from this place on the regular. It’s economical and even comes with a small appetizer. You MUST try their curry puffs. They are fluffy, tasty and taste even better with the sauce they pair it with! 

Please come here. The food is always delicious!

Hidden gem thai spot in Bushwick area. If you are craving for Thai and don't know where to go. You  have to give this cuisine a big shot. 

Speaking of an affordable lunch spot, here you can get a good portion meal less than 10$+ tips including your main and appetizer which can get your belly filled 

However, today I tried their special menu which are basil red snapper and red curry duck which not disappointed me at all. It was so good and the fact that red snapper is served boneless, so easy to eat.
The food was well priced, and pretty good!

My Friend and I were the first customers at Mr. Thai, but I did not give them a review on the first day because I felt it unfair to rate them on the first day. I have eaten there a few times since and I have never been disappointed. Their food is always fresh and flavorful. I have tried a few Thai restaurants around the area and Mr.Thai is unbeatable for now. At my most resent visit, they forgot to include my appetizer and before I even opened the bag I got a call from them apologizing and informing me of the error. They offered to make it right away if I could come back for it. I couldn't, so they offered to make it and I could pick it up on my way home from work. I did and I was surprised when they doubled the item to make amends for their error. I would go back even if they hadn't done that because their food is that good. I recommend this place to all my coworkers and they have been abandoning their usual Thai spots once they have tried the food at Mr.Thai. An absolute must try. I give them my highest recommendation.

Very pleasant enviorment, Great food overall,employees are very friendly and we love the chef. We eat here very often and always leave with a smile,very great place and highly recommended. We tried various dishes from the menu and were never disappointed,honestly grade A.

name: La Canoa
reviews: Delicious food with great service!  All around, perfect...
This restraunt has some amazing shrimp and bandera. Definitely will reccomend.
Excellent quality service, incredible awesome food, I'm still full of last time I ate there. Delicious.
Good food and good service
Good food good for a small party in basement

name: Wan's Garden
reviews: Absolutely love Wan's Garden. The main guy who works there is the nicest. We're neighborhood friends now :) Best Chinese food in the area!

There was a misunderstanding about the order, but the lady fixed it with no additional charge and with the smile, which I appreciate a lot.
Food was tasty and not greasy.
The food there is pretty good compared to most places
Great food, clean, fast service
Very good food, friendly staff, quick takeout. Not terribly expensive so it's definitely worth the visit!

name: Al-Yemeni Market
reviews: From fateer to mudammas, they got the connect
Friendly staff and lots of fresh food items.
They have delicious meat and everything
They have everything and their prices are better now
Good Halal meat, and we can find everything we need and all of them halal! Very good dates, also they have water Zam-zam which was good presents for our friends for Ramadan!

name: Norma's Corner Shoppe
reviews: Vegan options that taste delicious! Great prices. They sell small and unique gifts for a good price. Coffee is excellent.  Staff members are sweet and are a wonderful delight!

Really great local coffee and sandwiches spot. Delicious baked goods. I love their ranchero breakfast sandwich but all other ones are amazing as well. 
There is usually few min wait on the weekends so be patient.  All is made to order.

Cute cozy spot on the corner with good coffee and pastries plus friendly staff! The sandwhich wasn’t bad, but could use a little more flavor. It gets busy on the weekend so you should expect a little wait.
Good coffee and tea.  Great snacks and sandwiches

This is my favorite cafe in all of Queens! The pastries are scrumptious and the sandwiches are to die for! The Southern biscuit gravy sandwich is heavenly and the lattes are made to perfection (plus they have oat milk!!!). Staff is always friendly and I love biking to this wonderful spot! Definitely stop by!!!

name: Bosna Express
reviews: It’s a really small but cozy place, excellent for pick up, everything seems really fresh, I ordered a chicken over rice and the cook grilled it on the spot. The have a nice variety of food and different flavors that I’ve seen in the neighborhood. The flavor was really goood. And the portion was quite small but good anyways

I eat here a lot since I work right next to it. I love how their service is always fantastic and they keep the place well organized all the time. Prices are convenient and they serve sizeable portions.
Excellent place to get some food when in a hurry. Their service is swift, pricing is fair, great mood. Would recommend to others
The Best Cevabdzinica in the United States guaranteed. Pljeskavica is amazing.

Pictures do not do justice. Wow. You have to visit at least once. The chef is so humble and amazing at what he does! He makes the place even better! 🙌👏. Definitely reccomend it. Food is on point! No complaints.

name: Wings Seafood
reviews: Great food. Wings are by far one of best in the neighborhood. Little pricey but it’s worth it.
When the reviews said that food was a bit greasy I thought ok not bad, but this is just beyond too much. The wings were drenched in oil and that's just unappetizing.
The food is delicious!! We eat there all the time. Very tasty and flavorful. Staff is very friendly, love going there.
Great wings! Fries are really good as well. Super friendly and the owner is awesome!
Stumbled upon this place Im from los angeles these wings were so goood

name: Rudy's Bakery and Cafe
reviews: Amazing bakery! Bought danishes with apricot and cream and caramel cookie with nuts. Enjoyed every bite of it . You guys do fantastic job! Even during this hard quarantine time you can find there one more reason to be happy! 5 stars, all the best! 🙌🏻
Never been disappointed about my breakfast. Always delicious. Very friendly staff. Super clean location

Best bakery in queens. Everything is always fresh. The staff are so welcoming and nice. The red velvet cake omg if you haven't had it you need to go now and buy it. It's the best ive ever had in NYC. Just one word... Rudy's is perfection.

The pastries is good. I took many things for my family and I tried many of it. The one that I enjoyed most was a yellow cake with pineapple filling and a white cream over the cake with coconut flakes on it. What they should do a traditional brownie with walnuts because that wasn't there. I would go again because the atmosphere was very pleasant. Didn't stay to eat and so I don't know if they have a bathroom or if its clean or not. Tables and everything was clean though.

Rudy's Pastry Shop is a delightful cafe to have a lite meal or to grab a sweet treat. On this particular visit I tried the Mozzarella Melt; sliced turkey, sliced tomato and a generous slice of mozzarella melted to perfection!  Absolutely delicious!  I ended my meal with a cup of coffee and a small cannoli.  With its charming interior and extensive pastry menu, Rudy's is definitely a must for anyone wanting have a coffee and a sweet treat.

name: Pan Rico Ambateno
reviews: Rico pan Ambateño
Hola! soy Miriam de la agencia de empleos de Brooklyn es realmente un placer poder ayudarlos

name: Millers and Makers
reviews: Absolutely love this bakery! Owned and run by a local couple. The baked goods on the weekend are next level. Scones, cookies, slices of cake, foccacia and quiche were available today. The cinnamon rolls are the best I’ve ever had. 10/10 would recommend

Literally not a single bad thing I could say. Amazing food, amazing owners, great space. If I lived in the neighborhood it would be dangerous! Their cookies are AMAZING, and don't miss the quiche. It is one of the best I have ever had!

There isn’t anything I wouldn’t recommend from Millers and Makers!  Everything is perfectly made with love and the space itself is gorgeous and a ray of sunshine in the neighborhood. #1 love will always be the sweet potato cinnamon roll and cream cheese frosting ❤️
dope buns!!!!
Excellent Bakery! Want to get married 300 times so I can eat those wedding cakes 300 times! the rolls are delicious. and the chocolate cake is heaven! Yummy

name: Peet's Coffee
reviews: Small cafe shop that serves up some food and beverages. It helps to get quick fast food for a visit  into the Supermarket. It's kept pretty clean. They have a few chairs to relax and enjoy your food. It's not in a good area to sit to long periods of time because there's a lot of traffic with shoppers. It's not a place to sit at and work on a laptop. I'm not sure about prices or what is served here as I have yet to give them a try.
Would've help to know it's inside a supermarket which is good for regular grab and go, but not for sitting and getting work done on laptop.
Lovely place

name: Billy's Marketplace
reviews: every time i go to this billy’s it’s seriously the best customer service i’ve ever had at a grocery store. the people ringing me up are always so pleasant. the person ringing me up today was so nice and patient with me even though i told them i didn’t need bags and then changed my mind. can’t express how grateful i am for these awesome essential workers. and when this is pandemic is over and we all have cash again tip your lovey billy’s cashiers please 💕💕💕

Well kept Supermarket that's pretty new around this neighborhood. Staff is friendly and helpful if you need assistance with anything. Fruits and vegetable produce seem fresh and they offer some organic products as well. Business is well stocked with many different choices to choose from on brands. They have a parking lot for their customers at the back of the business. Some prices on my opinion are on bit on the higher end but they offer many sales that make up for that. As a smart shopper, I'll stick to the sales and then move on. They have a small cafe food shop that sell food and serve beverages also. They also have a brewery shop with a few different beers to choose from. Still I recommend this Supermarket for all your needs.

I really can't love this place enough! Gourmet foods with everyday low prices, interesting selection of common and hard-to-find items, incredibly nice staff... and this is probably the cleanest store I've ever visited.

Great supermarket!!! A huge selection of vegan and vegetarian options. Great fruit and vegetable selection as well. 
This huge grocery shopping Haven has everything you would want or need.

Love this market.  A bit pricey but they have products you would not normally find in the surrounding areas. Organic premium focus on food here. Huge coffee bar inside serving Pete's coffee which is nice.

name: Nomad Cafe and Eatery
reviews: Came across this place while driving. Walked in and the cafe gives me this homie feeling, the food is amazing even the pastries they have feel fresh any time you get them. The owner is really cool always says hello and has great customer service. The workers there also very nice no matter what. The nomad smoothie with a first class sandwich or a muffin of any kind is my go to if I have time to sit and eat there. You did a great job with this place and I’ll continue to come here!
Great place to grab a coffee drink and have a brunch. The crepe is yummy and the serving is excellent.

Their hot chocolates are amazing. Everything about this place is lovely, quite space to work on your assignments with a variety of good foods to select from. Also, the staffs are super nice and friendly and the place is clean and smells like coffee.

Best coffee in town! Their iced coffee containing "coffee ice cubes", is brilliant! Instead of watery cubes melting into the drink, more coffee melts into it! The lattes also are so delicious! Very friendly staff, cool atmosphere, artsy and welcoming!
Great cafe with nice people. The lattes are on point and the breakfast healthy and filling.

name: Amma Cafe
reviews:
Best place ever! Service is great and fast. Is the right place to spend your time.
Highly recommended.👍
Good place to have a coffee and drink. Nice people, good service. The baristas are mazing.

I wanna start by saying that that’s where the good espresso is. Been going there from the day it opened since it’s pretty convenient from where i live. Had a chance to taste all the coffees and wine as well. Pretty good overall. At the beginning I didn’t know anyone in that coffee shop and since then everyone has been nothing but friendly to me. Simply Amazing!

It amazes me on how some people’s opinion are straight out of no where and if i did have an bad “experience “ like Veronica did i would give the place another chance before going straight for the bad review. At least i hope she did mention anything to the staff the day she experienced all the worst possible so at least they could fix it right there and then .

Thank you!
Nice little coffee shop
Do not go here for anything. Everything tastes stale, the coffee tastes like chalk and the wine like vinegar. Also, the bathroom is disgusting.. there was blood on the toilet. Disgusting!

name: Clemens Triangle
reviews: ok
Nice view
Small but nice place. I like it more on the memorial day as they do musical band and parade at this park.
Well very small park offering a nice relaxing park specially if you walking and needed rest
Have benches & trees. Just next to my favorite Jewish Center of Ridgewood @ 55-39 Myrtle Ave

name: Cozy Corner Bar
reviews:
This is a comfortable and welcoming neighborhood institution. It reminded my father and I of his stomping grounds back in Winona. We came here on Christmas and I’ve since I’ve come back to enjoy their
superior Whiskey selection. Anna is an excellent host and made us feel very much at home. The Kitchen is open late and everything made with love. Thank God for this place. I see many of my neighbors here. Truly a Cozy community Cornerstone.
Great and "cozy" place to hang out. Recently remodeled, reasonable priced drinks and free pizza with $6 drink. Their Margarita pizza is awesome

Stopped by here last night to get a late night bite and in addition to the free pizza the chicken tenders were nice and crispy. What's really cool is that the bar has been around since the start of the 20th century. Nice to see a joint from old NY still in the game. The original crown molding is one of the best features.

Vibes are super sweet and Anna is super sweeter! She has great energy, as does this establishment. It’s very clean and they have great prices/deals. If you’re in the area, like your drinks, like bar eats, stop by. You’ll def regret not doing so
Super friendly and pleasant bar staff. Nice mix of people. Food decent, good drinks. We'll be back for sure, nice neighborhood bar!

name: Kum Wei Kitchen
reviews: Excellent and tasty food, I loved the ambience this place has, and the cashiers were nice. Will surely come back.
Food is awesome over the years I’ve been eating at this place always enjoy it...delivery always on point

Food is slightly above the other Chinese Restraints in the area, but be warned when you decide to order out. 1st, delivery time can be long (60 plus minutes) and when you repeatedly call about the status, they have caller id and will not pick up your calls. 2nd, if you do decide to pay via a credit/debit card, they will keep the card info on file and the card number (with exp date and sec code) WILL APPEAR on the receipt under "dir" for direction.
One female counter person is not at all friendly.
Food is great and just as you order it

name: Cream Ridgewood
reviews: I've been here 4-5 times. Every time I order the pull apart bread, and every time it's amazing. The service is friendly, the food is good, and the price is right. Music is not too loud except for Fridays and Saturdays after 9 pm, when they have a DJ and you have to scream to have a conversation (not sure if this is every week, though). They also have a nice open area where you can sit outside in warmer weather.

Food was good. Service could have been better, but I will try again.

3/9/2020

Updated/add on review. Visited again. Food still delicious, drinks good, atmosphere is good, love the music choice. The service leaves a bit to be desired, though.

The service was EXTREMELY show considering that the restaurant was fairly empty. One person in the group did unlimited mimosas for brunch and didn't get her for until 45 minutes after the rest of the year. After we asked more than twice for our food, the waitress said that's how they do the timing with the 2 hour option. Ok so.... They just have to watch everyone else eat, then eat alone?!!

Onto the food.  The presentation was really cool, the flavoring not so much. Both the chicken and waffles were pretty bland

Got delivery through Grubhub. Wings were good, the stuffed chicken dish was probably the driest  chicken I’ve ever eaten and the mashed potatoes tasted like they weren’t seasoned at all. The sauce was good. Maybe in house is different but delivery wasn’t great
Food was good, but the small portions do not match the prices. Drinks were great and so was the music!!! Such an awesome place with a chill atmosphere.

name: Bamboo Tropical
reviews: Bamboo tropical is a small place that serves fresh smoothies, juice, coffee and soups. The staff here are so friendly. Love this place !

The girl at the front counter is always nice and patient with me even when I take a while to make an order sometimes, their smoothies are always on point and you can tell they care about what they're doing.
Good food, good vibe, great staff
A must in the Ridgewood Area!!! If you can only have one thing get the guacamole
Legendary chicken caesar. Best in NYC!

name: Garlic To the Chicken
reviews: We were working down the block at Q093. Co worker tried it and said it was amazing so we gave it a shot. Was definitely not disappointed and it is hard to impress me. The smell was so good that while we were eating, everyone around us that had already eaten, began developing an appetite again

SO TASTY! I can call on my way home from work and be able to pick up 10-20 min later. Speedy service, very wonderful people, I crave the food all the time. Best chicken + kimchi in Ridgewood. Thanks for everything!

Nastiest kimchee I have ever tasted

Mediocre meals.
Cheap with the farm raised shrimp.

I wasted $50 on this place.
Never again will I order from them.

I ordered from them through Ubereats for four days straight but all of the sudden I couldn’t find them on there but I am so glad they’re back on it now! I will always order wings combo, soy garlic & spicy flavor. Perfect temperature, tasty chicken & always fresh. Thank you for serving great food.
Very good. Nice owner. Hope more Korean Street food gets in the menu.

name: Manna Deli & Grocery
reviews: This deli just lost a good customer after catching the cook pancho picking up a piece of cheese he dropped on the floor looking at me and putting it in my sandwich after he thought I didn’t catch him in the act, I told the cashier I will not be taking that sandwich After catching the cook in the act, when the cashier asked him about it, he got nervous and replied I didn’t do that, I left the store calmly and told the cashier I will not be coming back to this store again, I don’t know what’s so hard about throwing out a piece of cheese and replacing.... I have been a customer of over 10 years I guess that doesn’t hold any weight with these people
The coffee was fresh and the employees were nice.

They used to be good but with the current cook it has gone down!!!. He doesnt listen when you make an order.he looks sloppy, like when someone handles your food you want them to look as if they have a job not as if they just walked in from the streets. the lettuce and tomato taste funny. The meat taste dried and old. This location needs a new cook .
Over pricing things  try of charge me 35 for something  that is 14 dollars
They make tasty sandwich

name: Mr Chen
reviews: Can you guys please open soon we miss your food:/ hope you’re all safe
So yummy food
Ive been ordering here for years , has to be plus 5 years and ive never had a problem with my order and the food is always spot on and cooked well and fills you up .

DO YOURSELF A FAVOR AND DO NOT ORDER FROM HERE!!!  My orders are constantly wrong and I finally made a complaint to the restaurant and there response is very poorly. They talk down to the customer as if it is my fault they can’t read. Constantly missing items. They should not be allowed to ruin business the way they treat there customers and further more they don’t even deserve a 1 star.
Great Chinese takeout, one of the better ones in the neighborhood.

name: Fajitas Sunrise
reviews: The sizzling chicken fajitas was delish and the servers were so friendly and timely.  For drinks, I ordered the Blue Hawaii and it was delicious.  I really enjoyed eating here and that day it was karaoke night. Everyone was having a great time.  I am pleased that we went there to eat.  Gracias!

We love the service, the atmosphere is nice and cozy, also the karaoke is amazing. 
We are going back next month. 😍🥞
Best food and atmosphere in Ridgewood!  Its nice to go to a place where everyone knows your face😂👍!  And the drinks are worth every penny!! Oh and did I mention the food is fantastic?!💕
Best quesadillas
Great tasting food and drinks!  Excellent waitress.

name: Chiquita's
reviews: Great place to eat some Dominican food, staff is always really nice .
Little slow with the food for what we ordered (1 chicken mofongo and 1 pork mofongo) but otherwise the food was good

When you are from Texas and live in NYC it’s hard to find authentic Mexican restaurants that don’t cater to American tastes.  

This place was nice but .,. It ain’t my beloved Mexican food. The food is good and if you don’t what REAL Mexican food is then I urge you to go.
Great place to get a home cooked type of full filling delicious meal!
Love their food so much

name: Burek's Pizza
reviews:
Best burek in whole world..!
Best servi..
Friendly, meticulously clean..
Best of the best.
Perfect as allways!

Absolutely delicious Burek, thing layers of dough filled with either meat, cheese, spnach.. cooked to  perfection!
Best Burek in NYC, hands down!
Best in NY thank god I live 3 blocks from this place
Can't beat the price or the quality! Delicious cheese burek. Flaky and crispy on the edges, and soft and cheesy in the middle.

name: Burrito Republic
reviews: Delicious and massive servings. Red sauce is fantastic. I'm glad they were open during this rough time, not only for myself but for their ability to continue to thrive! Thank you for being here for us!
Delicious nachos and taco salad. Served by friendly and welcoming people. Great prices.

Came here a few times already and this is definitely in my top 3 burrito spots in NYC and Long Island. My favorite was the steak burrito with the potatoes. Service has been friendly so far. Plenty of options for both meat eaters and vegans.
Made a  postmates order and my oh my I'm in heaven. The food was on point an everytime was good an taste amazing. Can't wait for this order again.

Had surf and turf burrito...AMAZING! Closest I’ve come to cali Mexican food in NYC 

However street corn and quesadillas are just ok. Good but not as great as the burritos.

name: La-Bella Pizza
reviews: Good food. Decent serving size. Pizza tastes like pizza from when mostly Italians ran pizzerias. Back in ancient times...like 1987.  Took off 1 star because it's not the best I ever had, but it's in the same neighborhood.
One of the best pizza in Ridgewood.

Careful allowing your children to come here after school they should be monitored by an adult the guy at the cash register was asking a little girl way too much personal questions about what time she comes out of school. Wheres she from etc. This is supposed to be a safe community and the little girl didn’t even pay him any mind and he kept trying to force a conversation out of her. Make your sales and let these kids go about their business and mind your own!

This place is my preferable restaurant.  Of all restaurants I know I prefere it most. I always suggests to my friends to go to visit this restaurant. when  I feel like having a delicious supper, this restaurant comes straightaway to my head. exeptionalgorgeous and all kinds of  food and a large menu.professional staff, and good ambience. In addition to that, the charge is fair. I recommend this place with no doubt.

Great pizza. Always clean place friendly people and the most important the pizza is always fresh. I recommend this place 100 % Try it you will love it I drive 15 minutes every Friday to a large pie for my family.

name: Tasty Thai
reviews: The food here is decent. Portions are fine. Prices are average. Great delivery option, love their packaging and the food is always hot. I guess my real criticism with it is that for Thai food it’s not very flavorful or spicy. It’s a good beginner Thai spot. I wish there was an option to increase heat. But even so, the menu is missing a lot of the fermented, pungent, sour, or bitter flavors that make Thai regional cuisine so special.

My cousin brought me here yesterday to try some Thai food for the first time in my life & now I’m addicted. I need more.
The atmosphere in this place was very casual but elegant at the same time. The waiter was very sweet & attentive as well. Thank you.

Love this place, they know me & as 
I've been living in this town of Ridgewood NY  for so long....with the time, they became my favorite place to go.
 When I want treat myself  a bit, they 
 have a very affordable lunch special & desserts are just a total culinary experience from the Thai kitchen!

I love this place. No matter what time of day their basil fried rice just hits the spot. I’m not a huge fan of the green beans in it but they are super easy to take out yourself. The food is always delivered super quick (today mine came in 10 minutes) and the delivery man is always nice. Please order from here if you can, you won’t regret it!

Ordered the steamed dumplings, sweet sausage rice & pad Thai! Super yummy! The price was great especially for the servings. Really good service! Def going back soon. And I want to order that sweet sausage like right now lol ♥️ it's so good, never had anything like it. New comfort dish 💯

name: I O Cafe
reviews:
SERBIA 🇷🇸
Eat the World NYC review:
As Ridgewood continues to change and newcomers with earbuds shuffle down the subway stairs at Forest Avenue to quickly walk home, I O Caffe continues to be the place it has always been for the last 25 years or so. With its dark, barred windows and solid door that offer no glimpses inside even at night, it takes somewhat of a leap of faith to swing open the heavy portal and step inside. The right folks might bring the jukebox screeching to a halt just like in the movies, but since I am Serbian-passing the intensity level of stares were simply at harmless intruder level.

But all that evaporates away pretty quickly just like it does in most longtime corner bars that only get a few outsiders. After all, the door is always open, I O Caffe just keeps to itself. And if this leap had not been made, a really nice plate of ćevapi and the friendly welcome would never have been found. As a group of men smokes and plays dominos in the back, grab one of the ten or so seats at the bar and settle in.

There is no menu, but plates of ćevapi are the main food offering. When salad and fries were mentioned they were not turned down, as it was the goal of the meal to try as much as they were cooking. $25 ended up being the total for 10 perfectly grilled pieces of meat over crisp fries, some bread, and an excellent and large šopska, a salad with tomatoes, cucumbers, onions, red peppers, and a healthy sprinkling of Bulgarian goat cheese. More than enough for two, had I been sharing.
Best place ever
typical balkan kafana. friendly staff
The worst place ever! Never again! Rude people!
Unique experience each and every time! Great staff, and the owner is a rockstar 😎

name: AMA COFFEE
reviews:
Good coffee, delicious bagels!
We decided to come here on a Sunday morning to get some work done. Most cafes in the neighborhood don't open until later but this place opens up at 8 AM even on the weekends - definitely a plus! My favorite aspect is the boldness and strength of their coffee - fresh roasted beans and delightful flavors. I tried the oat mocha and they use a milk chocolate syrup - tasted pretty good. I also got an everything bagel with cream cheese. I could tell the bagel is made fresh every morning - it was soft and airy. Would love to visit here again to try their Bánh Mi (Vietnamese Sandwich). 
Also - loved how they drew a Penguin on my coffee!! So cute.

I come here on the days I work remotely and they always make me feel right at home. They use some spicy honey Dijon like mayo on their Bahn mi tacos that’s good enough to tan in, and you should always opt for one of the grab to go treats such as dark chocolate bars that they have at the counter. The owner is also very knowledgeable about his field at the business end of things, as well as being a sommelier of sorts for all things bean related :) you won’t be disappointed by these folks
Great coffees. On par with the best. The Chinese crepe that you see here is also very good.

Cute place. Homey feel. Affable owner. Simple breakfast options. Minimal menu. Nice garden in the back.
Best hot chocolate in Ridgewood

Really amazing place! I’ll be honest, I didn’t have the highest expectations of this place when I first walked in. There’s no real theme. But I’m so happy I went!  

Although their banh mi is not traditional, I do love their take on it!  I’ve never had anything quite like it- awesome!  Their Chinese crepe was excellent and their chocolate drink- super unique and incredible! The perfect balance of flavors and just the right amount of sweetness! 

The passion fruit slush was perfect-  plus the owner the owner was extremely friendly, and gave excellent recommendations.  Just a random place, but one I’ll surely visit again!

name: New Delicious Wok
reviews: The food was really bad don’t waste your time or money here. The “delicious wok” menu items might as well be throwing away your money because they literally just sell you rice. What a joke.
Great food!
Food wasn’t good, salty chicken wings, greasy fries in a bag. No good at all. Never again

Wow new owner!!! I miss the old owners terribly the food used to be amazing!! So sad. We found a huge hair in our food and the food smelled gross!!! I have a picture of the hair. Don't eat there anymore.
New owner, zero flavor, not ordering from this place again. They got a B for a reason

name: The Original Sal’s
reviews: The pizza taste very bad.and The guy was not wearing gloves

name: Original Sals Pizza
reviews: In NYC you know that most of the time you get a slice it didn't just come out.... With that in mind the pizza was still good and hot and hit the spot.

Sal's is a family owned and operated pizza shop where the pizza is made fresh with the best ingredients. If you want great pizza in ridgewood,  SAL'S is where u need to go. Very nice and clean atmosphere.
Excellent best pizza & hero's in this area

The pizza is really good but yesterday me and my boyfriend got a chicken roll and a spinach roll. My boyfriend ate the entire spinach roll and got food poisoning from it. We used to love this place but now we are definitely thinking twice before eating out
Everything about this place is meh. Food, atmosphere, decor, everything. There’s a much better pizza at Houdini’s Pizza Laboratory or Corato II

name: Monreale Bakery
reviews:
Great Italian bread.. if you are crazy for bread I suggest to try this place.. we are only 3 but we buy every 10 days more or less 15.00$ only Italian bread
Delicious
Tasty cakes and breads!
Great bread, great cake. Always very friendly service. One of my favorite bakeries to go to.
The best Sicilian cookie and bread in Queens!
If you're looking for fresh baked bread daily, this is the place. Of course there are also other fresh baked goodies.

name: International Coffee Shop
reviews: The cook  chelo is awesome😁 but the waitress work as if they have no customer service you can see in there face when they see you the young Dark skin Dominican she does not want to attend  to us. The other young lady with the long lashes is great! And takes care of us well .
This is a great little coffee shop/ Diner nestled in the heart of Ridgewood Queens. The service is great and the prices are decent. The food is great too.
Is strictly Hispanic food. They cook well and a nice place to eat and go.
Small but ver accommodating food is always fresh and great morning has its rush and evening is lunch specials are very fulfilling
The food is delicious and the workers are so nice

name: Corato II Pizza
reviews: Very clean and welcoming restaurant. They serve large meals and for affordable rates. I enjoyed the menu very much and the staff members were super amiable and informative. I recommend this place.
We know this place already for 40 years. Excellent quality, friendly people! What more do you want?

This was our place to eat pizza when I was a kid living here. 2 weeks ago I brought my wife and sons up from SC for a visit and this place was on my list to show them. So happy it is still here and my oh my the pizza is delicious. Just like I remember. My wife and sons loved it as well.  You see, SC has places that say NY Pizza but is doesn't compare to Carato's. ....   Do you deliver to SC????????!
Going back to coratos on Myrtle Avenue the pizza was still good and the sausage roll that I had was very delicious it's good to know that some neighborhoods have a good pizzerias to go to
Very good, enjoyed the pepper and egg sub and zeppoles.

name: Fresh Pond Corner Coffee Shop
address: 67-22 Fresh Pond Rd, Ridgewood, NY 11385, USA
reviews: Decent Mexican food. But since they renovated I don’t like to eat inside the restaurant. It’s way too bright and not a comfortable place to sit and have a meal.
I love the chilaquiles! The tacos! Noemi service is outstanding! We always come here to eat when  we visit NY! Real Mexican Food !!!!!
Really good taco's and salsa. Clean spot with kind staff

This place is a diamond in the rough. Anytime I want a chicken enchilada this is where I go! Whenever I stop in I feel like I’m in Mexico again eating in one of the low key spots with barely any recognition yet they have the most amazing home style food.
Amazing place with positive energy! Love the food!

name: Ye Garden
address: 71-02 Fresh Pond Rd, Flushing, NY 11385, USA
reviews: LOVE LOVE LOVE this place!  Fast delivery, delicious, fresh food!  My only "go to" Chinese food spot.
Great service, fast and delicious food. Really awesome lunch and dinner specials.
Wish l ordered here sooner Food is so good so clean Authentic Chinese food!

Best Chinese food in this area hands down ! The food is clean and is made to your liking . I ordered fried chicken wings and asked if they can chop them and make them extra crispy and they delivered . Also the fried rice is great and the fried shrimp dumplings as well .
Always so nice

name: House Of Gyro & Shawarma
address: 69-01 Fresh Pond Rd, Queens, NY 11385, USA
reviews: I get to eat here a lot since I work close by. I like how their service is always great and they keep the spot neat all the time. Prices are fair and they serve generous portions.
If you’re looking for a gyro or shawarma, this is the place! Nothing fancy. Just yummy, fresh food.

I ordered a lamb gyro, presuming this place had a gyro machine.  I was served some kind of grilled meat w/ weird sauce, probably a racoon.  This place is not exactly a house of real gyro and Mediterranean food.
This tiny spot cranks out some of the best shawarma and falafel I've ever had.

Best shawarma I had in the US. Meat, fries and veggies are all fresh and delicious. The sauce is slightly spicy and blends well with everything, giving it a taste to remember. Crepes are huge and come with fresh fruits and chocolate inside. Definitely recommend and will come back.

name: Taste of China
address: 67-08 Fresh Pond Rd, Flushing, NY 11385, USA
reviews:
I bought a chicken enchilada and that dish was terrible.
It has guacamole on the rice and that taste terrible.
I do not recommend  to buy  any Mexican food in this place.
They are good in Chinese food.
The place is great and roomy, the menu was delightful and the prices were very reasonable. rapidly, efficient service and very amiable staff. Will definitely recommend this spot.

The food looked fine . As I started eating I must have eaten the 3rd piece of chicken and couldn’t eat the next . I thought maybe I wasn’t hungry . I held on to the food til I got home . I ended up not finishing it . And later on threw up everything out my bedroom window because I couldn’t make it to the trash or bathroom . I do not recommend this place . My stomach was hurting the whole time since I ate the food . And now I feel better but my throat is on fire from throwing up the sesame chicken and white rice . No thank you  waste of 10$
They offer a nice range of fresh food. I like eating here. Staff members are always very nice, rates are convenient and the place is always well organised.

Overpriced and cheated my child whom they thought was alone.  10 year old daughter ordered chicken wings, PORK fried rice, egg roll, and a soda for almost $9. And the rice was plain rice!  I went back to verify the price was right and complain about the PORK fried rice, the lady lied and claimed my daughter ordered plain fried rice, which we never heard of, so she would never order.

name: Coffee Shop Mexican Restaurant
address: 67-22 Fresh Pond Rd, Ridgewood, NY 11385, USA
reviews: I took a quick look and decided to give it a try. Totally worth it. Beautiful food, great menu, and good prices.
Long wait for food and drinks, only one very pretty server for the whole restaurant but food is delicious i have tried almost the whole menu, good nachos
Great food at great prices.  Even better than a more expensive place just a few doors down.
Excellent food. Taste that.👍🌶🍲🥗🥨🧀🍕🍜🥧🍷
Great food at a great price.

name: KC Taqueria Coffee Shop
address: 67-22 Fresh Pond Rd, Ridgewood, NY 11385, USA
reviews: Desent costumer service. Food is good.
Good food
Riquisima comida
Exelente food

name: Antica Trattoria
address: 68-10 Fresh Pond Rd, Ridgewood, NY 11385, USA
reviews: Absolutely amazing experience! The food was delicious from the appetizers all the way through to dessert. Excellent service as well! And a great atmosphere! So yummy

This was a really great dining experience.  The food was very classic but top notch.  The service was good.  The atmosphere was quaint, some might say small but i didnt feel tightly seated next to anyone.  Cant wait to go back.

Wow so this is my favorite new spot. There food is amazing !! but some deserts on the ok side. I love the vintage look and the people are so nice. This is the spot and no joking I've been here like 5 times and definitely going back

Great small place for dinner in Ridgewood, Queens. We ordered the fried calamari as appetizer, and I had the shrimp scampi with vegetables, while my husband had the chicken Marsala with pasta for dinner. Everything was excellent! We then had dessert and coffee-the tiramisu was delicious. Staff was friendly and food came out quickly. Love this place!
Delicious and authentic with 5 star service every time. This restaurant is simply amazing! Definitely try some dessert you won't be sorry.

name: Sakura IV
reviews: Loved loved loved this place. Lived nearby for many years and never tried. I'm so glad i did and now i will continue going. The lady there was so sweet. Just overall great experience. I totally recommend. 10/10
Excellent food in a beautiful cozy restaurant. The decor is authentic. The staff is amazingly attentive. The food is perfectly prepared. The price is great.

Sit in or take out this restaurant is on point with service! The plum wine is to die for, exactly what you need after a long day. Food is absolutely delicious from the appetizer to the main course menu. Definitely a most have!

I pass Sakura 4 every day since I started working at my place of business and couldn't wait to try it. So pleased to say it was worth the wait!!! Clean and friendly atmosphere with free Hot Sake to boot with $10 or more purchase. Food and Sake DELICIOUS 😍
Excellent place to taste some good Japanese food .

name: Ace Pizza & Pasta
reviews: Place is clean amazing. I order nearly everyday on my lunch hour. Always satisfied by thier carness.  I am a returned customer and always will be. Thank you Ace pizza ypur great..
Friendly staff good pizza.

This pizza place isn't bad. The food here is good. They serve a little more than just pizza and pizza products. For example you can order a cheeseburger deluxe at this place which by the way is very good considering this is a pizza place. They have excellent specials which are posted both inside on the wall and also the window of the restaurant. I come here often when I'm in the area and want pizza or a quick lunch. They're chicken wings aren't bad too. I recommend it.
Best best pizza in Ridgewood!
Delicious! Made with fresh ingredients and special customer service!

name: Double
reviews: My favorite in the local area! Our familys spot for Chinese food.
Good food, good prices, fast delivery service and food is Always hot and plentiful.
I 2nd the boneless spare ribs and fries- delicious!
Nasty soup. Noodles hard and cold.
Great food great people

name: Zenith Thai Restaurant
address: 7002 Fresh Pond Rd, Ridgewood, NY 11385, USA
reviews:
I’m a regular customer here . But these time I was upset a lot! I ordered 2 Tom Yum soups. The first one was large Hot with shrimp and extra shrimp. And the second one was small coconut soup NOT spicy and with extra shrimp. But after 1 hour waiting I get 2 Tom Yum soups regular one. I’m not sure if it was extra shrimp as well.in the small one it wasn’t definitely! But of course they changed for extra! 
So, as I said I don’t eat spicy at all and I should ordered another food from another place not to be hungry.( it’s extra money). 
Very upset that you don’t care about your customers who pay you money!
Why I couldn’t call and change? Because I took these food to my friends and just there figured out they gave me false order .
Five star for the food, service is nice and courteous. The only one thing is, when you arrive with larger group not everyone will get their food at the same time. BBQ Beef on pic.
Very good Thai food. Their chicken wings are awesome and their pad Thai is on point and their wings were very good. Nice small place but good to stop by when you have Thai cravings.

Not a fan of the calamari.
There was not enough calamari for the price I paid. 
I was looking for an opportunity to like the basil fried rice. I did not. I think my shrimps were raw.
I had to put my rice in the microwave

Delicious food and excellent service!!! The Tom Kha is heartwarming. The Massaman curry is, to date, the best I’ve had. The pineapple fried is perfectly done, with a great balance of flavors. Highly recommended Thai restaurant. Probably the best East of Manhattan.

name: Los Parientes
address: 69-08 Fresh Pond Rd, Ridgewood, NY 11385, USA
reviews: They are recently opened. There are a lot of Mexican food places in this neighborhood around Fresh Pond. This one is by far my favorite. The food is very, tasty and well prepared. Taste fresh. Not too greasy. Good flavors and great prices. Loved it.
Everything is so good It's the beats food Ive eaten tortas,burritos you have to try it

First time we ordered from this place. Shrimp tacos was so weird, the shrimp resembled beef. Beef tacos were dry and the meat didn’t have much flavor to it. The quesadilla was very dry. It only had meat and lettuce in it. The rice and beans were alright. Although the vegetables were good and service was also good.

Giving casa coriz down the street a run for their money. Don’t know what we’ve done to deserve two great Mexican places within a block of each other but I’m into it. Tacos are served on a higher quality tortilla here, wrapped in one tortilla instead of the industry standard double. Another plus are their shrimp tacos, along with their 3x $6 taquito special. Dine in orders include complimentary grilled onions and jalapeños.

I just have the tacos of pastor ,cecina,y lengua,torta de milanesa de res ,torta cubana  y torta for my kids ham quesillo frijoles mayonesa very good food and the customer service awesome thank you so much

name: Bushwick Taco Company
address: 71-24 Fresh Pond Rd, Glendale, NY 11385, USA
reviews: We ordered the burrito bowl and a regular burrito both were delicious. The flavors were great. The service was on point. Will definitely go back & taste other items on the menu.
Nice setting great art work. Food okay.  Not authentic Mexican flavors. Salsa was mediocre. Taste like tomato paste.
The food is great! High end tacos with great customer service. It has affordable food and I will be coming back.

The place was not packed at all..and the waitress took forever to come to our table.  Then she asked if we were ready to order, WE HAD NO MENUS!!
Then I inquired about the enchiladas, and she told me they had mole and verde.  I asked for the verde, and she brought me the mole one. I mentioned it to her she  brought the wrong ones, she said she could exchange them (but we already waited like 20 min for the food) so I said no.  She offer to give us a free soda for the mixup!
The place was not busy at all, there was 4 tables being waited on and the service was super slow.  They were concentrating more on their deliveries then the customers in their restaurant.   Food was ok.  The other Mexican restaurant down the street has better food.
Do not recommend.  We couldn't get out of there fast enough.

Ordered online and got 3 tacos, the steak, shrimp and chorizo, a flan and elote. Excellent service and super delicious food. Loved them all and the flan was to perfection. Very good flavors and the meats were well cooked.

One constructive criticism though: the elote needs a bit of help. I would like to see it with some grilled marks instead of boiled and more cheese sauce (it had very little). The flavor of the cheese coating was good though, so it’s just the way the corncob is being cooked. 

Will be ordering again  soon 😋.

name: Trattoria Cerbone
address: 71-24 Fresh Pond Rd, Ridgewood, NY 11385, USA
reviews: Literally worst pizza I've ever had, I didn't eat just threw it out. Peor pizza q lo tuve. They should be ashamed
The food was not what I expected. I paid for extra meat balls and they gave me one. Not what I expected for flavor very bland. Presentation was terrible. Highly disappointed.
This place is permanently closed. This is why I gave it one star.
