Great food & great service . My family and I have eaten here many times , have never been disappointed. All the entrees ,we have tried ,have been prepared to perfection .
Great place!

name: Casa Coriz
address: 71-28 Fresh Pond Rd, Flushing, NY 11385, USA
reviews: Friendly service and the BEST SHRIMP TACOS in town! They peel and cut up the shrimp so you get a good amount of meat. Whoever thought putting whole shrimp in a taco was a good idea, was wrong. This is the way to do it.
"Pozole" is to die for .... Casa Coriz is an excellent mexican restaurant in Ridgewood, great service ,great food, good portions , reasonable price 👍.

It feels like you are going to your granny’s house to have the best meal of your life, food it’s amazing, economic, a lot in your plate perfect flavors, and the service I love it ! 😍😍😍 it’s my new  to go ❤️❤️ place love it!!!!  Super recommended if you want a real Mexican experience 🔥🔥🔥

Food was really good. Had the shrimp taco and guacamole and chips.  The tacos were freshly made and the chips were not greasy.   Only downside is the wait since everything is freshly made, so call order in.

These are the same owners that owned New Mexico Place on seneca!! I'm so glad they opened a new spot !!! i can tell based on the artwork inside the restaurant. the food is delicious and hella authentic. you will love it trust me it is all delicious !!!

name: Wow Bagel
address: 6864 Fresh Pond Rd, Ridgewood, NY 11385, USA
reviews: Love bagels , best option in Ridgewood used to be known as mr. Bagel but wow bagel is same staff and finally after 12 years a renovation, very G😃😉d food now a nice look every bagel with many option
Delicious, fresh bagel. Food is great and so is the service
Great fresh bagels and good service!
The best bagels!
Best bagels ever. Made on the premises. Everything is so fresh. Best toasted whole wheat bagel with cream cheese I’ve had in a long time. Came here 2 days in a row.

name: Las Viandas
reviews: Friday’s is my day to be coming by the restaurant since the menu of the lunch is a great dish . The staff are very friendly and owner. No complains. The empanadas with the pink sauce no complains taste good 👍🏻
Food was plentiful and bistec encebollado con tostones was delicious!!!

Had the chicken with rice, beans and small salad. The portion was plenty and the flavors were very good. Nothing out of this world but good. A little too much cumin in the chicken for me. Will try something different next time.
Excellent service. Friendly people. Really good food.
Good food and speedy service

name: 4 Caminos Mexican Restaurant
address: 67-22 Fresh Pond Rd, Ridgewood, NY 11385, USA
reviews: I love there food. I went into the store for the first time the other night. Service was a little slow but the food was still great
Love authentic Mexican food. Food was delicious and service was great.
Great neighborhood Mexican restaurant it has been here 12 years or more I've been going to this restaurant since it opened they serve breakfast the Mexican food is great I definitely recommend it
What? I cant believe the negative reviews I have been eating here every week for months since moving to neighborhood the food is always awesome and fast. Nachos and chilaquiles yum
Amazing service ,food is delicious , very clean ,  I have been a few times already and definitely coming back..

name: City Cafe Grill & Bar
address: 6714 Fresh Pond Rd, Ridgewood, NY 11385, USA
reviews: Delicious food , phenomenal settings,Highly professional.  Had tried Asian cushion and no enough words to describe.. Would come back again!!!!!thanks
Food’s amazing with very friendly and beautiful environment..I’ve done a party and dine in and never disappointed..definitely coming back

Other then the alarm chirping every 5 min, City cafe grill & bar is a great addition to the neighborhood.
I will always try my staple , Aloo Gobi, when trying new India restaurants and this dish was amazing!!! 
The Samosas are a good size and Buraka was tasty. 
My partner had the Chicken Tikka bone less and that was very flavorful as well. 
All in all, this is a place I will definitely come back to.

I am a food lover and travel around in search of new food and places. I was walking by and saw this place. Thought to have something to eat and walked in. I am glad for my decision. The food there was awesome. I had the shrimp with black pepper as a starter followed by humus and naan. It was amazing. I loved it and had tandoori mix grill. It was such a great experience. The guy there was very helpful and friendly who explained me the food and also suggested me the item. The place is really cool and he also got me a desert as complimentary which was chef’s special. I am very satisfied.

We heard lots about this restaurant, finally I had chance to visit this place for lunch today with my family. The food is one of best grill food and service is outstanding. I definitely recommend this place for anyone who loves the nice ambiance and great food..⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

name: El parche Bakery, Restaurant and Bar
address: 67 14 Fresh Pond Rd, Ridgewood, NY 11385, USA
reviews:
The food is good. We love the baked goods and they are affordable. The owners are nice. The minus stars comes from the service. It’s always hit or miss depending on who’s shift it is.

We go often and 2 of the 3 waitresses are stellar. Kind, inviting, and attentive. One though is cold and provides terrible service. Even if we are the only people she manages to be slow and rude. We’ve had times that we simply ordered coffee and a simple dish and had to wait 20 minutes for the coffee and remind her, but we were the only ones! She brings the food and throws it down, no “enjoy, anything you need?” Or “how is everything?” 

She has plenty of time to flirt with fellas at the counter every time we go though. Honestly will start avoiding the place when it’s her shift.

First time here and we were really impressed. This is a delicious authentic Colombian restaurant. We ordered off the breakfast menu, which was super reasonably priced. Since it was our first time, they gave us complimentary Colombian bread to have with our coffee which was SO good. Highly recommend. The breakfast was really high quality and tasty. We’ll definitely be back to try their dinner sometime.

Small new bakery in the neighborhood that offers a change from all the food places along Fresh Pond Road. This restaurant offers baked Colombian goods, breakfast beverages, and some lunch platters. Very nice staff and a great location. Prices are reasonable

Delicious food and excellent service! I'm becoming a regular every week. Been there for breakfast, lunch, dinner, the bread and pastry is always delicious and you can always end with some Colombian Aguardiente! 
Recommended!

Some of the best service Ive ever had & the food was amazing!! The owners brought us a pandebono on the house and it was honestly the best bread Ive ever had. Everything is made in house & fresh, definitely recommend!!

name: Las Margaritas
address: 67-12 Fresh Pond Rd, Flushing, NY 11385, USA
reviews: As a former restaurant employee I can only give a thumbs up. Exceptional Service. Our waiter Jose was impeccable in style. Met all out needs. The Chef was superb. Ultra clean and toiletries were spotless. Parking can be difficult but deserving of 5 stars never the less.
This restaurant offers amazing service as well as delightful food. One of the best spot around town. The food came out fast and the prices are fair. Highly recommended.
Their house Salads is amazing. Drinks are strong and food is delicious. Service with a smile. Super friendly staff. Clean.
One of my favorite places to grab some food. fantastic location, well organised, and good customer service. Very good job!

I'm just giving my opinion on how it went for my group and myself. Service was ok, staff didn't really give you that attentive service one should get. The decor was ok at best with Mexican culture. Food was also ok at best. The one thing we did enjoy, was there Chips and salsa mix made with mangos. To be honest, I doubt I would go back again.

name: New Fresh Tortillas Taco
address: 67-08 Fresh Pond Rd, Flushing, NY 11385, USA

name: La cafeteria del Burro
reviews: Delicious pastries and great coffee. The owners are kind and keep the ambiance inviting. Must have the cheese cake!
I'm a coffee lover this morning I try this new place i love the customer service it make me feel home , thanks guys

name: Ridgewood Garden
reviews: Great secluded spot.  Great area quiet & peaceful. You can take a relax full break from long walk. Get some rays and breeze.  I recommend to anyone.  Enjoy the Garden setup. Perfect for seniors too!
Lovely small garden.
A great local effort to beautify the area.
Nice lil neighborhood garden to sit n relax on whatever Journey ur taking today.

The gentleman who had the imagination, courage, tenacity, and vision, should be commended by all New Yorkers.  I met George,  the man behind this beautiful space.  He spends his limited funds to beautify a space where all are welcome to rest, and admire paradise in the midst of typically neglected right-of-ways.

name: Yip Szechuan Gourmet
reviews:
There is a big wad of hair in my food.
And the delivery guy cursed at me in Chinese.
Excellent food and service...
Very generous portions . Love everything I get.
Food is tasty and service a fast.
My food was good, but I did not like the fact that they did not de-vein the shrimp in my order , so it leads me to wonder what other "short cuts" can they be doing?

name: Late night deli
reviews: 24 hour deli, where you can get many delicious options of food. This is my go to spot, no matter what time it may be.
Great place to get a quick bite. Fresh ingredients & the grill is clean. Prices are good. Customer service 👌
Good sandwiches, good service friendly staff
Fresh hot food and friendly service
The best sandwiches in queens

name: New York Grill
reviews: After walking in.  Nobody noticed me.  So i ended up standing there for about 5 mins until i eventually just sat wherever i wanted. I've been here before and the food is what you would expect from a diner.  Taste good and filling. The seating is comfortable and its warm inside.  I left here feeling mission accomplished.  Overall, a solid spot.
The best Cobb salad. Burgers, soup what every you order here you cant go wrong the food is excellent. The place is immaculate, and the people are friendly! This is my favorite  lil place.
Very Good. Always like to have Breakfast there, same plate all time, the waiters are so nice.
Great family owned business great food great people
Cute little no-nonsense diner, perfect for a quick bite or cup of coffee.

name: Mahalo New York Bakery
reviews: After my neighborhood baker flaked 2 weeks before the wedding, Sue and her team stepped in and delivered amazing bride and groom cakes and cupcakes. Did not charge extra or anything. They're the absolute BEST. Price is unbeatable for the taste, quality and design. Fast forward three years .. Sue has done multiple cakes for me including one for my baby shower. Her team is proactive, professional and understands the concept without much handholding. Can't thank them enough. They're part of the fam now and ivI' recommended them to so many folks.

Best cupcakes. Cupcakes are soft and moist. Plenty if flavors to choose from. Nuce variety of tropic flavors. My favorite is hibiscus and mango. 
Reason price.

Must say this is a standout place for cakes and pastries. Love the milk lover but my family love almost all of their cakes , pies and saved ice. You can see in the pics they enjoying the saved ice with ice cream in it. 
We even order our birthday cakes from Mahalo now.
Ordered a birthday cake from here very last minute and they were able to accommodate me.  Ordered a 7inch pineapple guava cake and it was amazing. I Would definitely purchase from this bakery again

I love these cupcakes
 Best in nyc. I love the milk lover cupcakes!

name: Evertz's Cafe
reviews:
Great place, great food, great price. Nice seating too.

We stopped by here for lunch one day, and we were very pleased. Definitely worth trying out.

Great food, authentic Latin cuisine with lots of flavor. Try the sancocho, you won't regret it. All other food here no matter what you get will be great. The owner is very friendly and such a down to earth person. 
So when you're hungry and close by, go drop in and have a plate, you're guaranteed to leave satisfied.

Finally a cafe on the eastern side of myrtle avenue. I find that most places are closer to ridgewood and freshpond road area, so it's nice to have a clean, local cafe in this area. Food looks appetizing but haven't had a chance to give it a go. Tried the cappuccino and think I'd stick to the regular coffee from here. Juices are good and made fresh. I will try out and improve rating if the food lives up to expectation.
Dominican Specialties & American food are both delicious. Very friendly and clean. On a Cold day the chicken soup hits the spot.
Stopped in tonight because my head is full of snot and I wanted some chicken soup. The soup is great! Fatty without being greasy and they don't skimp on the chicken.

name: Drumm Triangle
address: Cooper Avenue, 65th Place, Cypress Hills St, Ridgewood, NY 11385, USA
reviews:
Over and over again a great place to visit.
Kids love it!
I love this place. Really tight walkways made it hard to get into. It happened to be really wet that day so I hangout for hours. It was bangin. Im coming again.
Just a place to sit and enjoy the weather
It's a quiet but exposed triangle.

There isn't anything to do here except sit on benches and watch people walk their dogs.  In the winter it's barely shoveled, always smells of urine.  It's just a small park that could be better.   Not historic and the recent change to the surrounding roads makes it difficult to access the walkways in the triangle.

name: Zum Stammtisch
reviews: My family and I have been going to Zum's for over 45 years. Never have I EVER been disappointed. The food is the absolute best-regardless of your selection. This restaurant is my benchmark for what German food should be. The service is always great and the atmosphere is second to none. It is a  1 hour drive for me but worth it. If there was a 6 star rating- I would have given it.
This spot gives excellent service as well as enjoyable food. One of the best spot in town. The meals arrived quick and the prices were affordable. Recommended.
This spot is worth a try. They serve large portions for affordable prices. Constantly well kept and with good ambience. Would recommend to others.

This place.  Two words.  Deliciously amazing!!.  There wasn't anything bad on the menu.  I'll definitely be back for more. I have to try the whole menu!.  I went there with 2 other friends.  4 beers dinner and dessert cake out to $160.00  so it's up there but The portions are very large. Make sure you go there with an appetite. You won't be disappointed.
Superb environment and very amiable service. The food was fresh and yummy. Will clearly recommend this restaurant to friends and family. Reasonable rates and generous meals. Keep it up.

name: Glendale Pizza
reviews: We love the pizza and definitely the garlic knots. Everything is prepared fresh, from scratch and taste delicious. This pizzeria is a true family tradition worth checking out. They are nice and courteous. We have lived upstairs for years and even though we moved to the Midwest, when we visit NYC we definitely head to the pizzeria.
Nasty owner, hair in pizza, pretty gross pizza even before finding the hair. Overall horrible experience, llowner needs to learn some manners and crack a smile once in a while. Will not go back!
Good pizza. Good prices. Wonderful staff. Parking sucks..
The best pizzeria in Glendale/Ridgewood. Great crust and dough. My favorite aspect of the pizza is the sauce. Very flavorful! A tasty selection of food. Would highly recommend.
Great pizza. Pleasant staff!

name: King Wok
reviews: “Chicken Fried Rice” more like Raw Chicken with cooked rice. Not seasoned, not fully cooked and missing lots of components to the fried rice. Do not purchase from here save your money and spend it elsewhere. This business clearly does not care about the client only about taking your money.
The place offers an awesome variety of fresh food. I love dining here. Employees are always welcoming, rates are reasonable and the place is always clean.
Fresh food. Good food. Very clean as well.
Been with King Wok for 20 years. Went through 2 locations and a fire with them. If you’re in Glendale you have to eat at the Wok.
The place is very dirty and it' smells like got a odor. And the food is not even that tasteful because it looks like its unfortunately under done

name: Taste of Taco
reviews: We absolutely loved the Mexican salads and the chicken vegetable soup was top notched with grilled chicken and crunchy broccoli 🥦 it was so good but they are permanently closed and the number says they combined Mgt with fresh pond rd location however we ordered the soup etc and it is not the same recipes, the soup has mushrooms and cabbage in it, it was gross! I’ve been looking for a New Mexican place now that has that soup! If anyone knows please let me know. Thanks
Not a bad place to eat if your looking for tacos or this type of food. Place is clean, service is very polite.
Just had lunch  at taste of tacos ! I think  is very good ! Better then most take  out  Chinese  places  !
They have a chicken salad that's Outasight
It's a really good taco place but it all by Chinese which is really good shrimp taco is my favorite. Uh I'm hurngy now ..... going to get one

name: Grace Pizza
reviews: $5 a slice?!? It's pretty good pizza but way overpriced with their $5 slice, yikes! honestly rosas is way better even Pisa down the street, I'll not be back, sorry
Great pizza. The food is always good here.
Pizza here is very good. The sauce is great, the cheese is great, and the crust is pretty good. The staff here is good as well. Overall, good place.

My pizza pie was severely burnt. Why would they even give that to me. Horrible had to walk back in the cold to return the pie. They gave me a new one but the taste and damage was done. This was my first negative situation but all it take is one time. Sorry not sorry it left such a negative impression in my mind and taste buds.  No more Gracie!  Order was in January 3, 2020 between 1 -2 PM
Great service great food nice quite comfortable atmosphere! Highly recommend

name: Russo Bakery
reviews: Delicious bakery, great staff, clean and pleasant environment. Always have something fresh!  Highly recommended.

Russo Bakery is an area treat. You can find a wide assortment of freshly made bakery staples. As soon as you walk in there is always someone ready to help. Italian cannolis are my personal favorite. Cakes and cookies are awesome. Metered parking is available on the street. Definitely recommend you try them out. I am never disappointed, especially when you get service with a smile! Enjoy your day. 🌻

Great products! Friendly customer service. Love the girls behind the counter very nice young ladies who are always ready to answer a question for you! My family and friends have been going here for years and it has always been quality!

I just wanted to share our Russo's bakery experience.  I went in the the bakery to look for a cake for my daughter's Birthday. I was thinking only the cake displayed were my choices to order. They had a binder of a variety of cakes. I ordered Thursday and Picked up Saturday. Beside the fact that it looked awesome and my daughter was super happy with it.. the cake itself was awesome tasting. Let's just say it went pretty quick.

Thank you.
Glenn

Love this place so many options.

And the best staff ever💖!!

CASH ONLY

name: Glendale Bagels & Quality Deli
reviews: Great place to buy bagels from with tons of sandwich recipe choices. They had recently renovated the place and there are more seats now (inside and some outside when weather permits). The bagels are always fresh because their bakery is in-house. This place is always busy but we came in after 9am so the crowd were already served and left.  If you haven't visited yet, you should try them and you never know - you might find a favorite bagel sandwich.

In my opinion this is the best bagel shop in queens.  I've been going there for at least 15 years, long before I was gluten free. Today I go there to buy bagels for my family and for visiting friends even if I can't enjoy them myself, yet the quality remains top notch and the service fantastic.   You really feel like family here. Be warned however the bagels are quite large, so come hungry!
I haven't been here since the renovation. It was great before, now it's ever better. Cant go wrong with the food from here.
Love the new look. Had not been in since the renovation!! Great job. The bagels are huge and taste great. The cream cheese is fresh!!! Can not say enough about this location. Will be back often!!
I had the best BLT wrap I’ve ever had here! Absolutely delicious and the staff is fantastic! If your ever in the area and want to grab a bite to eat. Stop at Glendale Bagel.

name: Infit Nutrition
reviews: Today was my first day in the store and it was amazing. I ordered a chai tea latte and had a taste test of the beautify me and couldn’t believe that your smoothie was healthy. I will definitely be back. Everybody in the store was very friendly and immediately I felt very welcomed..

I went to this place, just wondering what it was and everyone stood up, welcomed me with a smiling face and said "Hey Good Morning". I tasted their shakes and couldn't believe that this was healthy! Will definantely be back again! Support small businesses
LOVE IT,LOVE IT,LOVE IT!! Protien Shakes And The Teas Are AHHMAZIN!! The Greatest Staff Ever!👍🏽😊👍🏽
Amazing smoothie bowls and Amazing owner/staff!! Can't wait to try more from the menu!!!

name: Glendale Veterans Triangle
address: Myrtle Ave &, Cooper Ave, Glendale, NY 11385, USA

name: The Avenue Restaurant & Bar
reviews: Great neighborhood bar and restaurant. Welcoming crowd, fun events and fantastic food. Wings are the best, especially on Wednesday Wing Night. Bartender Liz is the best! Great Happy Hour on Fridays.
Delicious especially wing night!  and amazing service!!

I have been there many times food is great. The only downfall is it takes a while for the food to come to your table.Average is about 30- 40 minutes. It's not the server's cuz you can get as many drinks as you want while you're waiting. Also had a great time at two comedy shows

Dont bother ordering. Theyll accept your order. Cancel it after 10 min. Then tell you that they told seamless they had no delivery person 2 hours ago.

Or like a previous time, accept your order and then call you 10 min later to tell you its after the cut off and all the delivery guys left for the night.
Nice place good food good people

name: Glendale Diner
reviews: This place is the one I like best. I visit plenty of restaurants but here I keep coming back again and again. The team is very receptive and the cuisine they offer is so flavorful. I am always happy to have a decent dinner in this place. Highly recommended.

An old school diner with good food, reasonable prices and a friendly server, Gail. They messed up my takeout order slightly (asked for pita instead of a bun) but it wasn't a big deal. They messed up a second order when I was dining in. I'll give it another shot.
Yoooooo! Their Penne Ala Vodka pasta is exquisite! Dont even get me started on those wings. Everything there was delicious. I loved it. No complaints.
Have been going here since I was little! Four generations of mine have been going there for the delicious food and friendly people.
The server was cordial .  Food was good the coffee way okay.  They have parking in the back of the resturant very small but it definitely a plus.

name: McDonald's
reviews: Thank you for staying open and especially thank you to all the workers helping out. Would it be possible though if they can wear masks and gloves while handling the food and orders? I went today and the person taking my credit card had nothing on and the person that gave me my food also had nothing on. They are kids so I understand they might not grasp the seriousness of what is going on, but can someone from upper management ask them to give the idea that they are taking precautions?

It's so nice to find a McDonald's that still has a play place.  It's indoors and clean.  The entire restaurant is clean overall.  This will be our McDonald's destination even its further than the one by our home.

Ok, second time I order. They short me on my order. You call McDonald's and whom ever answer's. Is extremely rude, tells you. Call grubhub and hangs up. So disrespectful, you pay good money between food and delivery. You think, maybe they would just listen. Help you out, avoid this place.
You can't go wrong at McDonald's for breakfast.  I had a sausage egg Mcmuffin, a coffee and a hash brown. It was hot and tasted fresh...

Quick service. Unlike other McDonald's they give you your order number and bring the food to you. They have a pretty decent sized seating area, playground and parking lot. They also have the all day breakfast option.

name: Pinocchio Playground
reviews: Nice little park. Shaded by trees so nice place to go on sunny days.
Beauty playground
Best kept secret in ghood

name: Trattoria Bambino's Pizza
reviews: Despite going there at noon the pizza looked it was out for a day.I got the only thing that looked fresh which was the fresh mozzarella slice.wasnt too much going with it and it tasted bland. Definitely a decent spot for lunch if you're by the park.
The food is good.  The price is fair. The people that work thete are very accommodating and friendly. A giant slice of Sicilian is 3 bucks. Parking sux.
Great pizza.Mondays special is a large pie carry out fpr $10.00. #1 special is 2 litter and a lg. Pie for $20.00. They have desserts and carry girl Scout cookies daily.
Regular Pizza was very good. This crust, and very good cheese. Will definitely eat here again.
Fantastic food with a good selection. The place is kept very clean. The employees are so friendly too. We chose a slice of pizza each with cold drinks. That was one of the best pizza, hands down!!

name: Joyo
reviews: This spot sure knows how to satisfy their clients. Regularly with a super friendly attitude. The food is affordably priced, regularly flavorful and clean.
Just ordered for delivery. Not bad. Some cuts on the yellowtail were odd, but not bad. Miso soup tasted off. Taste was good overall. Never had soft shell crab before.

I ordered delivery through Yelp, and it was fine. The food arrived within 45 minutes. Nothing unusual, but the food was cooked well. 

I had the sesame chicken, which for some reason was listed under "Chef's Specialties." Sort of ordinary for a specialty, but it was good. 

The spicy salmon roll was tasty. More salmon and less rice than is typical. There are sushi restaurants that have the same rolls, done as well or better, for less, but there weren't any issues here. 

They have a large menu, which is usually a cause for concern, but in this case, it didn't cause any problems.
Over an hour late. Told me it's because its December. Told me they just left. I'm 20 blocks away. 40 minutes later it's still now here. No good.

What i love is that the chinese food here isn't as greasy has most other chinese food places, which is what actually reminded me to write this review. Would visit again if im ever back in the glendale area.

name: Sweet Rice
reviews: Always come here for quick and delicious food. Most wait time is 10-15 minutes and it’s always great quality I’ve never had a problem here. It’s yummy and affordable!
Local Chinese restaurant that I've been going to for years. Great food for good prices. Staple American-chinese food with amazing flavor. Clean and organized owner. NEW SWEET RIIICCEEEE!! Love em

Possibly the best fried Wontons I have ever had! My husband and son loved the free chicken wings they have us and the hot oil. The dumpling sauce was to die for. The dishes themself are extremely flavorful and cooked perfectly. 

We just moved to the neighborhood and this will definitely be our go to spot for Chinese!
There always so kind and the wait for the food is not long at all. Food is amazing and their egg rolls are the bestttttt!

My chef's special chicken meal was so dry I couldn't eat it. Husband's' Sesame chicken tasted like it was made three days ago. The bill wasn't cheap, and I am mad to have wasted it. Husband and I were at the hospital for me all day which is why we picked up food in the first place. 👎👎

name: Dry Harbor Playground
address: Forest Park Drive 80-9, 80-11 Myrtle Ave, Queens, NY 11385, USA
reviews: Nice kids playground right next to forest park.
Clean park greatest playground basketball courts right outside the play area
The playground is nice, but don't drink the water. The drinking fountains have a dangerous level of lead (one of the highest in the city).
Great condition basketball courts
Beautiful Playground, not far from my favorite Jewish Center of Ridgewood at 55-39 Myrtle Ave
